name: Baan Mook Taley,  Beachfront villa with Pool
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Closer to the beach you can't get !!! Baan Mook Taley is a fantastic private villa with direct access to a beautiful sandbeach, called Long Beach. Perfect to swim as there are no rocks in the water.  If you love privacy but not too far from the action this is the place to be. The Villa is not far away from Ao Nang centrum which has a lot of restaurants, shops and bars.

A hugh living room and 3 spacious bedrooms all with their own bathroom. The master bedroom was spectacular with a large terrace facing the beach - a beautiful view to wake up to. Get your coffee in the garden and walk into the sea for a swim , nice sand beach ideal for kids to play.

Private access to the beach

The vila is managed by Pookie , she lives on the property in a seperate house. She will take care of breakfast, groceries you need , laundry etc.

Our neighbours are Long beach resort and Pan beach resort, both resorts have typical thai wooden houses

Transport from Krabi Airport about 45 minutes by car. Taxi fee is approximately  800 -1000 bath, depends on type of car.
Transport from Villa to  Ao Nang centrum is approx. 500 bath. We do provided 1 motorcycle that included in the price.

The house set among the nature that remote by 10 minutes drive by motorcycle to Ao Nang Center

The information about the house

We all do supply all utilities ourselves by ;

Electricity>> 24 hrs. runs on generator and solar system . 
Water>> is supplied by the truck delivery 2,000 liters each time and stored in tanks. 
Internet>> We do modify by using our own router and Sim Card that mean the
speed would not too fast or strong signal as much as the internet which supply from the government.
TV >> android box which connected to our own internet router.

So we are kindly ask you please to turn off all appliances if you are not in use or leave the house.

name: Krabi Family Pool Villa (Sleeps12, Private Luxury)
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 4PM - 10PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Affordable luxury 5 bedroom villa perfect for families and  groups. The villa has amazing mountain views with a large pool , volleyball and bbq facilities. The villas has a family wing, parents retreat and outside entertainment. Our villa has five bedrooms, five bathrooms all bedrooms have aircon .  Located 10 minutes drive from Ao Nang beaches, our villa is central to all local activities. As your hosts and krabi locals we will be available to help you with all aspects of your holiday in Krabi.

Our villa is uniquely set up for families located in the middle of a large manicured gardens with a 180 degree view of karst mountains. Featuring a large 10mx 5m pool and a volleyball court. We provided all equipment needed for you and your family to have a fun and safe stay.

The guests will have full access of the villa.

Our host will be available to escort our guests to our villa. A telephone will be given to the guest to contact the host when needed. Our host will be able to organise activities and recommend the top spots to see in krabi. We are here to help you have a wonderful experience in Krabi.

Our villa is located in the suburb of Sai Thai mid way between Krabi Town and Ao Nang. Sai Thai is a quiet area where you can enjoy the beauty of nature in a very safe environment. Many of the best things to do in krabi are located in Sai Thai including Kayaking, Ziplining and Go Karts. On the main road you can find many local restaurants and 7/11.  A 10 minute car ride will take you to Krabi town where you can enjoy the weekend markets. The busy beach area of Ao Nang is only 10 minutes away where you can enjoy shopping and a lively nightlife. From Ao nang you can visit Railay Beach and your host can help you organise a boat trip around the islands. Enjoy the privacy and beauty of our villa while still being close to all activities krabi has to offer.

We included Complimentary airport pick up and drop off in our service.  The villa uses a 12 person minivan taxi service to help customer get around with very reasonable prices. Most activities  include villa pick up and drop off. We are available to help customers hire cars our motorbikes if needed. We are have a variety of restaurants that deliver food to the villa including Thai and Italian.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Our host will be available to escort our guests to our villa. A telephone will be given to the guest to contact the host when needed. Our host will be able to organise activities and recommend the top spots to see in krabi. We are here to help you have a wonderful experience in Krabi.

name: Narintara Private Pool Villa - Free Tuk-Tuk (V6)
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 11PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Narintara Villas, Krabi. Situated in the Nathai area of Aonang, the villas are in easy reach of the beachfront with our free tuk-tuk service, local islands and various day trip options. Kick back and relax by your own private pool, taking in the peace and quiet.
We have a collection of 6 villas, managed from our on-site office by a dedicated 16-strong team of staff. We are a fully-licensed resort (hotel licence 70/2560).

Included in the price, you get 2 round-trip tuk-tuk transfers PER DAY to the beachfront in the daytime (200 baht per trip charge at night-time). We have a total of 6 villas in our small quiet side-street. 24 hour security + CCTV. Breakfast can be cooked and served in the villa - Continental breakfast @ 150 baht per person & American breakfast @ 250 Baht per person. BBQ preparation and cooking service is also available.

You will have the entire villa to yourselves - 4 bedrooms, open plan kitchen, living area and 12x4m pool with sunloungers. There is covered parking.

Our office is open from 8am-7pm daily, where you can pop in for local information, to book a tour or get some restaurant recommendations.
You can always keep in touch with our friendly reception staff via phone app messages who will answer any questions you have or order Tuk-Tuk trips for you.

The villas are in a quiet side-street in the Nathai area of Aonang. A few minutes walk away, you will find 2 minimarts, Talay Bar and Restaurant, which serves Thai and Western food, and Hot Dog & Cold Cat Bakery
**UPDATE - there is now an excellent new Thai restaurant ''Yim Restaurant & Cafe'' just 2 minutes' walk from the villas open 11am-10pm daily

We are only 6-7 minutes drive away from the beach but our free tuk-tuk service (2 round-trip transfers per day included in the rate). After 18:00, there is a 200 baht per trip charge (total for the vehicle)
Airport transfers cost 750 baht total for a private minibus. The trip takes about 30 minutes
We have a range of vehicles available with drivers for trips further afield - just ask us for more details.

The villas are in a quiet side-street in the Nathai area of Aonang. A few minutes walk away, you will find 2 minimarts, Talay Bar and Restaurant, which serves Thai and Western food, and Hot Dog & Cold Cat Bakery
**UPDATE - there is now an excellent new Thai restaurant ''Yim Restaurant & Cafe'' just 2 minutes' walk from the villas open 11am-10pm daily**
There is a great French bakery ''Hot Dog and Cold Cat'' about 7 minutes' walk away.
There are 2 supermarkets in Aonang (only 3 minutes' from the villa with our tuk-tuk service) - Lotus and Makro. Fresh markets also set up daily in varying locations, and the best seafood market is in Krabi Town VERY early in the morning!
Aonang has a vast array of restaurants, street food stalls and bars.
Our recommended restaurants include:
Hilltop, Ruen Thip, Carnivore, Reeve Beach Club, and A-One

Download the FoodPanda and Grab apps for a wide range of food delivery options to the villa
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Our office is open from 8am-7pm daily, where you can pop in for local information, to book a tour or get some restaurant recommendations.
You can always keep in touch with our friendly reception staff via phone app messages who will answer any questions you have or order Tuk-Tuk trips for you.

name: Holiday Villa ( A cozy seafront villa in Krabi ! )
address: Khaothong Muang Krabi, กระบี่, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Our Villa offers you a experience of luxury and peace vacation in Khaothong , Krabi, a tranquil area known for its breathtaking limestone islands scenery and iconic sunset vistas. Also located near Hong Island which is a famous white sand beach island. ( only 20 mins by longtail boat)

   Our team has experience in hosting villas since 2016. Please feel free to let us help you with organising your trips and transfers :)
We strive for your best staying !

Our villa has 4 bedrooms which can comfortably accommodate up to 8 people. However, the house can only add 3 extra person by adding sofa bed (Charge applied). 

  You can enjoy staying both outdoor and indoor. Enjoy sea view in the sunny living room,  and dining area overlooking the pool. You will own a large private pool ( 14x7m)  +  kid pool (0.6 meter in depth) with a sunny big area of sun loungers and garden with we can also provide private BBQ dinner service outdoor of the villa. 

*Housekeeping from 8 AM - 5 PM 
*24 hour secrurity+CCTV 
*Breakfast is 300 baht/person.
*Private entrance to the villa with private parking space.
*The seafront area is rocky (not suitable for swimming)

We also offer a wide range of additional services.

* Tour arrangements for the activities in Krabi such as a boat trip to Hong island ,PhiPhi island and others, an elephant sanctuary trip, Kayaking trip etc.
* Taxi services (from one way trip, round-trip,whole day trip)
* In-villa massage Service
* Scooter and car rental
* Baby cot
* Wedding Ceremony 
* We can also set up something special for you like marriage proposal or romantic dinner and etc.

There will be the villa lobby next to you and If you have any questions, Our staff will be glad to help. You can also send us a message through Airbnb or an email. Opposite the street is our restaurant “Khaothong Terrace Restaurant” opens everyday from 11am - 8pm. We will be around if you need any hands. Ask us for whatever you need - we strive for your happiness and satisfaction!

Our villa is located in Khaothong, a tranquil area in Krabi known for its breathtaking limestone islands scenery and iconic sunset vistas.
A short 25-30 minute drive to Downtown Krabi and Ao Nang Beach with access to many of restaurants, bars, and vibrant night markets.

 We can provide our guests a taxi to places that you would like to go.  

-Local  convenience stores and grocery shops : 500 m / 5 mins walk.
-7-11 convenience store 
-Krabi Town : 25 kms. / 30 minutes.
-Ao Nang : 25 kms. / 30 minutes.
-Krabi Airport : 32 kms. / 40 minutes.
-Thalane Beach : 3 kms. / 4 minutes by car.  Free transfer for our guests to Thalane Beach.
-Thalane Pier : 4kms / 6 minutes.  Where you can go to group of Hong Island (Famous group of 4 islands in Krabi ) ,  group of Jamesbond Island (Koh Panyee village,the famous village that is seemingly floating in the  bay , is located here ), Yao noi island, Yao yai Island.
sectionedDescription/interaction: There will be the villa lobby next to you and If you have any questions, Our staff will be glad to help. You can also send us a message through Airbnb or an email. Opposite the street is our restaurant “Khaothong Terrace Restaurant” opens everyday from 11am - 8pm. We will be around if you need any hands. Ask us for whatever you need - we strive for your happiness and satisfaction!

name: Private Paradise @Villa Heaven Sent+ free transfer
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is flexible and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Heaven Sent is a luxurious seaside villa perfect for entertaining and relaxation. We offer a customized service including a villa manager on call in order to assist you in planning activities, meals, entertainment and sight seeing as you desire.

The owner will meet you at the airport upon your arrival to ensure you receive a warm welcome and show you around the local area. This service is complimentary for all our valued guests.

The villa consists of 4 en-siute bedrooms with kingsize beds and a total of 6 bathrooms. All rooms are very spacious and equipped with air conditioning. 

We also have a massage room with two massage beds, a massage table and two armchairs. This room may also be used as a fifth bedroom with beds set up to cater for larger families and groups.

Marble, granite and high quality wood furnishings are prevalent throughout with a grand sweeping staircase. 

The villa has a fully equipped kitchen with oven and cooking facilities, a granite top breakfast bar and large dining table. 

The lounge area has leather reclining sofa's and lazyboy lounge chairs perfect to enjoy the home theartre system with satellite TV and WIFI.k

The outdoor area has a large swimmimg pool and tropical garden with plenty of room to sunbathe and relax in private. 

There is an outdoor dining area, waterfall and pond with a variety of exotic fish. 

There is also a well equipped gymnasium and the owner is an experienced strength and fitness trainer available to assist you on a daily basis.

We interact on a daily basis with our guests. The housekeeper arrives at 10am for cleaning the kitchen, dining and lounge areas, along with the gardens and pool.


The Australian villa manager has lived in Krabi for 15 years with his Thai family and is on call 24 hours in order to assist you at anytime. 

We offer our experience in planning outdoor adventures, activities and sight seeing. We will organise the best value deals for our villa guests and your high level of satisfaction is our guarantee.

Ao Nam Mao Beach is just a 2 minute walk from the villa. The beach provides a tranquil environment where visitors can relax and enjoy the stunning views across the Andaman Sea. Located a 5 minute walk away is Ao Nam Mao Pier operating longtail boats to the stunningly beautiful Railay Peninsula which is surrounded by beautiful beaches, lush jungle and spectacular limestone rock formations.

Located a 5 minute drive away is the seaside town of Ao Nang, a popular tourist destination with vast beaches and many dining and entertainment options.

Only a 30 metre walk from the villa to Ao Nam Mao road and you have a frequent bus service that covers the 4 of the local beach's as well as Krabi Town.

A five minute walk and you are at Ao Nam Mao Pier that operates the longtail boats to Railay Peninsula and the local Islands.

It is also easy to rent moped style motorbikes and bicycles for getting around and exploring the local area.

Taxi and tuk tuk services may be arranged upon request.

The host is an avid outdoor adventurer and specialises in a variety of rock climbing, kayaking, cycling, caving, hiking, health&fitness activities that are all options available exclusively for Villa Heaven Sent guests.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Smoking is not allowed inside the villa. Ashtrays are provided outside for smokers.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
We interact on a daily basis with our guests. The housekeeper arrives at 10am for cleaning the kitchen, dining and lounge areas, along with the gardens and pool.


The Australian villa manager has lived in Krabi for 15 years with his Thai family and is on call 24 hours in order to assist you at anytime. 

We offer our experience in planning outdoor adventures, activities and sight seeing. We will organise the best value deals for our villa guests and your high level of satisfaction is our guarantee.

name: ❤️AoNang✨Villa with private pool⌚5mins from beach⛵
address: Amphoe Mueang Krabi, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
⭐⭐⭐５ REASON WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE SEA HORSE VILLA⭐⭐⭐
【1】BEST Location:❤️Center Point AoNang❤️Only 5 mins’walk to 7-Eleven & Tesco Lotus and 18 mins’walk to AoNang Beach and  Entertainment Complex with shop and restaurants such as Subway ,McDonald's, Starbucks.
【2】BEST Offer for Airport transfer.
【3】FREE Shuttle service to the restaurant for dinner.
【4】FREE Hi-Speed Wi-Fi, NETFLIX, Drinking Water, Parking and Towels.
【5】FREE For Early check-in/Late Check-out in 2 hours if our villa is Available.

✔️ THE FULLY FURNISHED ENTIRE VILLA with decorated in tropical Thai style has the large private swimming pool.
✔️ THE VILLA has 4 bedrooms and can sleep up to 10 people at a reasonable price.
✔️ THE VILLA is Only 50 meter to Airport Shuttle Bus Stop.
✔️ FREE Wi-Fi for ULTRA hi-speed Internet covers all areas of the house.
✔️ FREE drinking water is available in the Refrigerator. 
✔️ FREE Parking 2 cars in our Villa and outside.
✔️ FREE Towels and bed linen are arranged to the numbers of people staying with number of days.
✔️ MULTIPLE Power Outlets and USB port and an available power strip within each bedroom.
✔️ SPACIOUS villa suitable families, and your friends.
✔️ WASHING machine is available.

⭐⭐⭐OUTSIDE ACCOMMODATION⭐⭐⭐
🏊【Swimming Pool】
The private pool with Jacuzzi has a length of 7.33 meters, a width of 3.78 meters and a depth of 1.14-1.56 meters, which is kidney bean shape perfect for the family with children who begin to swim and ensures safety with the seats at deep zone and 2 x Sunbeds for Sunbathe during October to May.
🌴【Garden】Rock table and Wooden swings in tropical garden.
🌄【Balcony】Special  Balcony at 2nd Floor that you will experience sunbathing in the seaside town and overlooking limestone mountain view and has 2 x Sunbeds for Sunbathe during October  to May.

⭐⭐⭐INSIDE ACCOMMODATION⭐⭐⭐
➀➀➀ 1st FLOOR ➀➀➀
🛏【 Bedroom 1】
The Blue wall bedroom is decorated in a beach atmosphere and had garden view. Double Bedded Room has a queen-size bed for 2 persons and a large wardrobe.
🛏【 Bedroom 2】 
The white wall bedroom had garden view. Double Bedded Room with 1 double bed can sleep 2 people sleep together  and a large wardrobe.
⓶⓶⓶ 2nd FLOOR ⓶⓶⓶
🛏【 Bedroom 3】 
The large Double bedroom has a king-size bed for 2 persons and a large wardrobe and work table.
🛏【 Bedroom 4】
Single Beds Room has 4 Single beds. This room is decorated in Japanese style and 4 beds in size 3.5 feet. 

➀➀➀ 1st FLOOR ➀➀➀
📺【Living-room】&【Dining room】🥣
Guests can relax in spacious living room with a 55" smart TV home entertainment system with NETFLIX application and comfortable dining area.

🥘【Kitchen】Refrigerator is size 6.5 Q, Electric stove, Microwave oven, cutlery, plate, dish, glass, kettle, toaster and sink.

➀➀➀ 1st FLOOR & 2nd FLOOR  ⓶⓶⓶
🛀【 Bathroom and Toilet】🚽 ✖ 2
Liquid soap, shampoo, water heater, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, as well as free toiletries.

⭐⭐⭐ANYWHERE IN THIS ENTIRE OUR VILLA⭐⭐⭐
☆☆☆☆☆   NOTE   ☆☆☆☆☆
【Bedroom 4】 on 2nd floor has 4 single beds if you have booked more than 6 people, we will open this room and prepare single bed according to the number of people you reserve.

📞Interaction with guests, I'm available 24 hours by phone and chat apps (Line, Wechat, Whatapp, Messenger)

name: Barefoot Breeze Vibrant Stylish Villa with Private Pool
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Barefoot Breeze Villa is an inviting getaway to indulge the senses. The modern design residence features flowing indoor-to-outdoor living areas, splashes of color throughout, and a covered patio dining space. High ceilings and room fans make the most of the tropical breeze.

Relax and unwind, top up the tan or take a dip under the stars, all in perfect privacy and comfort.

A full range of services can be booked: in-house cooking,  massage, tours, rental cars and bikes and private boat trips.

Surrounded by tropical palms and plantation, this is a quiet and secluded taste of paradise just 30 minutes drive from the airport.

With four  bedrooms, each with its own private bathroom, arranged around an open plan living and kitchen area, the villa is designed to make the most of the cooling tropical breeze.

The stylish, high ceiling Living space opens up with full width doors that seamlessly blur the edge between inside and outside.

Sunshine or rain, there is a place to sit and relax.

Outside, right in front of the swimming pool is an outdoor comfortable sofa and chairs for the sunny days.  There's even a bar with small fridge to stock up with cold drinks of your choice. Ceiling fans ensure that a cooling tropical Breeze flows to keep you cool.

Inside there is a comfy sofa and chairs (with large screen Netflix enabled smart tv and sound system) for those evenings in. As well as...

... the fully equipped European style Kitchen with everything you need to create anything from a quick breakfast to a dinner party. We can also offer an in-house chef to come to your home and prepare a delicious Thai meal or BBQ for you.  Breakfast can also be cooked for you in house by arrangement.

All the bedrooms have ceiling fans and are fully air conditioned with large windows opening out to the garden. All the bedrooms sliding glass doors are screened to let the air in but the bugs out.

The master bedroom has an elegant hand crafted wooden 4 poster bed, luxury furnishings and bed linen and a private shower room. Sliding glass doors open up to an outdoor private balcony with a table and chairs looking out to the pool and garden.

Bedroom 2 has a comfortable queen size bed and private shower room and double doors opening on to the outside dining area and pool.

Bedrooms 3 and 4 have 2 single beds each which can be arranged as singles or doubles as required. They both have private  bathrooms. Both bedrooms also have double glass doors opening on to a balcony with table and chairs and looking out to a small garden area with lawn and tropical planting.

Everything in the villa has been designed to be easy to use, within 5 minutes you will know and love this villa.

The villa is equipped with CCTV security for your security. Cameras are pointed at the exterior gate and walls only. The villa and pool areas are not covered by the cameras allowing you to enjoy the villa, pool and grounds in complete privacy.

The Villa is fully enclosed within an exterior wall with a gate on the entrance. Private car parking inside the gate.

We provide water, tea, coffee and coffee-mate  in the villa just to get you started, a supermarket is just a few minutes drive away.

We also offer some fresh seasonal  fruit on arrival as a welcome gift.

There are a few very good restaurants in walking distance, but to explore the area, we do recommend renting some personal transport. Most people rent motorbikes or a car, Just let us know what you need and we'll send you more information.

Our booking service can also offer in-house catering, transport, restaurant recommendations and reservations, in house massage and all local tours and activities at a great price, just ask and we can provide all the information you need to create a really special holiday. A guest manual is inside the house with all the information you need.

Barefoot Breeze Villa is the perfect base for a memorable holiday.

Please feel free to use all the villa, pool and garden. 

Parking for this villa is inside the gates, please do not block access to the parking area outside the gates as this area is parking for the neighboring villa.
There is one locked room for storage located just outside the back kitchen door. This room is for the cleaner and staff only.

During your stay you will be able to call us to ask any questions about the villa, the area or any of the tours or activities on offer in the area. 

Our house manager has been running a tour agency in Krabi for over ten years so will be able to help you plan and book any of the many trips and activities that are available in the local area. Some of the options: Scuba diving, private boat trips to blissful Islands, kayaking in the mangrove forests, rock climbing at the famous Railay Beach, horse riding and even thai cookery courses.

Krabi is world famous for its coastline and clear blue waters and soft sand beaches. Less well known are some of the mainland beaches and inland attractions, temples and National Parks. Feel free to ask advice at any time.

The property is 4 kilometers from Aonang Beach and 8 kilometers from Klong Muang Beach. The home is off a small road between Aonang and Klong Muang, in a quiet rural area surrounded by palm and rubber plantations.

Its best to have some personal transportation while staying at Barefoot Villas, mostly people rent motorbikes or a car to make the most of all the beautiful places that are in the area. We can help you to find the right option.

A Cleaner will come every 3rd day (stays 4 nights and longer), they will clean throughout the villa and change towels and bed linen. 
We will let you know the day and time they will be coming. The cleaner does have keys to the villa so there is no need for you to stay in when they come.

We do share this space with nature and there will always be some insects and bugs and gekkos around. We do provide a brush, so if you see any bugs , you can just sweep up and put them back outside.

For discounted bookings of 2 weeks and longer, sheets and towels are cleaned once per week and no cleaner is included in the price. The guest will be responsible for keeping the villa in clean condition and will ensure that the villa is in full clean condition at the end of their booking. We can provide a cleaning service for 700thb per time.

The pool maintenance man comes twice a week. We will let you know in advance the day and time they will be coming.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No Smoking allowed in the house or bedrooms.  Smoking allowed on the outside terrace.

Please note that charging of electric vehicles is not permitted.

Please respect the neighbors and keep noise and music down after 10pm

Please do not adjust or cover the CCTV cameras.

Children must be supervised in the pool at all times.

Indoor and outdoor sofas and chairs are covered in high quality fabrics, do not use these while wet from the pool or sun oil. Marks caused by water,  suntan lotion or oil will be charged for.

No illegal activities on the premises.

Bugs are a part of life in Thailand, its best to shut the doors to the bedrooms at about 4:00pm to keep mosquito's out. We also provide a pole net to make scooping bugs out of the pool easier.

Air conditioners and ceiling fans must be switched off when not in the bedrooms and when leaving the premises.

Only toilet tissue can be flushed down the toilets.

Only guests checked in can stay overnight in the villa.

A 5000thb deposit in cash will be required at check in. This will be returned at checkout minus any amount for lost or damaged items.

Please treat our villas with care and respect so that others who come after you may enjoy the villa as well, our Villas are available for letting on the understanding that the property and all contents will be in place and left in an acceptable clean and tidy condition at the time of checkout and all that all personal litter put in the bins provided.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
During your stay you will be able to call us to ask any questions about the villa, the area or any of the tours or activities on offer in the area. 

Our house manager has been running a tour agency in Krabi for over ten years so will be able to help you plan and book any of the many trips and activities that are available in the local area. Some of the options: Scuba diving, private boat trips to blissful Islands, kayaking in the mangrove forests, rock climbing at the famous Railay Beach, horse riding and even thai cookery courses.

Krabi is world famous for its coastline and clear blue waters and soft sand beaches. Less well known are some of the mainland beaches and inland attractions, temples and National Parks. Feel free to ask advice at any time.

name: Luxury Villa on secluded beach
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 12PM (noon) - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Luxurious villa on the beach facing west towards Phi Phi and Railay islands. 4 double rooms, (+3 extra double rooms in the nabors house) private swimming pool (15m x 4m depth 1,55m), modern kitchen, wireless internet and private parking.
Villa 'Lake 1' is secluded and suits those seeking a quiet retreat.

The Villa is a 40-minute journey from Krabi International Airport. Krabi Town is just 55 minutes away and Ao Nang, a vibrant city and a port to Railay Beach is 1 hour and 20 min drive away.

Absolute beachfront villa in a very quiet area but still within access of all tourist attractions.
Please note that if you want access to all bedrooms you have to add more people to the booking. Also notice that the Kitchen is best suited for 10 People.
1-9 people =4 bedrooms
10-11 people =5 bedrooms 
12-13 people =6 bedrooms
14 people =7 bedrooms
Ideal for: private weddings, family reunions, luxury getaways
If you have been searching for the perfect beachfront villa, you need look no further: Lake 1 in Krabi is it. The villa is located directly on the sand of a private beach Add to this a private infinity pool 15x4meter

Krabi Airport pickup with van 9 people: 1050 THB. 10-15 people: 2100thb
Phuket Airport pickup with van 9 people: 4000 THB. 10-15 people: 7500thb

Activities:
Tour to four stunning islands is a great day out for snorkeling, sightseeing and island hopping. Phi Phi Islands are just a short trip away on speed boat. Hike Down the 10-kilometer long beach is an energizing way to explore Had Yao. A day trip to relax in Emerald Pool or escape from it all at Railay Beaches and Caves.

sectionedDescription/description:
The Haven Krabi Pool Villa: 3-Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, King Bed, 6 Persons
This pool villa is a perfect choice for family, friends or couples traveling together. 
Whole villa is Self-Service: high privacy with CCTV for safetyness, Easy to contact us when you need something.
Features:
- 2nd-Story Terrace with limestone mountain view
- Private pool villa, Salt water
- BBQ area and car park

*** Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.
*** Free BBQ grill: charcoal

Rent a whole villa to stay and spend time with your friends and family.
Features : 
·	3 Bedrooms Pool Villa (280 square meters) features with the premium facilities for an affordable luxury getaway in Krabi. 
·	3 bedrooms (which is suitable for 6 but can also accommodate up to 8 people with additional charge at 1,000 Baht/person/night
·	Stylish Europe kitchen and fully kitchenette & kitchenware.
·	Guests can relax in a spacious living room with a smart TV home entertainment system with NETFLIX application and comfortable dining area.  
·	The private garden features sun loungers and terrace on second floor with panoramic limestone mountain view, as well as a comfortable

*The Villa provide the airport transfer service with private van at 700 THB/van/way for 1-6 persons. (Arrival flight during 10PM-5AM will be charged additional 200 THB) 

**Check-in time is 2-5PM. If you come to check-in after 5PM can be self-check-in: You can access the villa using a key in lockbox with code. We will meet and greet you in the next morning between 9-10 AM.

Entire Home

We will add you in the groupchat to inform and support you during stay with us

The Haven Krabi is set in a very quiet and private area, shared by only 5 villas. Enjoy the best views in Ao Nang, while having convenient access to the main road. Located on Na Thai Road (Soi Na Thai 3): from the 4 lanes road. 
This prime location is only 5 minutes from Aonang and is easy to reach other beaches; Nopparat Thara Beach, Klong Muang Beach or Railay Beach; City center and attraction areas.

<Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.

<20 minutes (15 km) to Krabi Town by car

Features:
- 2nd-Story Terrace with limestone mountain view
- Private pool villa, Salt water
- BBQ area and car park

*** Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.
*** Free BBQ grill: charcoal

name: ALOE Ecological Boutique Villa ๓
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 3PM - 10PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
In our Villas, the sky converge with the lush nature and its karstic mountains to reveal the most peacefull moments you can have with your dearest ones.

Close to the beach and all amenities, enjoy the serenity of our secured and private Villas by lounging around a natural pool and a tropical garden

All of our bedrooms are airconditioned for your comfort.

We also have in Villa breakfast services, served to you on a floating tray for you to enjoy your breakfast experience in your private pool.

Entourées de huit plages magnifiques, et à seulement 800 mètres de la plus proche, nous vous invitons à partager des moments de luxe et de tranquillité dans l'une de nos trois Villas.

Situées à deux minutes du port traditionnel d'Ao Nammao, vous pourrez accéder en à peine 10 minutes de bateau à la majestueuse plage de Railay et sa célèbre Phra Nang Cave, ainsi qu'à toutes les sublimes îles environnantes et leurs fonds marins.

Nos Villas sont pensées pour vous permettre de profiter de tout le confort moderne tout en vous imprégnant du bonheur de vivre dans un espace naturel et préservé.

Chacune de nos Villas, parfaitement indépendante et sans vis-à-vis, possède une piscine naturelle entourée d'un jardin tropical clos.

Elles bénéficient toutes des mêmes équipements, conception intérieure et services vous permettant de parfaire votre séjour


Dans chacune de nos villas vous trouverez :

- Quatre suites parentales,

- une piscine naturelle avec espace enfants (profondeur 0,40m) et espace parents (1,30m),

- un espace salon détente avec canapés confortables donnant directement sur la piscine et le jardin tropical clos, à l'ombre du toit en bambou,

- une table en bois brut naturel pouvant accueillir jusqu'à 12 personnes,

- une cuisine équipée avec réfrigérateur, micro-ondes, plaques de cuisson, ustensiles de cuisine et de cuisson, rangements, vaisselle, machine à café italienne et théière.
​
- Wifi accessible dans toute la propriété,

- un espace parking couvert, privé et sécurisé,

- une surveillance vidéo.

Nos suites parentales :

Chaque Villa dispose de 4 suites parentales toutes équipées de :

- un lit King Size - 180 cm x 200 cm,

- lit simple supplémentaire au sol ou en mezzanine installé en option,

- une salle de bain privée avec douche à l'italienne, produits de toilette, water-closet et vasque.

- draps et serviettes de bain,

- une terrasse ombragée privée,

- un meuble de rangement,

- un sèche cheveux, fer à repasser,

- un grand projecteur avec Netflix,

- une connexion internet en wifi,

- climatisation pour toutes les chambres,

- lit bébé installé gratuitement sur demande.

Services offerts :
​
Nos Villas sont conçues avec pour objectif votre pleine satisfaction et nous avons mis en place les services suivants sans supplément :

Un service de ménage est organisé quotidiennement afin de vous permettre de profiter de la Villa dans des conditions optimales, sans vous soucier de l'entretien.

Le changement des draps et serviettes s'effectuera tous les trois jours.

 Le transport depuis l'Aéroport de Krabi jusqu'à la Villa (aller et retour) vous est offert pour tous les séjours de 7 nuitées ou plus.

Pour les petits voyageurs, une chaise haute ou/et un lit à barreaux pour enfant peuvent être installés sur demande. 

 Une boite à pharmacie est mise à disposition dans la Villa avec des produits de soins de base. 

Vous trouverez des livres, en plusieurs langues, mis gratuitement à votre disposition dans la Villa pour parfaire vos moments de détente.

SERVICES OPTIONNELS :

La livraison de petits-déjeuners sont organisés, à commander au moment de la réservation, ou au plus tard sur demande avant la veille 17 heures.

Nous offrons trois options pour les petits déjeuners : Western, Thaï ou Healthy.

          Prix : 350 Bahts par personne (175 pour les enfants de moins de 13 ans)

Un service de pressing vous est proposé pour vos vêtements personnels sur simple demande

Prix : 100 Bahts du kilo.

Un panier gourmand vous est proposé et sera mis à disposition dans la cuisine de la Villa pour votre arrivée (vous trouverez les produits frais directement dans le réfrigérateur).
Votre panier gourmand est constitué de :

Deux kilos de pâtes sèches, 2 Kilos de Riz blanc Thaï, deux pots de sauce tomates Italienne, un kilo de poulet frais, 2 poissons frais, deux litres de lait, sélection de fruits frais et légumes variés (selon arrivage du marché), deux paquets de gâteaux différents, un paquet de céréales, café et thé thaïlandais.

Prix : 3000 Bahts.

Panier Enfant :
Un set de jeux de plage, un jeux de brassards, un paquet de couches (nous préciser  la taille), un paquet de lingettes bébé, un pot de lait infantile Nestlé 1300g environ (ou un second paquet de couches si votre enfant ne consomme pas de lait infantile), 2 petits pots sucrés et 2 petits pots salés, un paquet de biscuits pour enfants, 4 briques de lait au chocolat, 4 briques de jus de fruits.

   Prix : 3000 Bahts

Nous sommes disponibles 7 jours sur 7 de 6h à 23h.

Nous avons spécialement décidé de travailler avec différents partenaires, choisis pour la qualité de leurs services, leur passion pour leur métier et leur volonté d'effectuer leur travail dans un respect du peuple Thaïlandais et de l'environnement.

La région de Krabi est remplies d'activités et découvertes, riche de ses parcs maritimes reconnus et d'une faune et flore luxuriante.

Voici la liste de ce que nos partenaires peuvent vous faire découvrir :

- Plongée -

- Les Quatre îles -

- Cours de cuisine -

- Koh Hong, lagon et îlots -

- Koh PhiPhi et coucher de soleil -
- Kayaking entre lac et montagnes -
- Kids Club -
- Baie de Phang Nga -
- Détente et relaxation -
- Trekking et exploration -
- Kayak dans la mangrove -
- Lieux préservés et vie locale -
- Escalade et découverte de la nature -

​

Plages :
Ao Nammao : 2 minutes
Ao Nang : 5 minutes
Railey Beach : 10 minutes
Long Beach : 10 minutes
Klong Muang Beach : 15 minutes
Tup Kaek Beach : 20 minutes
Secret Beach (Cambridge School) : 20 minutes
Ao Thalane : 25 minutes

Ports :
Ao Nammao : 1 km
Ao Nang : 5,2 km

Aéroports :
Aéroport de Krabi : 23 km (30min)
Aéroport de Phuket : 143 km (2h 07min)
Aéroport de Trang : 144 km (2h 10min)
Aéroport de Surat Thani : 163 km (1h 55min)
​
Hôpitaux internationaux et soins divers :
- Wattanapat International Hospital est situé à 8,7 km, services d'urgence 24/24.
- Krabi Nakharin International Hospital est situé à 13km, services d'urgence 24/24.
- Dr Somboon, médecine générale, est situé à 5,1 km, ouvert de 10h à 22h.
- Pharmacie : WeCare Pharmacy, en face du Tesco, est située à 5,1 km 

Supermarchés / Supérettes :
- 7 Eleven - Family Mart, marché local : 650 m
- Makro : 3,2 km
- Tesco Lotus : 3,8 km

Marchés traditionnels :
Chaque jour de la semaine, les marchés traditionnels thaïlandais, ouvrent à différents endroits aux alentours de nos Villas.
Une carte indiquant leurs emplacements ainsi que les jours d'ouverture sera mise à votre disposition.
Le night market de Krabi Town est ouvert du vendredi soir au dimanche soir.
Shopping :
Outlet Market (grandes marques de vêtements) : 18 km
Vogue Shopping Center Krabi : 15 km

Lors de votre séjour dans nos Villas, nous vous offrons la possibilité de louer un ou plusieurs véhicules pour rendre vos trajets plus aisés et vous permettre de partir à la découverte de notre belle région.

Voici les options que nous vous proposons :
- Location de scooter : 300 Bahts par scooter et par jour (dépôt et retrait à la Villa, assurance et casques inclus),
- Location de berline 5 places : 1500 Bahts par jour,
- Location de 4x4 7 places : 1800 Bahts.

Au sein de nos Villas, le ciel bleu converge avec la nature luxuriante et ses montagnes karstiques pour vous faire profiter de moments précieux de plénitude avec vos êtres chers.

Proches de la plage et de toutes les commodités, profitez d'instants de sérénité dans nos villas parfaitement sécurisées en vous prélassant autour d'une piscine tournée vers la nature et son jardin tropical.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Check in and Check out

Arrival times are scheduled in the afternoon from 3pm. Departure times are scheduled in the morning before 11am. Late check out and early check in will be charge 1200 bahts the first hour and then 600 bahts for every extra hour. Plus or less 15 min free of charge.
On simple request, and considering our logistical obligations, we can try to arrange its schedules so that they are more comfortable for you.

Daily Cleaning

The daily cleaning consist on cleaning the floor, toilets and bathrooms and making beds beautiful. The housemaid comes between 10am and 2pm. You just have to turn the blackboard on the gate if you don't want her to comes. Extra cleaning services can be possible with extra fees.

Material provided

The Villa is equipped and decorated with solid and quality equipment, on which we will ask you to bring all the necessary attention. You will find:
a complete and quality bedding that must be used in conditions of optimal hygiene (it is forbidden to remove the mattress protections), high quality furnitures from many Asian countries, to make you live a unique experience, an equipped kitchen that we ask you to leave permanently in a state of cleanliness suitable, in order to avoid the arrival of undesirable animals, a projector, which we will ask you to use with the utmost care while absolutely avoiding to touch the lamp, and going up the screen when not in use, sorting bins and compost, to minimize the impact of your stay.
All furnitures must be used for its intended purpose. If you want to bring our attention to any material, we are at your disposal.

Safety and decorance instructions

Please respect the tranquility of the place and make a use according to their destination. The sound volume, inside and outside the property, must be contained to respect the tranquility of the neighborhood. In case of conflict and / or complaint, we reserve the right to exclude the customers causing the trouble.
		For the respect of the neighborhood, it is strictly forbidden to make excessive noise in the evening after 10pm and before 8am. It is strictly forbidden to smoke inside bedrooms. In case of emergency, please inform the emergency services. 
A fire extinguisher is present in the housing.

Animals

Only a written agreement specifies if the tenant is allowed to stay with his pet. If necessary, the tenant agrees to make the rental in a state of cleanliness irreproachable, leaving by not revealing in any case the presence of an animal during the stay, including outside the housing.
Animals should never be left in the dwelling alone. Any damage due to pets is the sole responsibility of the tenant and will be deducted from his deposit.

In case of issues

In case of breakdown or malfunction, please contact us without delay. We will do our best to remedy the situation. No refund of repairs can be taken into account without our agreement.
In case of breakage, disaster or degradation, thank you to report it during your stay, even if this damage may seem to you secondary, our desire being to offer to our customers as stay as flawless as possible. In case of loss or deterioration of housing elements, the amount of the deposit will be reduced by the cost of the restoration or a possible replacement, with an increase corresponding to the expenses of routing and research (for the ancient objects).

Swimming Pool

The swimming pool is in beadcrete, a high quality and unique material that gives to it a natural design, thank you for your attention so that no damage is done. Jump is prohibited and the owners cannot be held liable in this regard. The technical room is forbidden to any guests.

CCTV

The cameras are installed for your security, the images of these are consulted only in case of alarm, intrusion, or to bring all the evidences.

Check out

Upon your departure, you are asked to leave the villa in an orderly movable configuration identical to that found on arrival. Otherwise, you agree by signing this document that a compensation of 1300 Bahts is deducted from the deposit, which may be increased in case of exceptional disorder.
You agree that any unreported and / or hidden damage will be increased by 200% of the total amount of the reclamation fee. In Thailand, as in any home, honesty is always rewarded.
In case of restoration costs, you will be free to pay us the said amounts in cash or by transfer, exchange fees and transfer being your exclusive responsibility. We allow ourselves, in case of deep disagreement, to contact the police who will be the sole judge.

Caution & Laundry service
 
2000 Bahts will be ask in the check-in time and then return in the check-out time
In the aim to protect our environnement we dont use air dryer machine but natural drying, your clothes will be ready maximum 24hours after pick up  Price 100 bahts by kilo [Urgent cleaning on request]

sectionedDescription/description:
Villa is private pool villa. Quite and safety aria.View Park Pool Villas Krabi is located in Ao Nang. It is ideal for those who seek relaxation and entertainment together in Krabi. From the accommodation, you can easily go anywhere in this lively city. Great location. Guests will enjoy popular attractions. The city is easily accessible.

View Park Pool Villas Krabi has many facilities to make your holiday in Krabi. This is a good value for money. Guests will enjoy all Wi-Fi (free), 24-hour security, daily maid service, taxi service, kitchen.

All rooms are equipped with all the facilities you need. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like safety deposit boxes. At View Pool Pool Villas, guests will find a wide range of professional services and facilities.

name: Eagles Nest, Luxury Villa, Koh Yao Noi
address: Koh Yao Noi, Phang Nga, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Private resort-style villa on 'One of Thailand's last unspoilt islands'   The Guardian. Transport easily arranged - 30 minutes via speedboat from Phuket and Krabi.

Eagle’s Nest is a new, state- of-the-art 4 bedroom villa surrounded by exotic wildlife and benefiting from what is often referred to as ‘the best view in Asia.’ 

All your creature comforts are catered for: high speed-wifi, air conditioning, a sleek kitchen, satellite TV and sound system. 

Inspired by 5 star barefoot resort-style living, each ensuite bedroom boasts stunning views across the bay’s limestone islands, deep coral-rich turquoise waters and surrounding jungle. 

Ideal for families or groups, the property offers numerous spaces for deep R&R, from its terraces, to the sleek infinity pool, large open-plan living room and communal lookout spots that are perfect for a sunset cocktail or morning sunrise yoga session.

Guests will have private use of the entire space during their stay.

You will be welcomed and looked after by our staff who live onsite in the service quarters, and come from the nearby village. They work as a team, and like all the local people here, are very gentle, thoughtful and sweet-natured.

Eagle’s Nest is your ultimate tropical island hideaway, set in the midst of the Phang Nga archipelago of 44 islands.  The villa is within walking distance of the charming local fishermans’ village Thakao, with its few simple but delicious restaurants and shops, a boat lagoon and the pier for boats to Krabi. 

The island offers a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets, from our favourite and fun Italian, La Luna, to the 5* refinement of Six Senses Yao Noi’s Hilltop Reserve- which makes the perfect spot for a special occasion or unforgettable date night under the stars.

You can also take a long tail boat day trip to discover Phang Nga bay and its deserted islands - be sure to request a picnic and dine on a beach all to yourselves. 

You can fill your days with kayaking, bike rides, hikes, bird watching, Muay Thai boxing, fishing. snorkelling, PADI scuba diving, private yacht charter, massage/spa treatments, yoga instruction and the local cookery school.

The villa's TukTuk and driver is at your disposal during your stay. Please make use of it to access restaurants and to explore the island - visit the local food market in town, discover empty beaches, cruise by the rice paddy fields, watch the water buffalo wallowing in the mud nearby...

Price is for exclusive occupation of the villa for up to 9 guests inclusive of breakfast on the first morning.  Subsequent meals (food and beverages) are charged at the grocery cost price plus a 20% surcharge.

sectionedDescription/space:
Eagle’s Nest is a new, state- of-the-art 4 bedroom villa surrounded by exotic wildlife and benefiting from what is often referred to as ‘the best view in Asia.’ 

All your creature comforts are catered for: high speed-wifi, air conditioning, a sleek kitchen, satellite TV and sound system. 

Inspired by 5 star barefoot resort-style living, each ensuite bedroom boasts stunning views across the bay’s limestone islands, deep coral-rich turquoise waters and surrounding jungle. 

Ideal for families or groups, the property offers numerous spaces for deep R&R, from its terraces, to the sleek infinity pool, large open-plan living room and communal lookout spots that are perfect for a sunset cocktail or morning sunrise yoga session.
sectionedDescription/summary: Private resort-style villa on 'One of Thailand's last unspoilt islands'   The Guardian. Transport easily arranged - 30 minutes via speedboat from Phuket and Krabi.
sectionedDescription/transit: The villa's TukTuk and driver is at your disposal during your stay. Please make use of it to access restaurants and to explore the island - visit the local food market in town, discover empty beaches, cruise by the rice paddy fields, watch the water buffalo wallowing in the mud nearby...

name: 3BR Family Eco Pool Villa A2
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Opened in Dec 2021, our modern vertical pool villa in Krabi blends comfort and nature. Fully air-conditioned rooms with constant natural ventilation provide a unique stay. Located near Lotus's supermarket and restaurants, convenience is at your fingertips. The villa comprises three bedrooms, three bathrooms, and an extra poolside toilet. Enjoy our outdoor pool and tranquil indoor green area for a remarkable experience.

Our villa comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests within its three fully air-conditioned bedrooms. For your convenience, we offer three bathrooms and an additional toilet located adjacent to the outdoor swimming pool.

The highlight of our property is the inviting outdoor swimming pool, alongside a soothing small fountain, contributing to the peaceful atmosphere of the villa. Enjoy the blend of modern living and natural elements during your stay.

1. Arrive at your designated accommodation.

2. Locate the digital door lock, usually situated on the front door.

3. Enter the passcode provided to you in our prior communication. Make sure to press each button clearly and check the code before pressing enter.

4. Upon successful code entry, the door will unlock, allowing you access to the property.

IMPORTANT: Do not share your passcode with anyone. If you forget the passcode or have any issues, please contact our staff immediately. Your security is our priority.

Enjoy your stay!

NOTE: For your security, the passcode will expire upon your checkout. Make sure to have all your belongings with you before you leave.

Thank you for choosing our property for your stay."

There are 4 villas side by side.
Here's the link to book.
A1 
https://airbnb.com/h/3-bedroom-eco-pool-villa-aonang-a1

A2 
https://airbnb.com/h/3br-eco-pool-villa-aonang-krabi-a2

A3
https://airbnb.com/h/casa-de-yim-eco-pool-villa-aonang-krabi-a3

A4
https://airbnb.com/h/casa-de-yim-eco-pool-villa-aonang-a4

HOUSEKEEPING AND POOL MAINTENANCE:

Please be aware that we offer complimentary cleaning services, including linen changes, once a week for stays over one week. Additional cleaning can be arranged at a cost of 800 Baht per service.

Moreover, our pool is regularly maintained twice a week, every Monday and Thursday, to ensure your safety and enjoyment. During these times, the pool may be temporarily unavailable.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation. For any additional requests or concerns, please reach out to our staff. Thank you."

CONSTRUCTION NOISE:

We would like to kindly inform you that there is currently construction ongoing in the surrounding area. While we do our utmost to ensure a peaceful environment for our guests, there may be instances of noise disruption due to these activities. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding and patience during this time. If there are any specific concerns or needs regarding this, please do not hesitate to contact our staff.

name: ROOF JACUZZI AND PRIVATE POOL 3BEDROOM VILLA LUX1
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
New complex Lux Family Villas is located in quiet and green area in 10 minutes drive from Ao Nang beach. The hotel consists of 21 cozy individual villas (66-250 sq. m).  Complex has a big swimming pool with a kids zone and outside playground. About 30 local restaurants provide fast delivery of Thai, Asia, European dishes not over than 25-45 minutes. 
Get more available dates in ROOF JACUZZI AND PRIVATE POOL 3BEDROOM VILLA LUX2

This villa has a big private pool and a garden with BBQ equipment.  Three bedrooms, three bathrooms, kitchen with all the essential equipment, big living room and terrace. All houses have air-conditioners, LCD televisions, safes and dressing-tables. On request is possible to order extra beds and baby coats. Villa of this type has second floor with rooftop terrace and outside hot jacuzzi under the opened sky.
Free WiFi internet is available on all territory of the Complex. In every house there is a telephone to communicate with the reception.

Hotel-resort located:
10 minutes drive from Aonang Beach
15 minutes by taxi from Noparatara Pear
30 minutes by taxi from Krabi International Airport
2 hours by taxi from Phuket International Airport
There is the best accommodation for the families with a children and for a big companies. 
NEW complex of 21 comfortable private villas
FRESH air and quiet area
Enjoy your trip in Krabi!

Our information desk is running 24 hours per day. We are glad to offer you full service of the tours and transfers.

You can order payable transfer from/to Krabi and Phuket International Airports. Free private parking lot available near the villa

This Privat pool villa can accommodated:
Maximum 8 persPrice of villa included maximum 8 person (include all children of all ages)
***TOTALLY ALLOWED NUMBER OF GUESTS FOR THIS VILLA IS NOT OVER 8 PERSON INCLUDE ALL CHILDREN OF ALL AGES***
Extra bed could be provided by pre-order with extra charges:
Baby cot (0-2 years old) price 100thb/1 night
Extra bed (2-12 years old) price 300thb/1 night
Extra bed (over 12 years old/Adult) price 500thb/1 nightons + 1 infant (Baby cot is extra fee).

guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Cha Wan villa located in Aonang just 3 mins to Aonang Beach(byscooter)  
We can accommodate max 20 pax 

All room is in the same place, just a few step to another rooms
All room with bathtub 

Free
Breakfast for whole group
House Keeping 
Theatre room
Pool table 
Swimming pool
Board game 

We used to host almost hundreds of groups before covid19 and now we’re back with new roof,air-conditioner and some new renovation.

The whole villa is yours. No one else.
Also got restaurant onsite(Thai food)

Before booking please read detail on Airbnb and check our location 10-15mins walking to the beach
2-3 mins by scooter or taxi
Also can check the map on Airbnb please
CHECKING VILLA LOCATION BEFORE BOOKING PLEASE 🙏

ALSO might not suitable for wheelchair users

No extra charge , all included 

 This is FREE! 

+Breakfast for whole group 
+BBQ grill store with charcoal and equipment (You can buy own ingredient 
   we’ll take you to market) 
+Entertainment room + Snack Bar 
+Cleaning room (cleaning, bed linens and towels changed every 3rd nights) For example if check in 16th=1night,17th=2nights,18th=3nights That is 3nights on 19th next day we will do the cleaning.
+For extra cleaning please contact such as everyday or every second day(there will be charge)
   Stay 1,2,3 nights no cleaning room 
+Wi-Fi all area 
+Swimming pool with morning cleaning daily 
+Water and toilet paper will be provide every late morning for every rooms
+Soap, Shampoo and Hair dryer provided (Noted:for toothbrush,toothpaste please provide by yourself)


     Entertainment room is perfect room to spend precious time with someone you love with family and friend. 
+Theatre room
+Board game (UNO, saboteur) 
+Card, Chess, checkers, backgammon 
+Pool table 
+Snack bar FREE included 
+Karaoke  
+Book  
+Air conditioner (New)

    This room is designed for your group to spend a rare moment with family and friend. Let's imagine you are playing boardgame or card with your sister/brother with drink while your parent is enjoying karaoke and your children are watching movie with some snack all this moment is for you, you can choose.   

You stay here, we take care 
+Staff 24hrs  
+CCTV24/7 
+Breakfast FREE 
+Laundry service 60thb/kg
+Villa’s Restaurant (Thai Food) opens private just for you and your group (we normally sell food online daily only through delivery company[by food delivery rider] but not dine-in so there are no any other  guest  in this place just you and your group) Open10.30am-7pm

Location
3 mins by vehicle to Aonang Beach and Noppharathara Beach  
5 mins by vehicle to Hospital  
5mins by taxi to Aonang Landmark
1 min by vehicle to 7-11 convenience store  

1min walking to 2 massage shop 
1min walking to 4-5 restaurants
5mins walking to Aonang night market
10-15mins walking to Aonang beach

Bathroom 14sqm.
Bedroom 25sqm.
Balcony 15sqm.

Transfer from airport is private van 600thb/van/way can sit 7people in 1 van, we can arrange for you.
You can also book 
+Island trip(phi phi, 4island,hong island)with private speed boat or longtail boat
+one day trip with private van
+Kayaking 
+or any tour program here at villa.
+Scooter can rent 250thb/day
+Laundry service 60thb/kg

+Also you can buy ticket or book trip at any tour counter in Aonang,there are many of tour counters we want you to get the best price 

For perfect sleep there are 8 rooms which can sleep 2 people each rooms make 16people plus 4 extra beds we arrange for FREE so total 20 people

All area

Villa Layout
All 8 rooms are in one/same place
There are 2 rooms in 1 building which is 1 at upstair and 1 downstair
Room number 1,3,5,7 are downstair
Room number 2,4,6,8 are upstair

Building A : downtair where you have meal
                       upstair is Entertainment room(hang out with your group)
Building B : are 2 spare rooms like plan B to make sure your stay is smooth and perfect as possible.

My wife and staff are ready to take care you and your group

Location
3 mins by vehicle to Aonang Beach and Noppharathara Beach  
5 mins by vehicle to Hospital  
5mins by taxi to Aonang Landmark
1 min by vehicle to 7-11 convenience store  
1min walking to 2 massage shop 
1min walking to 3 restaurants
5mins walking to Aonang night market

walking 10 minutes to beach
renting scooter 250thb/day
taxi everywhere

We would love to accomodate every group but due to villa location is good location and there are 2-3 hotel next door, after 10pm ONLY OUTDOOR area can not make loud noise, but can stay/do/talk/swim quietly, Keep noise to minimum.

BUT DON'T WORRY For hangout, movie, music, playing and spending time with family/friend you can use Entertainment room this room for your group open 24hrs.

There are many pub/bar/clubs both Aonang and Noppharathara Beach, you can go there for heavy party and loud music, they close about 2-3am   

We will do the best we can to make sure you and your group have a precious moment and memory back with you.

And please read and check our location first.

😻 There is 1 villa's cat named Ngern ngern(she got lost during covid19 and very thin so from that time we feed her until now so now she is one of our family here.) she never bothers any guest, all kids love her. 
During  the night she stay will staff in the office.
Hope you will understand. Really appreciate 🙏

name: Aonang BBQ and Pool 3 BDR Villa (The Haven Krabi)
address: ตำบล อ่าวนาง, กระบี่, Thailand
city: ตำบล อ่าวนาง
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 5PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The Haven Krabi Pool Villa: 3-Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, King Bed, 6 Persons
This pool villa is a perfect choice for family, friends or couples traveling together. 
Whole villa is Self-Service: high privacy with CCTV for safetyness, Easy to contact us when you need something.
Features:
- 2nd-Story Terrace with limestone mountain view
- Private pool villa, Salt water
- BBQ area and car park

*** Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.
*** Free BBQ grill: charcoal

The Haven Krabi Pool Villa is a perfect choice for family, friends or couples traveling together.
Features : 
·	3 Bedrooms Pool Villa (280 square meters) features with the premium facilities for an affordable luxury getaway in Krabi. 
·	3 bedrooms (which is suitable for 6 but can also accommodate up to 8 people with additional charge at 1,000 Baht/person/night
·	Stylish Europe kitchen and fully kitchenette & kitchenware.
·	Guests can relax in a spacious living room with a smart TV home entertainment system with NETFLIX application and comfortable dining area.  
·	The private garden features sun loungers and terrace on second floor with panoramic limestone mountain view, as well as a comfortable

*The Villa provide the airport transfer service with private van at 700 THB/van/way for 1-6 persons. (Arrival flight during 10PM-5AM will be charged additional 200 THB) 

**Check-in time is 2-5PM. If you come to check-in after 5PM can be self-check-in: You can access the villa using a key in lockbox with code. We will meet and greet you in the next morning between 9-10 AM.

Entire Home

The Haven Krabi is set in a very quiet and private area, shared by only 5 villas. Enjoy the best views in Ao Nang, while having convenient access to the main road. Located on Na Thai Road (Soi Na Thai 3): from the 4 lanes road. This prime location is only 5 minutes from Aonang and is easy to reach other beaches; Nopparat Thara Beach, Klong Muang Beach or Railay Beach; City center and attraction areas.

<Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.
<Nearest 7-11 is 1.5 km, 3 min by car (19 min by walk)
<5 minutes to Aonang Center & 10 minutes access to Aonang Beach by car
<20 minutes (15 km) to Krabi Town by car 
<30 minutes (25 km) from Krabi International Airport by car (1 hr by public shuttle bus/van)

<Taxi Service can be requested (charged)
<Nearby store: Makro, 7-11, Tesco, Pharmacy and restaurant can go around by tuk-tuk or motorcycle in 5-10 mins.
<Krabi Town Weekend Night Market taxi service is 1,200 Baht/car/roundtrip. (around 3 hours for shopping)
<Tuk Tuk service in Aonang; to the beach, restaurant, supermarket etc. is start from 300 Baht/way/car
<Car/motorcycle hiring is recommended when stay at villa.
<Damage deposit payment is 3,000 Baht by cash at check-in time and will be full refund  when check-out.

-	Firearms or weapons.

sectionedDescription/description:
Opened in Dec 2021, our modern vertical pool villa in Krabi blends comfort and nature. Fully air-conditioned rooms with constant natural ventilation provide a unique stay. Located near Lotus's supermarket and restaurants, convenience is at your fingertips. The villa comprises three bedrooms, three bathrooms, and an extra poolside toilet. Enjoy our outdoor pool and tranquil indoor green area for a remarkable experience.

Our villa comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests within its three fully air-conditioned bedrooms. For your convenience, we offer three bathrooms and an additional toilet located adjacent to the outdoor swimming pool.

The highlight of our property is the inviting outdoor swimming pool, alongside a soothing small fountain, contributing to the peaceful atmosphere of the villa. Enjoy the blend of modern living and natural elements during your stay.

1. Arrive at your designated accommodation.

2. Locate the digital door lock, usually situated on the front door.

3. Enter the passcode provided to you in our prior communication. Make sure to press each button clearly and check the code before pressing enter.

4. Upon successful code entry, the door will unlock, allowing you access to the property.

IMPORTANT: Do not share your passcode with anyone. If you forget the passcode or have any issues, please contact our staff immediately. Your security is our priority.

Enjoy your stay!

NOTE: For your security, the passcode will expire upon your checkout. Make sure to have all your belongings with you before you leave.

Thank you for choosing our property for your stay."

Please be aware that we offer complimentary cleaning services, including linen changes, once a week for stays over one week. Additional cleaning can be arranged at a cost of 800 Baht per service.

Moreover, our pool is regularly maintained twice a week, every Monday and Thursday, to ensure your safety and enjoyment. During these times, the pool may be temporarily unavailable.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation. For any additional requests or concerns, please reach out to our staff. Thank you."

If there are any specific concerns or needs regarding this, please do not hesitate to contact our staff.

name: Baan Lompai Private Pool Villa - 4 Bedrooms
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Located 5 minutes from Ao Nang Beach in Krabi, Thailand. Sleeps 8 and offers comfort and relaxation in a deluxe villa and lush tropical garden. Fully-equipped kitchen. Perfect for families and groups to explore the fun and adventure of Krabi.

Our villa is located 5 minutes from the beautiful Ao Nang Beach in Krabi, Thailand, and jumping off point to some of the most gorgeous islands in the Andaman Sea.

The well appointed spacious pool villa sleeps 8 - 10 and is located in a quiet residential area. There are 3 bedrooms in the house, 2 of which offer en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom has a romantic outdoor bath and shower. There is a separate guest cottage with bedroom and en-suite bathroom. The villa and cottage are set in a walled tropical garden of almost 1/2 an acre so there is plenty of room to relax in complete privacy.

Our staff will meet you on arrival and orientate you to the villa and provide any information you need about the surrounding area.  Guests will have full private access to the villa, guest cottage, pool and garden.

In-villa massage, cooking service, laundry and a wide variety of tours can be arranged at an additional charge.

The villa is located in a sleepy residential area with a 24hr Family Mart a five-minute stroll away.  There is an excellent neighborhood Thai restaurant around the corner and an Italian restaurant and numerous roadside stalls within a km.  Tesco supermarket, 7-11 and a 7 day-a-week wet market selling an array of local fruits and vegetables are a short tuk-tuk ride away. Ao Nang Beach and boats to the spectacular surrounding islands are 3km away.  Nopparat Thara Beach where you can walk for miles on white sand is 3.5km.

Taxi from and to Krabi airport (21km), Tuk-tuk service can be arranged on a paid basis.

Baan Lompai is a private villa located in a walled garden of about 1/2 acre off a quiet residential street in Ao Nang, Krabi, Thailand. It's 10 minutes away from Ao Nang beach, boats to Krabi's stunning outlying islands and the beachfront restaurants and shops of Ao Nang. 30 minutes' drive to the airport and 20 minutes' drive to Krabi Town. There a number of small shops within walking distance and restaurants a short drive away. Tesco Lotus supermarket, 7-Eleven and a daily wet market are a 3-minute drive away. 
The villa rate includes swimming pool and garden services, excludes airport pick up, cleaning services. The majority of tours and trips offer pick-up and drop-off service to and from the villa. There is secure parking at the villa and motorbike or car rental advice can be provided. 
There are a host of activities to do in and around Ao Nang. Tour booking and information about boat trips, kayaking, diving, snorkeling, cycling, Thai cooking, elephant riding, horse riding, caving, zip-lining and exploring waterfalls, hot springs, temples, caves, etc., as well as restaurant options.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
• This is a non-smoking villa.  Smoking is not allowed anywhere within the villa.  Smoking is allowed in outdoor areas only
• Pets allowed at an additional charge
• Onsite car parking is available free of charge
• Turn off lights, air conditioning, and electrical appliances when you are not using them.
• Lock the door and close the windows when leaving the property.
• Be careful when using cooking appliances, heaters, or other fire hazards.
• Treat the property like your own home.
• Guests of all ages are welcome.

In-villa massage, cooking service, laundry and a wide variety of tours can be arranged at an additional charge.

name: Villa Baan Lalle, Aonang Beach, Krabi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Cool, contemporary style, with stunning mountain views

This stylish modern villa is situated in a large walled compound with one neighboring property, Villa Anna, across the driveway (both villas may be rented together for large groups).

The architecture maximises space and natural light, with a large central living space bordered by windows on three sides that opens the area up to the garden, and a huge column-less verandah and pool deck.

A personal, English-speaking concierge will welcome you upon arrival and act as your villa manager for the duration of your stay. Your villa manager is on-call to answer any queries that you may have and is contactable via a pre-paid villa mobile phone. The villa manager can dispense a full range of services from booking fun excursions to recommending a great Krabi restaurant.

The villa is located in a quiet residential area in the village of Klong Haeng, less than 3km from the beach; guests may avail the unlimited local tuk-tuk service with FREE WiFi to get around the local area, for a reasonable daily fee, or guests may decide to take advantage of the optional transport services provided by Krabi Riviera.

name: Beachfront Luxury Villa, Had Yao
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for infants (under 2 years) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 6PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Luxurious villa on the beach facing west towards Phi Phi and Railay islands. 3 double rooms, private swimming pool, modern kitchen, wireless internet and private parking.
Villa 'Driftwood' is secluded and suits those seeking a quiet retreat.

There are not many places where you can live right on the beach in luxury. Villa 'Driftwood' has 3 large double bedrooms, each with en-suite, an infinity swimming pool and modern facilities. The layout is typical Balinese, meaning rooms are separate and linked by walkways, and each room is lockable.
Ideally suited for 3 couples or a family, the villa is not suitable for young children due to the numerous lotus ponds and multi-levels.

You will have full access to the villa, which is fully equipped with BBQ, outdoor furniture, large DVD collection, wireless internet.

We have a villa manager who is available to handle any queries or issues, and can also arrange any trips. A mobile phone is provided to contact him.

Villa 'Driftwood' is a great place to relax and chill. Enjoy luxurious surroundings, great sunsets and a secluded 8km beach while also having access to rock climbing (one of the best locations in the world is at Railay), local boats for snorkelling and fishing, nightlife in Ao Nang and various sights nearby like waterfalls, kayaking and scuba diving. We can also arrange a relaxing massage at the villa on request.

A car or transportation is vital as Villa 'Driftwood' is in a secluded area. There are local restaurants at  4 boutique hotels nearby. Or Krabi Boat Lagoon (25 mins drive) has a restaurant. 
Otherwise the nearest place for shopping and leisure is Krabi town (25 min drive) or Ao Nang  (50 min drive).

You will need a car or transport. We can arrange (for an additional fee) a private minibus with driver who knows the area and can take you wherever you wish. Please let us know if you are interested.
We can also arrange for occasional Thai meals to be cooked by a local chef at the villa, or you can preorder Thai meals for the freezer. Or have a relaxing massage right at the villa by the ocean.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: There are several house rules which will be sent on booking. The villa has teak flooring, electric shutters and luxury furnishings which need to be  used properly to avoid damage. We do not recommend for children under 4 years, as there are numerous lotus ponds. Also, please leave the kitchen as found on arrival...clean and tidy. Unfortunately there will be a surcharge of 3,000THB for a dirty kitchen ️
