name: Amantara, Beach front Private villa 4BR
address: Tambon Khao Thong, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 3PM - 9PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
ABSOLUTE PRIVATE BEACH FRONT VILLA, A real living with nature, located on a lovely secluded THALANE BEACH facing wonderful islands of the famous Phang Nga bay. The villa is PRIVATE only for your group. The price is for 8, extra charge for 2 kids. Include daily Basic Cleaning. Extra charge for food, Chef, transportation, massage, etc.***Today Special price as there's chance of some noise from construction of one villa nearby during 8.30-17.00

On top of a stunning view on the beautiful islands of Phang Nga Bay, huge trees create forest feeling in the land and the villa has a unique tropical Indoor-Outdoor style. 
If you love a pure quiet nature you will feel relax and enjoy living with us
------------------------------------
THE VILLA, with 2 Floors :
GROUND FLOOR
1) Open living-dining-kitchen, the real tropical way of living, with curtains to close when it rains). The villa is fully equipped with modern facilities you may need; 
   - Free WIFI (high speed stable fiber optic, fix IP) for every rooms in the villa
   - Living area with sofas, armchair and stool
   - Dining table with 8 seats.
   - Fully equipped kitchen with 2 bar stools, refrigerator, gas stove, microwave, sink, toaster, kettle, pots and pans, dinner set, cutlery, coffee cups, glasses

2) Bedroom 2, one king size bed, one 3 seats sofa, dressing/ writing table, wardrobe, cabinets
-   Bathroom 2, open bathroom with private garden, this bathroom is shared with the living area

3) Bedroom 3, bedroom with a mezzanine floor above the main bed, one king size bed on the lower floor and 2 single mattresses in the mezzanine. Dressing/ writing table, wardrobe, cabinets
  - Bathroom 3, private for bedroom 3

4) Bedroom 4, one king size bed, dressing/ writing table, wardrobe, cabinets
  - Bathroom 4, private for bedroom 4

5) Garage: for 2 cars

UPPER FLOOR 

  The whole floor for Bedroom 1 (Master bedroom suite)
  - Bedroom with one king size bed, big sofa set, 2 writing tables, walk-in closet, 55” LED T.V. with internet TV,  Home theater/DVD player
  - Bathroom 1, open bathroom Balinese style
-  Large covered terrace with sofa set, dining set for 2, with nice sea view
*** Upstairs area is not suitable for children, the railing is quite open, so it's allowed for adult only
----------------------------------------------------------
THE BEACH FRONT 

Beach front facilities are private for your group
- Edge-less swimming pool 4-6 meters wide by 14 meters long, shallow part for children inside the main pool, pool benches along 2 sides of the pool for great relaxation
- Pool deck with sun beds
- Pool side relaxing sala with mattresses, hammocks and bean bags
- Tree terraces : 2 level of terraces up among the trees. Nice sea view and great atmosphere to relax
- Dining sala; The space with many tables and chairs, sofa sets in front of the sea. At the dining sala you can make private dinner by the sea
- Toilet rooms, wash basin and outdoor shower. 
- Free WIFI (high speed stable fiber optic, fix IP)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OVERALL ABOUT THE VILLA & CAUTIONS
	
The Main Villa :

Our villa is open design, living semi outdoor with nature. There are insects, mosquitos, animals such as monkey, frogs, lizards, birds, squirrels, cats, etc. Please keep your bedroom-bathroom doors and all cabinets-drawers at the living-kitchen closed all the time. Keep your belongings with you or in the safe, keep food, drinks and snacks inside the fridge or cabinet.

Swimming Pool :
Please take all possible care when using the swimming pool. Children when using the swimming pool must be supervised by an adult at all times. The edges of the bench and stairs inside the pool could be dangerous if you are not careful. The landlord accepts no responsibility for any injuries. 
The swimming pool cleaning schedule is fixed : every Sunday morning

Relaxing Sala and Dining Sala :
We provide tables, chairs, sun beds, bean bags for you. Please put Towels on the bean bags when you are wet and sit on them. Please help us bring all bean bags to keep in the Sala when you don’t use them, in case it rains.

Tree Terrace :
You can bring the beanbags up on the tree terrace, please help us to bring them down after use. Please be careful about the children to go up there. The railing is quite open. The landlord accepts no responsibility for any injuries. 

Air Conditioning and Fans :
We preserve nature and environment so please help us to switch off ACs when you are not in the rooms. If we see ACs on while nobody is in the room, we will switch off

Keys for the Villa :
We will give you the key of all bedrooms, normally in this area is safe and we have our staffs around full time, but for your confidence you can lock the rooms when you go out of the villa. 

Safety deposit box :
There is a safe deposit box in each bedroom. Please follow the instruction we put at the safe, to set your new code.

Electric Control panel :
The control panel of main house is above the washing machine, please contact us if there’re any problems. In this area there is power cut sometimes but normally not longer than 3 hours.

Hair dryer :
Hair dryers are in all bedrooms at the dressing table.

Bathrooms :
We have hot water in shower rooms, normal water at the wash basins.

Toilets and Tissue Paper :
Due to the drainage system close to the sea; please do not put tissue in the toilets as it can block the system. Please place tissues or sanitary napkins in the bin we provided next to the toilets. If any toilet is blocked, we charge Baht 1,000 each.

All spaces mentioned above are private for your group except laundry area in the villa.

The main gate to the compound is shared among Amantara villa and other 2 private villas belonging to the host and family. The host live next door to Amantara villa

Mainly we rent the villa, extra services are out-sources that the guests will have to contact directly by themselves. We will give all contacts after the guests book the villa

The Thalane beach still remains a very secluded place far from the busy district of Ao Nang that is half hour away by car. Perfect for peaceful holidays. More suitable for families or group of friends who love nature and peaceful/ quiet environment.

The villa is 35 km from the international Krabi airport (40 to 45 minutes by car), 27 to 30km from big supermarket, busy district of Ao Nang, shopping area and Krabi town (25 to 30 minutes by car)

For all 4BR, ACCOMMODATE 8 to 10 persons (age above 3), age less than 3 years old is free
The price is for 8 persons, EXTRA CHARGE is Baht 1000 per person.

*** Security deposit of Baht 4,000 to be collect upon Check in (Cash only)
*** Check in from 3-7 p.m.
*** Check in after 7 p.m. , extra charge Baht 200 per hour
------------------------------------
RENTAL PRICE INCLUDES

HOUSE MAID (Works and schedule) *** This service is not available during this period, until further notice. We will clean before check in and after check out

- Clean the living area in the morning before 8 am
- Clean the bedrooms and bathrooms at 14.00 (Making beds, clean the rooms and bathrooms)
** If the guests are still in the bedrooms at 14.00 we will skip to do it the next day at the standard time, otherwise the guests can request the specific time in advance, 
** In case you eat or party in the villa and request the maid to clean the kitchen and wash the dishes, we will have extra charges minimum Baht 200 per day depending on the work.)

*** DURING COVID time, please communicate by chat or telephone call.

BED LINENS 
Change every ten (10) days or per stay. If you want to change before schedule, the service and laundry cost will be charged Baht 350 per one room. 

TOWELS
Towels are provided in all bedrooms, one set per person, one XL size for the pool, size L for the bathrooms. The towels will be change every 4 days to help preserving the environment. To change before schedule,  the charge is Baht 150 per room.

COMPLEMENTARY SHOWER GEL, SHAMPOO+ HAIR CONDITIONER, TOILET PAPER AND TISSUE

ALCOHOL GEL** we provide for you, please use carefully 

DRINKING WATER
We give free drinking water in the jug in every room and in the fridge. You can request for refill. Tap water is NOT of a drinkable or potable standard. Do Not drink from the tap.

	---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EXTRA CHARGES (NOT INCLUDED IN RENTAL PRICE)
We have a recommended services persons/company to organize transportation, tour, food delivery, massage, etc … You can contact them after you book

         TAXI & TRANSPORTATION
  
- Transfer from the International Airport of Krabi to our place (35 km, 45 mins) will be in the range of 1,000 to 1,500 THB depending on the size of the car/van and time. Or if the customer go straight to the villa or need some stop on the way, the prices are difference .

- If you call taxi back to the house from other places, please save the villa position in your phone, or tell them to search in the map for “Amantara Villa”, then they can follow GPS  

LAUNDRY
The washing machine is private for the host and staffs. We charge Baht 300 per one round of washing, approximately 6-8 kg (Include wash and normal dry). Extra charge for use the dryer or  Ironing as per requested.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
STANDARD RULES AND AGREEMENT (To be signed upon Check In)

1.	The RENTER agrees to pay the MANAGER for any damages to the premises and property, including, but not limited to, furnishings, plants and household items, which occur as a result of the RENTER’S occupancy. The damages claim and/or the fine for breach of agreement will be deducted from security deposit or paid by cash follow details/ charges written in this agreement and/or as per receipts and/or evidences. 

2.	If the RENTER violates any of the conditions of this agreement, or limitations outlined, the MANAGER may terminate this agreement and enter the premises by force or statutory proceedings, in which case any monies paid by the RENTER will be forfeited by the RENTER as liquidated damages.

3.	The MANAGER shall not be responsible for any accident or injuries occurring to the RENTER, or guests of the RENTER, on this property or premises.

4.	We are not responsible for damages to the RENTER’S personal property resulting from lightning, rain, flood, or other natural disasters. 

5.	We are not responsible for loss, theft, or damage to personal properties inside or outside the safe boxes.

6.	Strict rules 

(a)	Do Not Smoke inside the Bedrooms and closed Bathrooms, please smoke outdoor and put the ash in the ashtrays provided. The fine is Baht 5,000
(b)	Shooting fireworks, firearms, Lanterns or set fire are prohibited

*** The fine for strict rule is Baht 5,000

7.	NO LOUD PARTY, the guests can party but not too loud and not after 11 PM: The area is very peaceful and quiet.
8.	No pets are allowed.

9.	If the RENTER brings other guests to stay at the villa more than the total of 8 guests or as agreed in the booking, the RENTER agrees to pay Baht 2,500 per person per night. Maximum guests = Total 10 persons

10.	If the RENTER invites friends for dinner or using facilities at the villa (not stay-in), we allow extra of 6 persons from the original guests, within 6 hours (between 10 am – 9 pm), extra charge= Baht 1,500 per person.

11.	Keys of the villa must be returned to the MANAGER. Loss of key, the charges= Baht 1,000 each key

12.	The MANAGER will provide what are included in the rental price, as written in the House Manual. The RENTER will pay extra charges, fees, fines follow the details in the House Manual or as agreed with the MANAGER. Please read the House Manual carefully as it is part of this agreement.

13.	Air-conditioning units and Lights must be switched off when you don’t use them, to preserve the environment, if we find any A/C or Lights on, un-used, we will consider switching them off.

14. We give free electric 100 unit (kWh.) per day, extra charge But 6 per unit

15.	The RENTER agrees to leave the property  AS IT WAS FOUND, ie; 

- All electric, lights, bathrooms and kitchen appliances/systems are in good condition.

- Decorative items, paintings, sofas, mattresses, cushions, bed linens, towels arein good condition, clean, not broken, no scratch or torn or lacerated

- All mirror, glass panels / partitions are not broken, no crack.

If there are anything broken, the RENTER agrees to pay follow the receipts to fix or replace

*** Security deposit Baht 4,000 pay cash upon Check in

sectionedDescription/space:
On top of a stunning view on the beautiful islands of Phang Nga Bay, huge trees create forest feeling in the land and the villa has a unique tropical Indoor-Outdoor style. 
If you love a pure quiet nature you will feel relax and enjoy living with us
------------------------------------
THE VILLA, with 2 Floors :
GROUND FLOOR
1) Open living-dining-kitchen, the real tropical way of living, with curtains to close when it rains). The villa is fully equipped with modern facilities you may need; 
   - Free WIFI (high speed stable fiber optic, fix IP) for every rooms in the villa
   - Living area with sofas, armchair and stool
   - Dining table with 8 seats.
   - Fully equipped kitchen with 2 bar stools, refrigerator, gas stove, microwave, sink, toaster, kettle, pots and pans, dinner set, cutlery, coffee cups, glasses

2) Bedroom 2, one king size bed, one 3 seats sofa, dressing/ writing table, wardrobe, cabinets
-   Bathroom 2, open bathroom with private garden, this bathroom is shared with the living area

3) Bedroom 3, bedroom with a mezzanine floor above the main bed, one king size bed on the lower floor and 2 single mattresses in the mezzanine. Dressing/ writing table, wardrobe, cabinets
  - Bathroom 3, private for bedroom 3

4) Bedroom 4, one king size bed, dressing/ writing table, wardrobe, cabinets
  - Bathroom 4, private for bedroom 4

5) Garage: for 2 cars

UPPER FLOOR 

  The whole floor for Bedroom 1 (Master bedroom suite)
  - Bedroom with one king size bed, big sofa set, 2 writing tables, walk-in closet, 55” LED T.V. with internet TV,  Home theater/DVD player
  - Bathroom 1, open bathroom Balinese style
-  Large covered terrace with sofa set, dining set for 2, with nice sea view
*** Upstairs area is not suitable for children, the railing is quite open, so it's allowed for adult only
----------------------------------------------------------
THE BEACH FRONT 

Beach front facilities are private for your group
- Edge-less swimming pool 4-6 meters wide by 14 meters long, shallow part for children inside the main pool, pool benches along 2 sides of the pool for great relaxation
- Pool deck with sun beds
- Pool side relaxing sala with mattresses, hammocks and bean bags
- Tree terraces : 2 level of terraces up among the trees. Nice sea view and great atmosphere to relax
- Dining sala; The space with many tables and chairs, sofa sets in front of the sea. At the dining sala you can make private dinner by the sea
- Toilet rooms, wash basin and outdoor shower. 
- Free WIFI (high speed stable fiber optic, fix IP)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The villa is PRIVATE only for your group. The price is for 8, extra charge for 2 kids. Include daily Basic Cleaning. Extra charge for food, Chef, transportation, massage, etc.***Today Special price as there's chance of some noise from construction of one villa nearby during 8.30-17.00

name: Stunning 4 Bedroom Villa Pool -Jacuzzi- Car- Krabi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
An intimate luxury private pool villa set in the foothills of Krabi, dwarfed by the spectacular limestone peaks of which Krabi is famous for. Enjoy your own space with your own private saltwater pool with Jacuzzi, full self catering kitchen and dining areas inside and out. We provide general cleaning, daily pool cleaning and all bedding and towels are included.

Set in the foothills of Krabi, dwarfed by the most beautiful limestone peaks ever seen, is a destination slowly becoming the place for those seeking the natural Thailand.
Eden Villas Krabi provides a true sense of peace and tranquility within the natural flora and fauna habitation of the beautiful Krabi Province. A labour of love has created this place by the owners. It is truly spectacular!

The spacious feel of all the modern villas with well designed spaces for sleeping and open planned kitchen and living area brings about its own special appeal of indoor outdoor living.
The large private gardens are ideal for relaxing and with your own private saltwater swimming pool/jacuzzi, with benefits of being both easy on the skin and the eyes. This lends to all the considered choices in the making of the villas. The patio with 4 sun loungers, dining table and chairs and BBQ facilities - available on 
request. 
All villas have secure private car parking for each villa.

There are  staff available through-out the day and in the evening for any emergencies. 
We also have staff who clean your villa and pool everyday.
The manager is available to supply you with any further information or answer queries as to the best things to do in the surrounding area.

Eden Villas is located in the lush foothills of Krabi Province on Southern Thailand’s amazing Andaman coast, which is famous for its other-worldly archipelago of over 130 islands, erupting from the sea. Exploring the islands is one highlight that’s not to be missed. The beautiful, unspoiled beach of Ao Tha Lane is just 10 minutes drive from the villa or families could beat the tourist boats to Koh Rai lagoon in Koh Hong National Park and go snorkeling among the magical coral reefs and the dazzling array of exotic marine life. Whatever your desires our staff are there to provide you a 5 star service and make your stay here at Eden a memorable one.

We recommend Google Maps.

Free car hire is provided with every booking, Toyota Vios or similar.
Why not Upgrade to a Toyota Fortuna 7 seater for extra comfort?

When deciding on your holiday, Eden Villas Krabi with its location, tranquil setting, modern and well facilitated villas, private swimming pool in large gardens, attention to detail and personal touches it makes for an unforgettable holiday experience. 
We look forward to seeing you soon.
There are lots of things to do in the surrounding area so when you’re ready to tear yourself away from the villas here’s what’s on offer. All the below trips are subject to availability, it is best to book these in advance to avoid disappointment.
* Eden Villas Exclusive Longtail Boat Tours - Paradise Beaches Exclusively for You and Your Group.
* 4 Island Longtail Boat Tour
* In House Massage Service
* Private Yoga Classes on site
* Koh Hong National Park and island hopping Tour.
* ATV - Quad Biking  off Road Adventures
* Diving with highly recommend and experience instructors to Koh Phi Phi  marine national park and surrounding local islands.
* Sunset Tour on a Classic Chinese Junk Boat snorkeling and food included.
* Big Game Fishing - Lake or River
* Sea Kayaking - A Must Do !  during your stay here! : ))
sectionedDescription/houseRules: We would like our guests to respect the local community and our villas with the same respect and consideration that they would like to receive. smoking outside the property only please :) .

There are  staff available through-out the day and in the evening for any emergencies. 
We also have staff who clean your villa and pool everyday.
The manager is available to supply you with any further information or answer queries as to the best things to do in the surrounding area.

name: 3-Bedroom Private Pool Mansion 250 sq m
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 1PM - 10PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The pool villa is a private part of the Jungle Village Resort with a lot of facilities & services you can use.  some free some against payment: restaurant, motorbike, scooter or car rent, taxi, laundry service, mini library, Thai massage, beach transport, ticket services, motorbike and car rentals ... (ask for prices).

On arrival you will get the password for the free Internet (Wi-Fi). All other things will be explained and shown to you when you move in. If you want to check in or out outside the hours mentioned please inform me in advance.

You have access to: 
- private swimming pool outside your bedroom door on 2 floor
- free pool table & large screen TV parlour
- restaurant

Disclaimer.
The host cannot be made liable for any disturbance or nuisance coming from exterior sources such as: weather conditions, noise from traffic or any other sources that are beyond the host's control such as power and water interruptions due to missing supplies from outside sources, irregular Internet connection, theft of or damage to the guests' property.
The host cannot be made liable for consequences for not observing house rules for check in and use of swimming pools.
The host cannot be made liable for problems ensuing from private business activities undertaken by our guests outside Jungle Village with suppliers such as tailors, taxis, tour agencies, restaurants, opticians, hospital treatments, dentists etc. 
However, we are always willing to help you with good advice and make suggestions and recommendations beforehand to ensure that you have a perfect holiday.
Check In Time : 13.00 PM - 22.00PM
Check Out Time : 11.00 AM
Late Check out  : contact reception ask price.
*Please inform reception when you want to check out in good time so that your waiting time is as short as possible.

I live in Jungle Village, and my staff, myself and my wife are always there to take care of you for check in or out or if you have any questions or problems.

- beautiful rainforest view on mountain side
- island tours to awesome beaches like Railay, Koh Phi Phi, Koh Hong and many others
- Jungle safaris
- elephant trekking
- snake show (cobras) and monkey school
- hot springs and crystal lagoon
- ATV (quad) tours
- fun parks
- kayaking 
- cave tours
- go cart racing
- national parks with a 7-step beautiful water fall
- local 1/2-day tour by minibus

You can rent a scooter, motorbike or car at very low rates or use our free transport to the beach in our Tuk-Tuk. We also offer airport shuttle and private, local tours.

In the neighbourhood you find:
- supermarket -> Tesco Lotus and Macro -> 15 minutes' walk - 3 min. on a scooter 
- lots of restaurants and local markets within walking distance
- Thai fruit market (5 minutes' walk)
I recommend you my favorite restaurant:
Jungle Village Bar & Restaurant: Thai and Scandinavian food (a 2 minutes' walk). One of the very best restaurants in the entire Krabi area (acc. to guests). Here you can buy beverages in 6-pack at supermarket prices.
- Professional Gym only 3 minutes away on a scooter - or we take you there.
- Massage (Thai or oil) in your studio or on pool side. Contact staff.
- Special tailor or optician service. Contact staff.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: No parties or events without permission by the owner. Check-in time is 1PM - 10PM.

name: Pool villa with Two Bedrooms room
address: Khao Thong, จ.กระบี่, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Pool Villa  with Two Bedrooms details.

One of Double bedroom + 1 living room + 2 bathrooms.

One of Twin bedroom + 1 bathroom.

We are the 54 sqm house with the private swimming pool and a big terrace. This villa is only one pool villa in Blu Monkey Pooltara Krabi Hotel and Villas. The hidden paradise among the jungle and the only remarkable Crystal clear river in Krabi  

We are only 10 km. from the nearest beach ( Tha Lane ).

1. We would like you to experience our natural swimming pool which is the most unseen crystal fresh water pool in Krabi. We also provide the swim ring and the life vest. The pool is 1.5 - 2.5 m. deep. Jumping is allowed only in the designated area. Please notice the the jumping sign and beware the sharp rock in some area. 

2.Front Office Service 06.00 – 22:00.

3. Our space has friendly dogs and cats which are vaccinated and well treated. They help prevent strangers and harmful animals at night.

4. To respect your neighbours please avoid using loud noise after 22:00.

5. The swimming pool and the natural pool service hrs 07:30-20:00.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Quite time after 10pm.
sectionedDescription/name: Pool villa with Two Bedrooms room
sectionedDescription/notes:
1. We would like you to experience our natural swimming pool which is the most unseen crystal fresh water pool in Krabi. We also provide the swim ring and the life vest. The pool is 1.5 - 2.5 m. deep. Jumping is allowed only in the designated area. Please notice the the jumping sign and beware the sharp rock in some area. 

2.Front Office Service 06.00 – 22:00.

3. Our space has friendly dogs and cats which are vaccinated and well treated. They help prevent strangers and harmful animals at night.

4. To respect your neighbours please avoid using loud noise after 22:00.

5. The swimming pool and the natural pool service hrs 07:30-20:00.
sectionedDescription/space:
We are the 54 sqm house with the private swimming pool and a big terrace. This villa is only one pool villa in Blu Monkey Pooltara Krabi Hotel and Villas. The hidden paradise among the jungle and the only remarkable Crystal clear river in Krabi  

We are only 10 km. from the nearest beach ( Tha Lane ).
sectionedDescription/summary:
Pool Villa  with Two Bedrooms details.

name: Baan Santhiya Deluxe Pool Villa- Free Tuk-Tuk (V1)
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 11PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Baan Santhiya DELUXE Villa is situated in the quiet yet easily accessible area of Na-Thai, Aonang, just 7 mins (3km) drive from the beachfront. The villas offer quiet, peaceful and luxurious surroundings for large families, groups or couples. We have a collection of 6 villas, managed from our on-site office by a dedicated 16-strong team of staff. We are a fully-licensed resort (hotel licence 70/2560).

This was our family home from when we completed the project of 4 houses in 2008 until July 2019, when we relocate to Portugal for our sons' education. We LOVE our house and have spent a great deal of time replacing all furniture and re-decorating. It differs from our other Baan Santhiya Villas in that: 1. It has an extension of the open plan kitchen / living area (air conditioned), 2. The swimming pool has a 'jacuzzi' bench and waterfall. 
Included in the price, you get 2 round-trip tuk-tuk transfers PER DAY to the beachfront in the daytime (200 baht per trip charge at night-time). We have a total of 6 villas in our small quiet side-street. 24 hour security + CCTV. Breakfast can be cooked and served in the villa - Continental breakfast @ 150 baht per person & American breakfast @ 250 Baht per person.

You will have the entire villa to yourselves - 3 bedrooms, open plan kitchen, living area and 6x3m pool with sunloungers. There is parking for 2 cars + motorbikes.

Our office is open from 8am-7pm daily, where you can pop in for local information, to book a tour or get some restaurant recommendations.
You can always keep in touch with our friendly reception staff via phone app messages who will answer any questions you have or order Tuk-Tuk trips for you.

The villas are in a quiet side-street in the Nathai area of Aonang. A few minutes walk away, you will find 2 minimarts, Talay Bar and Restaurant, which serves Thai and Western food, and Hot Dog & Cold Cat Bakery
**UPDATE - there is now an excellent new Thai restaurant ''Yim Restaurant & Cafe'' just 2 minutes' walk from the villas open 11am-10pm daily

We are only 6-7 minutes drive away from the beach but our free tuk-tuk service. After 18:00, there is a 200 baht per trip charge (total for the vehicle)
Airport transfers cost 750 baht total for a private minibus. The trip takes about 30 minutes
We have a range of vehicles available with drivers for trips further afield - just ask us for more details.

The villas are in a quiet side-street in the Nathai area of Aonang. A few minutes walk away, you will find 2 minimarts, Talay Bar and Restaurant, which serves Thai and Western food, and Hot Dog & Cold Cat Bakery
**UPDATE - there is now an excellent new Thai restaurant ''Yim Restaurant & Cafe'' just 2 minutes' walk from the villas open 11am-10pm daily**
There is a great French bakery ''Hot Dog and Cold Cat'' about 7 minutes' walk away.
There are 2 supermarkets in Aonang (only 3 minutes' from the villa with our tuk-tuk service) - Lotus and Makro. Fresh markets also set up daily in varying locations, and the best seafood market is in Krabi Town VERY early in the morning!
Aonang has a vast array of restaurants, street food stalls and bars.
Our recommended restaurants include:
Hilltop, Ruen Thip, Carnivore, Reeve Beach Club, and A-One

Download the FoodPanda and Grab apps for a wide range of food delivery options to the villa
sectionedDescription/houseRules: - We kindly request that guests keep the noise down after 22:00 in respect for other villas

name: Villa Lotus Krabi big private pool
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Free airport pick up + grocery welcome pack!
Luxury villa 150 sq m living space on 2400 sq m of private land. 
Secure gated property with all the modern conveniences expected of a luxury villa. 12mx4m  salt pool with 3 spa jets is  the main feature of the outdoor garden

Spacious luxury villa, 150 square metres of living space on 2400 square metres of private land. Secure gated property with all the modern conveniences expected of a luxury villa. 
The master bedroom has an en-suite outdoor bali style shower bathroom plus sliding door access to the terrace and pool area. An 12*4 metre salt chlorinated swimming pool is the main feature of the outdoor space bordered by large palm tress. Bedrooms have air-conditioning and there is a separate 2nd shower room. The kitchen is a large open plan feature, with breakfast bar. Dining table and lounge seating all have views to the swimming pool with large sliding door access. Wi-fi, smart TV package, linen and daily housekeeping is including in the rate.
Villa Lotus is perfect for friends or family to enjoy a wonderful vacation. When you book 6 nights in high season you get an extra night for free. All bookings receive complimentary groceries of milk, eggs, bread and juice along with a fresh fruit basket.

The villa is private for your sole vacation needs.

A complimentary airport collection is offered from Krabi International so you arrive safely. A host will check you in and provide necessary information.

Ao Nammao is a small fishing village, 30 minutes drive from Krabi International airport. A complimentary one way pick-up from Krabi airport is included in the price.
The area has a quiet beach, shops, ATM's and a local market for fresh fruit and vegetables and Authentic Thai food. There is also horse riding facilities, Thai cooking schools, fishing, places to dine out and to enjoy massages and other spa options..

We are able to arrange a taxi service or if you wish private car hire or motorcycle hire. 
Proximity :- 
Family Mart supermarket is 5 min drive 
Ao Nam Mao Beach 5 min drive 
Restaurants 5 min drive ATM 5 min drive 
Local Market 5 min drive

Villa Lotus is situated within close proximity to the shopping and dining district of Ao Nang and the stunning area of Railay beach , Noppharat Thara Bay with its expansive beaches.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Smoking is permitted in the outdoor spaces and not inside the villa.

name: Sea Smile pool villa KRABI Klong Muang Beach
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
ผ่อนคลายกันพร้อมหน้าในที่พักแสนสงบ

Sea Smile Pool Villa is a private pool villa located at Klong Muang. From the villa to the Klong Muang beach , it takes 4 minutes by car or scooter ,and 15-20 minutes by walking. There are two bedrooms, two bathrooms, one kitchen, one living room. For the first bedroom, there are two beds. And for the second bedroom, there are 5 single beds and 1 double bed. Each of them has the bathroom inside. In front of the villa has green view. The first floor is only for the guests. There’s also roaster provided for our guests to make BBQ too. There is 7/11 near the villa about 5 minutes by walking. For the nearest attractions, there are many beaches nearby, such as Klong Muang Beach, Koh Kwang beach, Tub Kek beach. Also there is a famous place for hiking which is called Dragon Crest mountain (16 minutes by scooter or car). On the top of the mountain, there is breathtaking views of nature of KRABI and there is small waterfalls on the left side along the walkway.

📍Grocery store 
- 7/11 ( 5 minutes by walking )
- Local market opened on Monday and Friday ( 1 minutes by walking )
- Local market opened on Tuesday and Sunday ( 8 minutes by walking)

📍Attractions 
- Klong Muang Beach ( 5 minutes by car and scooter, or 15-19 minutes by walking )
- Koh Kwang beach ( 7 minutes by car, scooter, 3.9 Kilometers)
- Tub Kek beach  ( 10 minutes by car and  scooter, 6.9 Kilometers) 
- Dragon Crest mountain ( 16 minutes by car and scooter, 9 kilometers)

📍Restaurant and cafe 
- The Boat Coffee Cafe ( 2 minutes by car and scooter or 11 minutes by walking , 1.1 kilometers)
- Barlibar on Sun Set ( 3 minutes by car and scooter or 14 minutes by walking, 1.1 kilometers)
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
-If the guests cancel after checking in and stay one night already, we will not pay for any refund.
-If there is something broken, the guests have to pay for it.
-Please do the dishes before leaving 
-Before leaving, please check your belongings everywhere and many time
-If guest forget belongings, we will assist guests with returning. But for the payment of shipping fee, guest have to pay for it.
-No Pork 
-No alcohol

name: Villa Baan Anna
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Cool, contemporary style, with stunning mountain views

This stylish modern villa is situated in a large walled compound with one neighboring property, Villa Lalle, across the driveway (both villas may be rented together for large groups).

The architecture maximises space and natural light, with a large central living space bordered by windows on three sides that opens the area up to the garden, and a huge column-less verandah and pool deck.

A personal, English-speaking concierge will welcome you upon arrival and act as your villa manager for the duration of your stay. Your villa manager is on-call to answer any queries that you may have and is contactable via a pre-paid villa mobile phone. The villa manager can dispense a full range of services from booking fun excursions to recommending a great Krabi restaurant.

The villa is located in a quiet residential area in the village of Klong Haeng, less than 3km from the beach; guests may avail the unlimited local tuk-tuk service with FREE WiFi to get around the local area, for a reasonable daily fee, or guests may decide to take advantage of the optional transport services provided by Krabi Riviera.

The villa manager can dispense a full range of services from booking fun excursions to recommending a great Krabi restaurant.

name: Private Pool Villa in Aonang for family & friends1
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Exclusive "Private Pool Villa"  our villa is  clean, good equipped, great pool, comfortable beds, and plenty of room to relax. The location is quiet and with mountain view.
To go out with scooters everywhere within easy reach.

Our outstanding customer support is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.  Service channels: Phone , email, and online chat

All the picture are real without photoshop

This will naturally become your favorite place to enjoy your special times with family & friends.

The main house has a spacious open plan design surrounded by windows and sliding glass doors creating a light and bright living environment. that open up to a view of the pool & artificial waterfall.

Set around a well equipped kitchen pantry are a dining area and lounge with a large widescreen smart TV , Playstation3  and comfy sofas. Along with high speed internet wi-fi connection and full air conditioning throughout.

Step outside of the main living room at the rear of the house onto a decking area complete with private 12m x 3m swimming pool , extra kids pool ,  jacuzzi  in the pool , sun loungers , outdoor sofa , poolside shower and outdoor toilet. 

There is also a outdoor lounge & BBQ area with  “Smart Speaker Ceiling” you can connect to bluetooth via smartphone to enjoy your songs around the pool.

Plese visited our second villa on this page  https://th.airbnb.com/rooms/33901766
may be another choice for you

The villa's 3 bedrooms

The first bedroom  (Padcharin) come with a view of the artificial waterfall  has a king size bed ,the rooms are equipped with air conditioning , desk , flat-screen smart TV , hair dryer and a private bathroom.

A second bedroom (Chutima) with a view of pool has a king size bed and 1 single bed ,
the rooms are equipped with air conditioning , desk , flat-screen smart TV , hair dryer , a private bathroom and ample storage space

The separate guest bungalow (Warin)  also with a view of pool, has a king size bed , 1 single bed and Bunk Bed the rooms are equipped with air conditioning , desk , flat-screen smart TV , hair dryer , a private bathroom and ample storage space.

Rear of the bungalow area has a well equipped kitchen , washing machine.

Entertainment in our Villa!!!

"We have a international TV channels and also "NETFLIX" in all rooms.

Rai Italia
BVN Holland
TV5 monde , France24
DW German
NHK Japan
Sun TV , Xing Kong , Channel V , TDM Macau , TVB News China
Dubai inter , Dubai Sport
Al Jazeera
RT Today ,RTP , RTR Planeta , 8 Kanal  Russia
B4U Movies India
Go to Luxe TV ,  Cuba international

Smart TV in all room!!!

With the most popular smart TV feature is without doubt the ability to access 'video on demand' services. These range from free services like YouTube and Vimeo - handy for watching music videos, movie trailers, or cute cat videos.

Playstation 3  ,  DVD player , Free Wifi  with high speed internet in all area.

Safety system in the villa!!!

We use water filter system at the villa  to make clean and clear water for you.

In case the water does not flow. We still having a saving tank (2000 Liter) with pump at the villa will allow us to reserve water.

In case of power failure. We have 2 of emergency light to stand by in the living room and outdoor BBQ area.

Slide window and Doors in all bed room are with fly screens protection.

Amenitie:
Private pool 
Air conditioner in all areas of the house
Baby stroller
Baby high chair
Baby crib 
Amenities for bathroom
Personal safe 
Flat screen Smart TV 
Cable TV  with   international channel!!!  
Playstation 3
DVD player
Free Wifi  with high speed internet in all area
Electric fans 
Bluetooth speaker at BBQ lounge
Fully equipped kitchen 
Electric rice cooker
Microwave oven
Blender
Toaster
Electric hot water kettle 
2 Refrigerator with freezer.
Barbecue grill
Washing Machine 
Scales for weighing your suitcases to make sure not overload!!!


Complimentary fruit on welcome.
Complimentary coffee and tea
Complimentary drinking water

Private parking for car or motorbike.

Our phone mobile or WhatsApp is available 24 hours daily, where you can pop in for local information, to book a special Tours!  (with good service and quality)  or get some nice restaurant recommendations.

Our warmly and friendly services ensure a pleasant stay for guests and atmosphere of total peace and harmony

We speaking :  English , Deutsch and Thai.

Set back 400m from the main road, the villa is in a quiet zone, a short drive from Ao Nang and its beaches, and 15 minutes from Krabi town. Everywhere is within easy reach by bike, scooter, or car, including a market and supermarket 5 minutes away.

It is very easily from our villa to go everywhere.
Two  bicycles are available for rent cost 100 THB per bike / per day
You can rent a motorbike it cost 250 THB per Day 
or just rent a Car cost 1,200 THB per Day.
We have Private parking for car or motorbike.

"Tuk Tuk" Taxi   to Aonang Beach cost only 250THB per way per car.

Taxi service to Krabi  airport cost 600 THB per car.

Suitable for children (2-12 years) 
Suitable for infants (under 2 years) 
Not suitable for pets 
No smoking in the house and in a swimming pool.
Check-in: Anytime after 2PM
Check- out  12:00

name: Barefoot Waterfall  - Three bed Luxury Pool Villa
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This Brand New Luxury 3 bedroom private pool villa sleeps 8 guests, located in the quite countryside
3 aircon bedrooms, open plan living room and fully fitted kitchen area surround  the 8mx4m salt water pool. High speed internet throughout.
A roofed sala with comfy seating, bar & BBQ is perfect for lounging next to the pool. 
Barefoot Waterfall Villa is 4km from Aonang Beach, 8 km from Klong Muang beach making it the perfect location for a Krabi holiday. 
Ideal for families or groups of friends.

Surrounded by tropical palms and plantation, this is a quiet and secluded taste of paradise. 

A  New Luxury 3 bedroom pool villa in a quiet countryside location.  

30 Minutes from Krabi Airport
5 minutes from Aonang Beach

The sophisticated living area is beautifully decorated with a dark themed kitchen and breakfast bar area to give a nice cool atmosphere. Big ceiling fans ensure a cooling breeze any time of day or night. A big comfortable sofa and chairs are arranged in front of a large flatscreen smart tv with free Netflix and Amazon Prime accounts giving you a wide choice of music and video entertainment. 

The fully equipped kitchen is fitted with all the essentials including oven, cooktop, microwave, toaster, coffee maker and all the pots, pans and utensils you will need to cook a delicious 5 course dinner (or a quick breakfast before going to the beach)

From the living area pass through glass sliding doors to a  roofed Sala with comfortable outdoor sofa and chairs right next to the large 8x4m saltwater tiled swimming pool. A waterfall feature next to the pool provides an atmospheric ambiance. Tropical planting around the outdoor area provides a real feeling of Tropical Thailand. A long bar with stools is the perfect place to enjoy an evening meal or BBQ under the stars.

All doors and windows have screens to let the air in and the bugs out.

Sunshine or rain, there is a place to sit and relax.

Bedrooms
The 3 air conditioned bedrooms each with a private bathroom all open up to the pool terrace so you can jump straight out of bed into the pool!

The master bedroom has a romantic 4 poster bed and is decorated stylishly. The bedroom has a private shower room with high quality fixtures and fittings.

Bedroom 2 has a queen sized bed and a private shower room.

Bedroom 3 has 2 queen sized beds and a private bathroom.

All the bedrooms have high quality mattresses and bed linen to ensure a great nights sleep. All bedrooms are also air conditioned and also have high ceilings with ceiling fans.

Everything in the villa has been designed to be easy to use, within 5 minutes you will know and love this villa.

Other Information
The villa is equipped with CCTV security for your security. Cameras are pointed at the exterior gate and walls only. The villa and pool areas are not covered by the cameras allowing you to enjoy the villa, pool and grounds in complete privacy.

The Villa is fully enclosed within an exterior wall with a gate on the entrance. There is a Private secure car parking place for exclusive use of the villa.

We also offer some fresh seasonal fruit on arrival as a welcome gift.

There are a few very good restaurants in walking distance, but to explore the area, we do recommend renting some personal transport. Most people rent motorbikes or a car, just let us know if you need any details.

Our booking service can also offer in-house catering, transport, car and motorbike rental, restaurant recommendations and reservations, in house massage and all local tours and activities at a great price, just ask and we can provide all the information you need to create a really special holiday. A guest manual is inside the house with all the information you need.

Barefoot Breeze Villa is the perfect base for a memorable holiday.

During your stay you will be able to call us to ask any questions about the villa, the area or any of the tours or activities on offer in the area. 

Our house manager has been running a tour agency in Krabi for over ten years so will be able to help you plan and book any of the many trips and activities that are available in the local area. Some of the options: Scuba diving, private boat trips to blissful Islands, kayaking in the mangrove forests, rock climbing at the famous Railay Beach, horse riding and even thai cookery courses.

Krabi is world famous for its coastline and clear blue waters and soft sand beaches. Less well known are some of the mainland beaches and inland attractions, temples and National Parks. Feel free to ask advice at any time.

The villa is located in a secure small compound in the village of Nateen.

Nateen is a nice quiet location on the edge of bustling Aonang on a 2 lane road that links Aonang to Klong Muang, with its fantastic beach. The area is rural and quiet and surrounded by palm and rubber plantation.

There are a few eating options and small local shops within walking distance or get a taxi to one of the many fabulous restaurants in and around the area.

Barefoot Villas are located in a countryside village on the edge of Aonang. There are a few very local streetfood options and kiosks selling drinks and snacks. The nearest supermarket is about 3km from the villa.

Taxis in Aonang are quite expensive, so, Its best to have some personal transportation while staying at Barefoot Villas, mostly people rent motorbikes or a car to make the most of all the beautiful places that are in the area. We can help you to find the right option.

Driving a bike or car around Krabi is one of the real pleasures of the area, the roads are quiet and its very easy to find your way around. There are so many places fantastic places to explore.

A cleaner will come every 5th day to clean through the villa and change towels and sheets (stays 6 nights and longer).
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- No Smoking allowed in the house or bedrooms.  Smoking allowed on the outside terrace.
- Please note that charging of electric vehicles is not permitted.
- Please do not adjust or cover the CCTV cameras
- Children must be supervised in the pool at all times.
- Indoor and outdoor sofas and chairs are covered in high quality fabrics, do not use these while wet from the pool or sun oil. Marks caused by water,  suntan lotion or oil will be charged for.
- No illegal activities on the premises.
- Bugs are a part of life in Thailand, its best to shut the doors to the bedrooms at about 4:00pm to keep mosquitos out. We also provide a pole net to make scooping bugs out of the pool easier.
- Air conditioners must be switched off when not in the bedrooms.
- Only toilet tissue can be flushed down the toilets
- Only guests checked in can stay overnight in the villa
- A 5000thb deposit in cash will be required at check in. This will be returned at checkout minus any amount for lost or damaged items.

Please treat our villas with care and respect so that others who come after you may enjoy the villa as well, our Villas are available for letting on the understanding that the property and all contents will be in place and left in an acceptable clean and tidy condition at the time of checkout and all that all personal litter put in the bins provided.
sectionedDescription/interaction:
During your stay you will be able to call us to ask any questions about the villa, the area or any of the tours or activities on offer in the area. 

Our house manager has been running a tour agency in Krabi for over ten years so will be able to help you plan and book any of the many trips and activities that are available in the local area. Some of the options: Scuba diving, private boat trips to blissful Islands, kayaking in the mangrove forests, rock climbing at the famous Railay Beach, horse riding and even thai cookery courses.

Krabi is world famous for its coastline and clear blue waters and soft sand beaches. Less well known are some of the mainland beaches and inland attractions, temples and National Parks. Feel free to ask advice at any time.

sectionedDescription/description:
Combines the ambience of a traditional Thai resort with contemporary standards of convenience and luxury. We are Phi Phi Island's private paradise and your ultimate back to nature island getaway adventure. Our resort is perfectly situated on Phi Phi don and can be found between Phi Phi town and long beach, both of which are in easy walking distance but yet far enough away to offer you a place to relax and reinvigorate in tranquillity settings.

- 5 minutes walk to Long Beach
- 25 minutes walk to Ton Sai pier
- Restaurant which serves complimentary breakfast every morning
- Free Wifi (wifi is not stable as it depends on island connection service)

We offer "free" pick up and drop off services by for "checking in and out" 
Additional trip to town by taxi boat is 100 baht per person per trip.

Checking in instruction
- Once you arrived at the pier please look for out stuff holding a sign Viking Nature resort. We will bring you to the resort for checking in with a long boat.

*Note* Free shuttle service for checking in and out is only available from 9am - 5pm

New complex Lux Family Villas is located in quiet and green area in 10 minutes drive from Ao Nang beach. The hotel consists of 21 cozy individual villas (66-250 sq. m).  Complex has a big swimming pool with a kids zone and outside playground. About 30 local restaurants provide fast delivery of Thai, Asia, European dishes not over than 25-45 minutes. 
Get more available dates in ROOF JACUZZI AND PRIVATE POOL 3BEDROOM VILLA LUX1

This villa has a big private pool and a garden with BBQ equipment.  Three bedrooms, three bathrooms, kitchen with all the essential equipment, big living room and terrace. All houses have air-conditioners, LCD televisions, safes and dressing-tables. On request is possible to order extra beds and baby coats. Villa of this type has second floor with rooftop terrace and outside hot jacuzzi under the opened sky.
Free WiFi internet is available on all territory of the Complex. In every house there is a telephone to communicate with the reception.

Hotel-resort located:
10 minutes drive from Aonang Beach
15 minutes by taxi from Noparatara Pear
30 minutes by taxi from Krabi International Airport
2 hours by taxi from Phuket International Airport
There is the best accommodation for the families with a children and for a big companies.

sectionedDescription/description:
Opened in Dec 2021, our eco-friendly pool villa in Krabi blends comfort and nature. Fully air-conditioned rooms with constant natural ventilation provide a unique stay. Located near Lotus's supermarket and restaurants, convenience is at your fingertips. The villa comprises three bedrooms, three bathrooms, and an extra poolside toilet. Enjoy our outdoor pool and tranquil indoor green area for a remarkable experience.

Our villa comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests within its three fully air-conditioned bedrooms. For your convenience, we offer three bathrooms and an additional toilet located adjacent to the outdoor swimming pool.

The highlight of our property is the inviting outdoor swimming pool, alongside a soothing small fountain, contributing to the peaceful atmosphere of the villa. Enjoy the blend of modern living and natural elements during your stay.

1. Arrive at your designated accommodation.

2. Locate the digital door lock, usually situated on the front door.

3. Enter the passcode provided to you in our prior communication. Make sure to press each button clearly and check the code before pressing enter.

4. Upon successful code entry, the door will unlock, allowing you access to the property.

IMPORTANT: Do not share your passcode with anyone. If you forget the passcode or have any issues, please contact our staff immediately. Your security is our priority.

Enjoy your stay!

NOTE: For your security, the passcode will expire upon your checkout. Make sure to have all your belongings with you before you leave.

Thank you for choosing our property for your stay."

Keypad
Please send us images of your passport and date of entry and (intend to) exit Thailand
OR
fill in detail of your personal information for immigration 

Then we'll send you the passcode to enter the villa.

name: Phukao Villa - Sea view, walking distance to beach
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
My place is close to great views, art and culture, and restaurants and dining. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

Baan PhuKhao Villa is located in the Klong Muang Beach area, the family friendly and upmarket resort area of Krabi, where most luxury resorts can be found, such as the Ritz-Carlton Phulay Bay, Dusit Thani and Sofitel.
 
The Villa is set peacefully back from the main road, with access is up a private road on the hillside, offering amazing & beautiful views overlooking the clear blue waters of the Andaman Sea, whilst surrounded by the lush green mountains of the local National Park. Baan PhuKhao Villa is a place to relax and enjoy privacy away from the hustle and bustle of the other tourist areas, only 5 minutes from Klong Muang beach, restaurants, bars and shops.
 
That Private Luxury Pool Villa is available as 2 bedrooms, ranging from 240 m2 of covered living space, with a private infinity pool with sea views. The Villa is one storey boasting a modern spacious design, offering an open plan living/entertainment area, dining area and kitchen area. The kitchen is fully fitted and well equipped. There is free Wi-Fi throughout the Villa. All bedrooms are comfortably decorated offering a selection of King-size and twin bed, all en-suite with luxury bathrooms.
 
Baan PhuKhao Villa is close to all the local attractions, including beaches, golf course, water sports and the local island group of Koh Hong. These islands can be reached by a short boat ride, either by the local Thai long tail boats or speed boat. On the islands you will find tropical beaches where you can sunbathe, swim & snorkel, or explore the wonders of a stunning blue lagoon in the middle of one of the islands during hide tide.
 
In summary Baan PhuKhao Villa offer the best of what Krabi can offer, a peaceful & luxury setting, just a stone throw from all the local attractions.
 
Only 35 min. by car from Krabi airport, 25 min. from Krabitown and 15 min. from Ao Nang beach.

Private swimming pool with sea views
Air-conditioned bedrooms & living rooms
Fully-equipped kitchen for cooking and dining
High speed ADSL with wireless network
Television with DVD players and satellite
Personal safe
Pool chair with pool towels
Amenities for the bathroom
Hair dryer
Baby crib & high chair
Car & motorcycle hire

A personal, English-speaking concierge will welcome you upon arrival and act as your villa manager for the duration of your stay. Your villa manager is on-call to answer any queries that you may have and is contactable via a pre-paid villa mobile phone. The villa manager can dispense a full range of services from booking fun excursions to recommending a great Krabi restaurant.

Close to Dusit Thani Resort. One of the nicest white sandy beach in Krabi.

Krabi Town 1,200 Baht within 3 hours more than 3 hours is at 200 Baht / hour.
All day trip to Krabi tourist area 3,500 Baht within 8 hours

Krabi Airport transfers (one way) 800 THB
Phuket Airport transfer (one way) 3,500 THB
Unlimited taxi service within Ao Nang from 9am to 10pm (carry up to 10 - 12 people) 1,000 THB per day
Complimentary welcome drink and fruit basket
Complimentary coffee and tea
Complimentary drinking water and ice
Daily maid cleaning
Villa mobile phone

In-villa personal Thai chef (additional charge)
Laundry service (additional charge)

In-villa massage and beauty services (additional charge)
In-villa personal Thai chef (additional charge)
Laundry service (additional charge)
sectionedDescription/space:
Baan PhuKhao Villa is located in the Klong Muang Beach area, the family friendly and upmarket resort area of Krabi, where most luxury resorts can be found, such as the Ritz-Carlton Phulay Bay, Dusit Thani and Sofitel.
 
The Villa is set peacefully back from the main road, with access is up a private road on the hillside, offering amazing & beautiful views overlooking the clear blue waters of the Andaman Sea, whilst surrounded by the lush green mountains of the local National Park. Baan PhuKhao Villa is a place to relax and enjoy privacy away from the hustle and bustle of the other tourist areas, only 5 minutes from Klong Muang beach, restaurants, bars and shops.
 
That Private Luxury Pool Villa is available as 2 bedrooms, ranging from 240 m2 of covered living space, with a private infinity pool with sea views. The Villa is one storey boasting a modern spacious design, offering an open plan living/entertainment area, dining area and kitchen area. The kitchen is fully fitted and well equipped. There is free Wi-Fi throughout the Villa. All bedrooms are comfortably decorated offering a selection of King-size and twin bed, all en-suite with luxury bathrooms.
 
Baan PhuKhao Villa is close to all the local attractions, including beaches, golf course, water sports and the local island group of Koh Hong. These islands can be reached by a short boat ride, either by the local Thai long tail boats or speed boat. On the islands you will find tropical beaches where you can sunbathe, swim & snorkel, or explore the wonders of a stunning blue lagoon in the middle of one of the islands during hide tide.
 
In summary Baan PhuKhao Villa offer the best of what Krabi can offer, a peaceful & luxury setting, just a stone throw from all the local attractions.
 
Only 35 min. by car from Krabi airport, 25 min. from Krabitown and 15 min. from Ao Nang beach.
sectionedDescription/summary: My place is close to great views, art and culture, and restaurants and dining. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

name: Melina's Beachfront Bungalows
address: Tambon Khao Thong, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 9AM - 9PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Uniquely situated right on the beach, Melina's Bungalows is a very secluded private residence far away from the maddening crowds. Comprising of 2 single Bungalows and our 'Family' Bungalow that boasts 2 bedrooms, 3 beds and a living area, you are guaranteed a peaceful stay on our 5000 sq/m property.  With nothing but the sound of tropical birds and the wind rustling through leaves, eat fabulous local Thai food and enjoy a cool refreshing drink right on the beach......Welcome.

Great for kids and Adults alike as you can relax while the kids run around un hindered in our large secure gardens. Local fresh seafood is also available to order but only when caught the night before guaranteeing its freshness. We have a car for hire if needed and we can also provide a shuttle into Krabi Town or Ao Nang which are only 30 minutes away, for a small fee.

All common area's of the property is accessible to all guests.....pool, restaurant, gardens, beach, laundry.

As owners, if we are at the property, we love to sit down with our guests and share a cold drink. If not we are accessible by phone directly or through one of our staff's phones. The manager and or cook are always more than happy to call us which any problems they themselves cannot deal with directly.

Local mini marts are available on the main road 300 meters from our property, where basic amenities snacks can be bought. Within 2 km there is several good restaurants and cafe's, the closest only 600m away. There is also a beautiful river only 1.5km away where the magnificent gorges and lagoons of its enclosed islands, can be explored by Sea Kayak.

Local Songtaews(taxi) can be caught for a very small fee into town or we can organise transport through our own car or outside van for a fee.

We do not have credit card facilities so please ensure cash is obtained before arrival. There is an ATM machine available locally but always a good idea to arrive with some cash.

name: Stylish 5 Bedroom Pool Villa
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Antonia - Stylish luxury accommodation in Krabi near Aonang.

Set in quiet countryside just 30 minutes from Krabi airport, 15 minutes from Klong Muang and Aonang Beaches, the villa really is impressive in every way.

The main villa has three spacious bedrooms each with a private bathroom for 6 guests. A separate two bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment provides additional space for 4 guests.

Come and relax at Villa Antonia!

Villa Antonia has been designed to combine the best of Thai modern architecture with luxury International Interior design. The villa is all on the ground floor and is air conditioned throughout.

The villa is located down a small no through road in a secure gated and walled area containing just this villa and one other villa providing great privacy and security.

Busy Aonang with all its lively nightlife and restaurants is a short 10 minute drive away. Idyllic Klong Muang Beach is also 15 minute drive from the villa.

The property has two buildings: the main villa and a separate 2 bedroom guest villa just a few meters apart. There is also a bamboo tower sala for exclusive use of guests, perfect for yoga or a quiet space for getting creative.

THE ENTRANCE
Enter through the gates into the compound and driveway to find the villa set in tropical gardens planted with all varieties of palms, trees and flowering bushes. There is a large parking area, plenty for several cars for the exclusive use of the villa. The main villa and the guest villa are accessed directly from the parking area.

THE MAIN VILLA
Antique Thai wooden doors provide an immediate wow factor as you enter into the main villa. 

LIVING AREA
The main living area has a continuous white plastered floor that runs unbroken throughout the indoor and outdoor space and is fully decorated in shades of white to provide a unique and truly spectacular space.

The large area has a big comfortable sofa, a huge solid wood dining table and a fully fitted kitchen with all amenities.

For entertainment, a smart tv with netflix account are provided.

WINDOWS
One full wall of this space is fitted with giant sliding windows allowing the light to flood in and provide a view of the outside terrace and swimming pool and lush gardens beyond. 

BEDROOMS
The main villa has three large bedrooms, each with private spacious and well equipped bathroom, double bed, wardrobe and desk. All bedrooms are air conditioned and also have ceiling fans. Mattresses are high quality and super comfortable.

AIR-CONDITIOING
The villa has built in air conditioning in all areas. The villa is offered with bedroom air-conditioning included in the price. Air-conditioning in the main living space can be used at an additional cost (there is a separate electricity meter for the living room air-conditioning).

GUEST HOUSE
The separate guest apartment has a good sized open plan living space with a small kitchenette. A spacious bathroom is shared by the bedrooms. The bedrooms are both air conditioned and also have ceiling fans. The living area has a comfortable sofa and a netflix enabled smart tv.

A highchair and baby cot with bed lined is provided.

OUTSIDE

Accesses through the sliding windows in the main villa is the big terrace area with a comfortable roofed seating area, outdoor dining table and gas BBQ.

The pool itself is 10 meters by 4 meters with a large shallow area perfect for young kids (or just lounging in). The pool is salt water filtered and crystal clean.

Around the pool are some sun loungers.

OTHER SERVICES

There is also a nespresso pod coffee machine provided, but pods for the machine are not provided. If you would like to use it, please bring your own pods, just let us know if you need details.

The pool is cleaned once per week and a gardener will come once per week. A pool net is provided for guests to remove any leaves or bugs that find there way into the pool between cleans.

Please feel free to ask any questions.

Guests have full access to the full extent of the property. There is the main villa with pool, the separate guest apartment, the swimming pool and garden. The guests also have exclusive use of a private bamboo sala, a perfect place to meditate, read or just simply relax and enjoy the scenery.

The villa is located in countryside about 5km from Aonang within easy reach of Klong Muang and Aonang beaches. 
The area is perfectly peaceful with a small river at the end of the tropical garden and big tropical garden for your enjoyment.
There is a small local fresh market 2 days a week within walking distance from the villa.

We recommend renting cars or scooters to make the most of all the wonderful places that are in easy driving distance from the villa. Just let us know and we can give you the latest information on availability and prices.

Taxi services are available in the area and Grab does also operate in the area.

Most local tour and activity companies will pick up from the villa.

Please note that Living room air conditioning is not included in the price. There is a separate electricity meter in the property, so, if guests decide to use it, they can keep an eye on the cost. We will charge for any use at the checkout. The charge is made at actual cost.

The walled area is shared with one other villa. The two villas are a good distance apart and are separated by a small line of trees. Guests should respect the space of the other villa.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- The villa can not be used for parties.
- No Smoking allowed in the house or bedrooms.  Smoking allowed outside using ashtrays provided.
- Please respect neighbors and keep noise down after 10pm
- The gardens of the villa are not separated from the neighbours garden. Guests should remain within the Villa Antonia area.
- Children must be supervised in the pool at all times.
- The outside and inside chairs and sofas are covered in high quality fabric. Please do not use when very wet or using lotions or oils. Please use the pool shower provided.
- Bugs are a part of life in Thailand, its best to shut the doors to the bedrooms from about 4:00pm to about 8pm to keep mosquitos out. 
- The pool is cleaned once per week, a net is provided for guests to remove leaves or bugs floating in the pool.
- Air conditioners must be switched off when not in the bedrooms.
- Only toilet tissue can be flushed down the toilets
- Only guests checked in can stay overnight in the villa
- Before check out, guests will,  put all rubbish into the bins from around the house, clean and put all kitchen ware into the kitchen area and put all towels into the correct rooms. Any used towels, please just put on the bedroom floors. Any furniture that has been moved, please put back into the correct positions.
-The BBQ is free for guests to use, but do please clean the BBQ top and surround and ensure all burnt food bits are placed in the bin. If the BBQ is used, we will charge an extra 300thb for cleaning.
- A 5000thb deposit in cash will be required at check in. This will be returned at checkout minus any amount for lost and damaged items or any extra cleaning required if the villa is left in a very unclean state.
- Living room air-conditioning electricity usage  will be noted at checkout and electricity cost will be deducted from deposit (only for living room aircon)
- Please note that pool toys are not provided.
Please treat our villas with care and respect so that others who come after you may enjoy the villa as well, our Villa is available for letting on the understanding that the property and all contents will be in place and left in an acceptable clean and tidy condition at the time of checkout and that all personal litter is put in the bins provided.

There is a small local fresh market 2 days a week within walking distance from the villa.

sectionedDescription/summary:
Villa Antonia - Stylish luxury accommodation in Krabi near Aonang.

Set in quiet countryside just 30 minutes from Krabi airport, 15 minutes from Klong Muang and Aonang Beaches, the villa really is impressive in every way.

The main villa has three spacious bedrooms each with a private bathroom for 6 guests. A separate two bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment provides additional space for 4 guests.

Come and relax at Villa Antonia!
sectionedDescription/transit:
We recommend renting cars or scooters to make the most of all the wonderful places that are in easy driving distance from the villa. Just let us know and we can give you the latest information on availability and prices.

Taxi services are available in the area and Grab does also operate in the area.

Most local tour and activity companies will pick up from the villa.

name: Seaview Cabin Club Complex
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is flexible and check out by 2PM
sectionedDescription/description:
The Seaview Cabin Complex consists of 3 buildings, all next to each other, each building offers a separate living space with a bedroom, bathroom and living areas. The whole complex is spread out over 1,400 Sq. meters of land and enjoys spectacular views of the sun setting over the horizon. The beach is a short 5 minute walk from the property and there are numerous high end restaurants within a 3 minute walk from the front door. Motorbikes can be rented at the property and taxi's can be arranged.

Each building is a freestanding structure making the whole complex basically to 3 separate villas, each with it's own private kitchen, living room and bedroom. the units are as follows:
Cabin 1 - 1 bed/1 bath private building
Cabin 2&3 - connected villas 2 bed/2 bath
Cabin 4 - 1bed/1bath free standing cabin
The grounds throughout the Cabin Club Complex have been well planted with a wide range of tropical, local plants and flowers making the entire area bright and colourful.

The whole cabin complex faces due West offering up some of the best sunset sea views you can ask for in Ao Nang.

You will have full access to the entire area inside the wall as your private grounds. In total the land area is around 1,400Sq. meters and there are 3 buildings throughout the complex.

My villa manager Swen will meet you at check in and give you all the information you need when enter the property, he can also help arrange a number of excursions in the area, a guest favourite is the private longtail boat trip to Koh Hong, but there are many other excursions Swen can arrange for you such as a private jungle tour to the emerald pool and hot springs. After initial check in you will be left with a phone and local SIM card so getting in touch with either myself or Swen is as easy as picking up the phone.

The Seaview Cabin Club Complex is located just a slight bit up the hill from the main town of Ao Nang below, offering stunning views of the bay and the town. It is off set from the hustle and bustle of the town so you can rest in peace and tranquility. there are a few restaurants on the hill and below

The Seaview Cabin Club Complex is stunning and truly wonderful, and you might never want to leave, but if you do we can help you with a number of options. 

We can arrange arrange taxi service 24 hours on demand, just call Swen (on the local phone provided) and we can have a taxi come get you anytime you would like. 
We can also arrange motorbikes (popular option) for you to use during your stay, they are charged at a rate of 250thb/bike/day
We can also have a car delivered to your villa for use during your stay with us. Just let us know prior and we can arrange the details on this for you

We can also arrange a number of other services to make your time with us all the better. Such tings people often order from us are:
- Private chef to come to your villa and prepare a local Thai meal.
- BBQ to be prepared and brought to your house for you to use and make your own party
- Motorbikes delivered directly to the villa (as stated below)
- local information, we always provide answers to all questions but also provide a detailed map to every group outlining areas to visit and see while your in Krabi. Our villa manager Swen will take you through a short tour of the region when you arrive.
- Airport transfer, we can easily arrange this service for your arrival, just please provide us your flight number and arrival time and we will have our Thai driver waiting at the airport for you holding a sign with your name on it. The driver charges 900thb for this service.


We provide complimentary water, coffee, creamer and sugar for you during your stay but we also stock the refrigerator with a minibar selection prior to your arrival the minbar is always fully stocked. Please see blow the information on what we carry and their relative prices below.

Coke (2)…………………………………….30/ea
Sprite (2)……………………………………30/ea
Schweppes Manao (1)..…………………….30/ea
Ginger Ale (1)…..………………………….30/ea
Fanta (1)…………………………………….30/ea
Tonic Water (1)………………………………30/ea
Soda Water (2)……………………………….20/ea
Chang (2)…………………………………….70/ea
Leo (2)………………………………………..70/ea
Singha (2)…………………………………….80/ea
Heineken (2)………………………………….80/ea
Sang Som (1)…………………………………280/ea
Smirnoff (1)……………………………………400/ea

name: Villa Galanga 3 Bedrooms Plus Cottage Room
address: ตำบล อ่าวนาง, กระบี่, Thailand
city: ตำบล อ่าวนาง
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
An Exclusive Private Pool Villa nestled in its own tropical palm plantation, enjoy special times with your Family & Friends in this Special Villa.

An Exclusive Private Pool Villa nestled in its own tropical palm plantation, enjoy special times with your Family & Friends in this Special Villa.

This is a large modern cool & spacious 3 king-size en-suite bedroom pool villa also offering a king-size en-suite bedroom cottage attached to a separate building within the villa own tropical grounds, allowing 9 Guests and one Infant to sleep comfortably. Access to the villa is by a private natural road through a shaded tropical palm plantation, only 3 km from the popular and well equipped beach resort of Ao nang, Krabi.

At Villa Galanga you are in your own tropical hideaway but at the same time only 10 minutes away from Ao nang the unspoilt well equipped beach resort, all your needs at the villa are taken care by the villa care staff to give you that extra comfort and care.

All of these extra comforts are not available in quality hotels but they are in this Quality Villa, so we invite you, your family and friends to share the Experience and enjoy your stay at Villa Galanga ".

For 1th-6th guests we will set up 3 bedrooms in main villa.
For 7th guest we will prepare 1 extra bed in main villa. 
For 8th - 9th guests we will prepare the cottage room.

The entire villa includes a private pool, BBQ and garden.

We will be waiting for greeting and welcome guests at the villa, if they have any questions or need any help they can contact us at any time. 

We will do our best for make your holidays wonderful.

After booking confirmed, we requested for the arrival details, we need prior notice so we can schedule our staff to be at the villa otherwise there could be a delay with the check in procedure.

Cleaning for every other day.

We provide the housekeeping professional team with hygienic for prepare the villa before you check in and during your stay.

We are delighted to assist you to arrange plan and pre book the trips.

24 hours stand by for phone call when guests need any help or emergency case.

We will be waiting for greeting and welcome guests at the villa, if they have any questions or need any help they can contact us at any time. 

We will do our best for make your holidays wonderful.
