name: Krabi Castaway Private Pool Villa
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Our Villa offers you a unique experience of luxury and peace in Khaothong area, Krabi. Nestled within the breezy, idyllic Andaman Coast, Phang Nga Bay. The villa is a combination of comfort,modern style and tranquil atmosphere. This special holiday 4 bedrooms villa can comfortably accommodate enough for 6-8 people. It is definitely the best get-together place either family holiday or a friends reunion.

The new villa with stunning view of Phang nga Bay.  You can enjoy staying both outdoor and indoor. Enjoy sea view in the sunny living room,  and dining area overlooking the pool.You will own large private pool and Garden. Immense living area with ceiling air-conditioning, flat-screen smart TV. In the kitchen area, we provide microwave, coffee machine, boiling water machine, Toaster, utensils and refrigerator.

Features
-Our villa have 4 bedrooms
1. Seaview Bedroom facing to Seaview at the second floor (with seaview bathtub)
2. Pool Access Bedroom facing to Seaview (no bathtub)
3. Garden Bedroom has garden view (with bathtub in the garden)
4. Bunk bed Bedroom 
- Kitchen with 8-seat dining wooden table is enough for everyone. 
- Open living room and sitting area with a sofa and smart TV with direct access to the private pool .
- Large private pool with jacuzzi seats  where you can enjoy the peace unity with nature,relax and swim +  kid pool (0.6 meter in depth )
- Free Wi-Fi access.
- BBQ grill 
- Safety box in 3 main bedrooms 
- Housekeeping from 8 AM - 5 PM 
- Private entrance to the villa with private parking space.
- Welcome seasonal fruits 
** Breakfast is 300 baht/person.

On request, we also offer a wide range of additional services.
* Taxi services
* Tours Arrangement such as Speed boat trip to Hong island, long tail boat trip to islands around or Kayak. 
* Scooter and car rental
* Babysitting & baby cot
* Massage Service
* Wedding Ceremony 
* We can also set up something special for you like marriage proposal or romantic dinner and etc.

Note: Airport transfer
*Krabi Airport Transfer is 1,000Baht for a Van one way
*Phuket Airport Transfer is 2,800 Baht for a Van one way
 
Activities and Attractions 
       You can enjoy your holiday with many activities and attractions while staying at our villa. Such as Islands tour (Hong Island, Poda Island, Dang Island,  Laolading Island, Pakbia Island or some of the small secret islands in front of our villa.) 
      Also adventure activities like Kayaking and zip line. Krabi has popular inland attractions such as Emerald  Pool, Hot spring and Tiger cave temple, Hiking to Dragon Crest Mountain.

****On the way to Krabi Castaway Villa, we will pass Makro Supermarket. Please let us know before you arrive if you want to stop there and purchase anything. :) 

Location Distances from our villa... 
Krabi Town : 27 kms. / 35 minutes.
Ao Nang : 25 kms. / 30 minutes.
Krabi Airport : 32 kms. / 40 minutes.
Thalane Beach : 3 kms. / 4 minutes by car.  Free transfer for our guests to Thalane Beach.
Thalane Pier to Koh Yao Noi: 4kms / 6 minutes.  

Anything else? Please ask!

There will be the villa lobby next to you and If you have any questions, Our staff will be glad to help. You can also send us a message through Airbnb or an email. Opposite the street is our restaurant “Khaothong Terrace Restaurant” opens everyday from 11am - 10pm. We will be around if you need any hands. Ask us for whatever you need - we strive for your happiness and satisfaction!

Please inform us if you have extra guests, we can accommodate up to 12 guests.

Ask us for whatever you need - we strive for your happiness and satisfaction!

name: 3 BDR Premium Private Pool Villa (The Haven Krabi)
address: ตำบล อ่าวนาง, กระบี่, Thailand
city: ตำบล อ่าวนาง
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 5PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
****A BRAND NEW MINIMAL POOL VILLA ****
The Haven Krabi Pool Villa 
Self Service Villa, 3-Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, King Bed, 6 Persons
This pool villa is a perfect choice for family, friends or couples traveling together. 
Features:
- 2nd-Story Terrace with limestone mountain view
- Private pool villa, Salt water
- Private BBQ area

every day 24 hours

KRABI is considered to be one of the most beautiful regions on a beautiful country. Krabi has it all, from the limestone karsts that characterize the region to world-class beaches, islands, temples, markets, nightlife and shopping, the list is seemingly endless. In Krabi, lovers of the great outdoors will find plenty of activities and points of interest to keep them occupied – waterfalls, hotsprings, national parks, elephant treks are all on offer and Krabi is also one of the world's premier destinations for rock climbing and scuba diving

name: Villa Eng Fah  Sea view, walking distance to beach
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
My place is close to art and culture, great views, and restaurants and dining. You’ll love my place because of the location, the outdoors space, and the views. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

Eng Fah Villa is located in the Klong Muang Beach area, the family friendly and upmarket resort area of Krabi, where most luxury resorts can be found, such as the Ritz-Carlton Phulay Bay, Dusit Thani and Sofitel.
 
The Villa is set peacefully back from the main road, with access is up a private road on the hillside, offering amazing & beautiful views overlooking the clear blue waters of the Andaman Sea, whilst surrounded by the lush green mountains of the local National Park. Eng Fah Villa is a place to relax and enjoy privacy away from the hustle and bustle of the other tourist areas, only 5 minutes from Klong Muang beach, restaurants, bars and shops.
 
These Private Luxury Pool Villa is available as 2 bedrooms, ranging from 240 m2 of covered living space, with a private infinity pool with sea views. The Villa is one storey boasting a modern spacious design, offering an open plan living/entertainment area, dining area and kitchen area. The kitchen is fully fitted and well equipped. There is free Wi-Fi throughout the Villa. All bedrooms are comfortably decorated offering a selection of King-size and twin bed, all en-suite with luxury bathrooms.
 
Eng Fah Villa is close to all the local attractions, including beaches, golf course, water sports and the local island group of Koh Hong. These islands can be reached by a short boat ride, either by the local Thai long tail boats or speed boat. On the islands you will find tropical beaches where you can sunbathe, swim & snorkel, or explore the wonders of a stunning blue lagoon in the middle of one of the islands during hide tide.
 
In summary Baan Lelawadee Villa offer the best of what Krabi can offer, a peaceful & luxury setting, just a stone throw from all the local attractions.
 
Only 35 min. by car from Krabi airport, 25 min. from Krabitown and 15 min. from Ao Nang beach.

Private swimming pool
Air-conditioned bedrooms & living rooms
Fully-equipped kitchen for cooking and dining
High speed ADSL with wireless network
Television with DVD players and satellite
Personal safe
Pool chair with pool towels
Amenities for the bathroom
Hair dryer
Baby crib & high chair
Car & motorcycle hire

A personal, English-speaking concierge will welcome you upon arrival and act as your villa manager for the duration of your stay. Your villa manager is on-call to answer any queries that you may have and is contactable via a pre-paid villa mobile phone. The villa manager can dispense a full range of services from booking fun excursions to recommending a great Krabi restaurant.

Close to Dusit Thani Resort. One of the nicest white sandy beach in Krabi province.

Taxi service available upon request (extra charge).
Full time on call villa manager.

Krabi Airport transfers (one way) 800 THB
Phuket Airport transfer (one way) 3,500 THB
Unlimited taxi service within Ao Nang from 9am to 10pm (carry up to 10 - 12 people) 1,000 THB per day
Complimentary welcome drink and fruit basket
Complimentary coffee and tea
Complimentary drinking water and ice
Daily maid cleaning
Villa mobile phone
In-villa massage and beauty services (additional charge)
In-villa personal Thai chef (additional charge)
Laundry service (additional charge)
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
We cannot exceed the maximum number of guests in any villa under any circumstances. We thank you for your understanding.

We are committed to providing its guests and associates with a smoke-free environment. The smoke-free villa policy has received praise from guests, and we remains committed to achieving a smoke-free environment in all of its properties.

address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
Resona Pool Villa is conveniently located on Aonang Beach, surrounded by lush greenery in a quiet and comfortable area. Relaxing in our villa you will fully enjoy a serene vacation in the absence of crowds of tourists and the exotic of Thailand. At the same time - restaurants, noisy bars, markets and supermarkets - are only a few minutes away.

Resona Pool Villa has three separate bedrooms and three private bathroom, large living room combined with a fully equipped kitchen. Total indoor leaving area is about 180 square meters include the terrace on 2 floor.  

A large 4x8 meters outdoor private pool is provided for the enjoyment of all guests, including children.

There is an outdoor BBQ area near the swimming pool.

Our villa has been designed to be a holiday home and there is everything you need for comfortable vacation. 

The fully-fitted kitchen offers a full range of cooking and food preparation equipment. With provided barbecue facilities, guests can enjoy their barbecue party at the outdoor terrace boasting the mountain views. The villa also includes air conditioning, flat-screen SMART TV.

All villas are highly secured by 24-hour security guards.

Food delivery service, professional chef, doctor on call, tour excursions and translation service can be arranged upon requested.

Food delivery service, professional chef, doctor on call, tour excursions and translation service can be arranged upon requested.

Villa located is within 4 km from Ao Nang beach, 1.9 km from local market and Macro supermarket.

We are trying to do everything to make your stay in our villa as comfortable as possible.

We are offering a daily cleaning service and our professional staff are full day working on site. 

Please if you need something or see the something is broken or is not in the right condition - immediately contact our staff on villa or our Management.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1. Smoking is strictly prohibited in all guest rooms and enclosed areas. Please use the designated areas on the terraces. In the case of non-compliance with the rule or fire damage, the guest is fully liable. The cost for a special cleaning is 5000 THB per room. They must also reimburse any costs for non-usability of the space.


2. Please treat our property with care. (Do not use towels as floor cloths, for example)


3. Close all windows and doors while using air conditioners. If your air conditioner breaks down for this reason, it will be repaired at your expense. 


4. We want you to enjoy your stay but please keep in mind that this is a residential area and therefore the playing of loud music outside is prohibited after 11pm.

The Villa is situated close to the beach on one acre of private land. The warm pool over looks  Mt. Hua Nak national forest. Extreme effort is taken  maintaining the beautiful tropical gardens and nature pond lagoon. The gated grounds are surrounded by a natural bamboo border to provide a totally private experience. 
The Cliffside Lagoon Villa has two separate buildings for two family privacy. The third building is a 120 meter Sala Kitchen Terrace for all to enjoy and relax. A perfect spot for large gatherings, meals or hanging out. The kitchen is stocked and fully functional. A large assortment of chairs and a big round table make the area home. These building are surrounded by lush grass and tropical beauty with the mountain as the backdrop. The yard features a pool area with mini sala. Our in house Chef is proud to prepare hand cooked meals right in front of you. Let us cater to your needs and make your stay worry free. Order a massage at poolside or enjoy the comforts of Air conditioning.

Guests enjoy the privacy of the entire gated location to themselves. Two separate buildings allow privacy for families. Enjoy the tropical sala kitchen area. Prepare your own meals or let our Chef cook up a wonderful Thai feast. We offer certified yoga classes and Thai massage per your request. The pool area features a sala with sunbeds and umbrellas. Airport transfers and affordable local transportation is included.

We provide daily bottle water a greeting fruit basket, a bit of local beer and juice to get you started. Daily 5 star house cleaning is provided with fresh linen and a cell phone is issued to guests to contact taxi's for transportation to local villages and beaches. Yoga, massage and Tour advise also provided and arranged.

For the perfect villa holiday vacation Villas In Krabi offers the Cliffside  Lagoon family  pool villa.  Cliffside Lagoon Villa is perfectly situated 10 minutes from Krabi's main tourist hot spot of Ao Nang Beach and the quiet and idyllic Klong Muang Beach, both offering stunning ocean views of Krabi's famous  Phi Phi Island. Enjoy massage, Yoga, Thai cooking or just soaking up the Thai sun by the pool. Afordable transportation is available 7/24 to local destinations.

Krabi Airport pickup provided. 
Affordable van transportation is just a phone call away to any local destination.
Motorbike or car rental can easily be arranged.

The CLV features Yoga classes and personal instruction on site at your convenience. Our certified instructor will arrange a comfortable program that fits your desires. On site massage at your fingertips at reasonable prices and as long as you want.

guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The 3 Bedroom, 3 bath  Penthouse offers luxury accommodations for up to 7 adults.  Large living and dining room, outside deck and jacuzzi,  in all 154 square meters to enjoy your holiday. The kitchen is fully stocked with kitchen cooking and serving utensils. Facilities include a 25 meter lap pool, jacuzzi in the pool, children's pool, fitness center.

The guests have free use of Fitness Center, Swimming pool with 25 meter lap pool and jacuzzi, Children''s swimming pool, Free off street parking too. We have a Tour Desk at the Reception to book tours and activities and 24 hour Security

We are located in central Ao Nang, within easy walking distance to dozens of restaurants, bars and shopping. There are banks and a medical clinic within 50 meters. Ao Nang beach is 700 meters.

Most people walk or take the local tuk tuks to the beach or other locations. We have a Tour Desk to arrange other activities and trips for you.

name: 8 Palm Villa 4 - 4 bedroom Private Pool Villa
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy the tranquility of 8 Palm Villa.  Surrounded by mountain and plantation views yet conveniently located to tourist attractions in Ao Nang and Klong Muang.

Relax in the generous space of your own private courtyard and 10 meter swimming pool with high speed internet.

8 PALM VILLA
The location is nestled on the edge of the National Park in a quiet area about 5k from the hustle and bustle of Ao Nang beach and Klong Muang beach (contender for best beach in Asia)

LOCATION
Minutes from 24x7 supermarket, elephant sanctuary and a variety of local cafes and restaurants.  Krabi Airport is about 30 minutes travel time.

Vehicle rental can be arranged with scooter and car rental companies and local taxi transport.

ABOUT THE VILLA:
In the privacy of your own courtyard amidst tropical plantations and striking mountain views all Villas include:

Bedrooms are arranged with one downstairs and three upstairs. The downstairs bedroom is accessed directly from the terrace area and is designed to be perfect if you have young kids or perhaps a group member with limited mobility.  All bedrooms are air conditioned and have full en-suite bathrooms.

2 bedrooms upstairs have queen beds  and one bedroom has 2 twin beds which can be joined to make a king size.

The upstairs bedrooms have a big covered shared balcony with hanging bed.

A large open plan living room and big comfortable space to seat 8 people with a 55 inch flat screen net flex enabled wall mounted TV.

A fully equipped kitchen with oven, fridge, microwave, storage and equipment that you would need to make a quick snack or a 5 course dinner.
Large breakfast bar for casual dining and seating area, perfect for the digital nomad.  USB and international and local power points provided in every room.

All rooms can be opened up completely to fully enjoy inside/outside living.

OUTSIDE
Enjoy alfresco dining in the covered outdoor BBQ area with comfortable dining for 8 people by the pool.  A gas BBQ is provided to make the most of the amazing fresh foods available in the local markets. (Oh, and did I mention that we can provide an in-house chef to create you a perfect Thai dinner?)

SERVICES
Chef Service
We can provide in-house dining, our Thai chefs can create a delicious dinner or breakfast for your group. We do the shopping and preparation and then bring it all to the villa to cook and serve. You are welcome to join in.

Massage Service
Professional Masseurs are available to give you an exquisite massage in the comfort of your own villa.

Tour and Activity Booking
Our Villa Manager has over ten years of experience of every tour and activity available in the area. We can book private boat trips to the Islands, kayaking, horse riding, rock climbing, ATV, elephant experiences, cooking courses, White water rafting trips plus so much more. Feel free to chat to us prior to your visit to check prices and options.

Vehicle Rental
Krabi is a truly spectacular province with breath-taking views around every corner, so, we do recommend that guests rent some sort of transport for themselves. We can link you up with local car and scooter rental companies who can provide well maintained vehicles at a reasonable price. Honestly, one of the nicest things you can do is ‘get lost in Krabi’.

Laundry Service
We can have your clothes sent to the laundry, washed, and ironed for a reasonable price.

Guest have their own private area with full wall all around. The pool and all bedrooms, balcony and patio are private to the guests.

There is a generous parking area off the road exclusive to guests of the villa.

8 Palm Villa is located on a small country road. The road passes through the countryside on the edge of the National Park.

The location is down a small road off the main road between Aonang and Klong Muang. There is a parking area exclusive for guests and guests for the other villas.

We do recommend that guests do have some personal transport, most guests do rent a scooter or car to get around. There is a supermarket about 1km from the villa and some fantastic cafes and restaurants within about 2km of the villa. But to make the most of the area it's fantastic to have your own transport, the roads are good and we know some great rental companies.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- A cash deposit of 5000thb will be required at check in
- Smoking is only allowed in the outside areas
- Guests are requested to refrain from playing loud music after 10pm in respect of neighbors.
- Only plastic drinking vessels should be used in the pool area
- No Illegal activities on the premises

name: Phukhao 2 Bed room Seaview Villa
address: ตำบล หนองทะเล, กระบี่, Thailand
city: ตำบล หนองทะเล
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM
sectionedDescription/description:
PhuKhao 2 bed room Villa
PhuKhao 2 Bed room Villa is located in the Klong Muang Beach area (BEST BEACH IN KRABI), the family friendly and upmarket resort area of Krabi, where most luxury resorts can be found, such as the Ritz-Carlton Phulay Bay, Dusit Thani and Sofitel.

 

The Villa is set peacefully back from the main road, with access is up a private road on the hillside, offering amazing & beautiful views overlooking the clear blue waters of the Andaman Sea.

That Private Luxury Pool Villa is available as 2 bedrooms, ranging from 300 m2 of covered living space, with a private pool with sea views. The Villa is one storey boasting a modern spacious design, offering an open plan living/entertainment area, dining area and kitchen area. The kitchen is fully fitted and well equipped. There is free Wi-Fi throughout the Villa. All bedrooms are comfortably decorated offering a selection of King-size and twin bed, all en-suite with luxury bathrooms.

PhuKhao 2 Bed room Villa is close to all the local attractions, including beaches, golf course, water sports and the local island group of Koh Hong. These islands can be reached by a short boat ride, either by the local Thai long tail boats or speed boat. On the islands you will find tropical beaches where you can sunbathe, swim & snorkel, or explore the wonders of a stunning blue lagoon in the middle of one of the islands during hide tide.

Only 35 min. by car from Krabi airport, 25 min. from Krabitown and 15 min. from Ao Nang beach.

This listing is two 4 bedroom villas arraanged back to back with a connecting door in the living/kitchen area of each villa.

In each villa, Bedrooms are arranged with one downstairs and three upstairs. The downstairs bedroom is accessed directly from the terrace area and is designed to be perfect if you have young kids or perhaps a group member with limited mobility.  All bedrooms are air conditioned and have full en-suite bathrooms.

3 bedrooms upstairs have queen beds  and one bedroom has 2 twin beds which can be joined to make a king size.

The upstairs bedrooms have a big covered shared balcony with hanging bed.

A large open plan living room and big comfortable space to seat 8 people with a 55 inch flat screen net flex enabled wall mounted TV.

A fully equipped kitchen with oven, fridge, microwave, storage and equipment that you would need to make a quick snack or a 5 course dinner.
Large breakfast bar for casual dining and seating area, perfect for the digital nomad.  USB and international and local power points provided in every room.

All rooms can be opened up completely to fully enjoy inside/outside living.

OUTSIDE
Enjoy alfresco dining in the covered outdoor BBQ area with comfortable dining for 16 people by the pool.  A gas BBQ is provided to make the most of the amazing fresh foods available in the local markets. (Oh, and did I mention that we can provide an in-house chef to create you a perfect Thai dinner?)

SERVICES
Chef Service
We can provide in-house dining, our Thai chefs can create a delicious dinner or breakfast for your group. We do the shopping and preparation and then bring it all to the villa to cook and serve. You are welcome to join in.

Massage Service
Professional Masseurs are available to give you an exquisite massage in the comfort of your own villa.

Tour and Activity Booking
Our Villa Manager has over ten years of experience of every tour and activity available in the area. We can book private boat trips to the Islands, kayaking, horse riding, rock climbing, ATV, elephant experiences, cooking courses, White water rafting trips plus so much more. Feel free to chat to us prior to your visit to check prices and options.

Vehicle Rental
Krabi is a truly spectacular province with breath-taking views around every corner, so, we do recommend that guests rent some sort of transport for themselves. We can link you up with local car and scooter rental companies who can provide well maintained vehicles at a reasonable price. Honestly, one of the nicest things you can do is ‘get lost in Krabi’.

Laundry Service
We can have your clothes sent to the laundry, washed, and ironed for a reasonable price.

name: Sriprai Pool Villa - Cliff Haven Villa Krabi
sectionedDescription/description:
Entire villa hosted by Cliff Haven Villa Krabi
4 Guests · 2 Bedrooms · 2 King Beds · 3 bathrooms


Indulge in the beauty of our Sriprai Pool Villa, situated in the enchanting surroundings of Krabi. Experience luxury and relaxation, just moments away from the Andaman Sea.

Special Benefit for reservations now.
Complimentary roundtrip shuttle bus to Aonang beach daily (One trip a day)

Our villa offers two comfortable bedrooms, each featuring a king bed and air conditioning. If needed, we can provide a crib or rollaway bed to accommodate extra guests.

Unwind in the spacious living areas or step outside to enjoy the peaceful outdoor terrace overlooking the beautiful garden. With three bathrooms, convenience and privacy are ensured throughout your stay.

Cool off in your large private pool, surrounded by lush greenery, and savor the tranquility of our well-maintained garden. The villa includes a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you to prepare meals at your convenience.

Stay connected with complimentary WiFi available throughout the villa. Enjoy international channels with connected Netflix. Each bedroom is equipped with a closet, providing ample storage space for your belongings

You'll have exclusive access to the entire villa, including the private pool and garden area. Enjoy a relaxing swim or gather for a BBQ with your loved ones.

Other things to note:

Maximum occupancy: 4 adults or 4 adults and 2 children
Check-in time: 2 PM
Check-out time: 11 AM
Our dedicated reception team is available to assist you throughout your stay.
Free parking is available on the premises.
We provide personalized hosting services to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.

Make the most of your Krabi getaway by booking Cliff Haven Villa Krabi - Sriprai Pool Villa today. Experience the perfect blend of luxury and serenity in a stunning setting.

Book now to secure your preferred dates!

name: Sea breeze Pool villa in Ao-nang
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 6PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Come to Sea breeze Pool villa to enjoy a beautifully decorated home with painted wall art. My place is just 3.6 km away from Ao-Nang Beach, 4.7 km from Railay Beach and a 5 min drive to the supermarket (Makro, Lotus’s and 7-11). 6min drive to the hospital (Wattanapat hospital). 5 min drive to Saturday street food market.

This three-bedroom villa will make you feel comfy and refreshed. The first bedroom has a 6ft King size bed (for 2 people). The second bedroom has a 6ft king-size bed with a single bed (for 3 people). The third bedroom has a 6 ft king-size bed, bunk bed and a single bed (for 4 people). All bedroom has a private bathroom and hot water. A hair dryer, toiletries and towels are also provided.

On a warm day, you can enjoy soaking in a 3*7 pool connected to a 2*5 kids' pool along with an outdoor shower. For your comfort, in-room amenities like a microwave, television, and pool table are installed. Free high-speed Wi-Fi and all rooms in the villa are air-conditioned. The washing machine and laundry equipment are also available on the property.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Strictly no smoking inside the house, but you can smoke outside or at the balcony

- Please turn off the lights, TV and air-conditioner every time you leave the room

- Please respect the others during the stay in the place, and be mindful of the noise (strictly no party and event allowed)

- Keep the room clean and help save the belongings

- No pets allowed

- Please close the door when you leave

- If Unicorn floats broke, it will be charged 2000 Bhat

**a copy of every guest's passport will be collected upon guest arrival or by Airbnb’s messaging for immiration**

name: Sunset Bliss
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
From the moment you enter the property you know you have arrived somewhere special. The 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom unit is privately owned by an interior designer and has just been completed.  The apartment is on the third floor and boasts ocean views. The beach across the road has restaurants, bars, free music and is a step off point for tour boats. 
Room 2302 is our own special piece of paradise made available to you and is situated at Klong Muang beach which is the family friendly end of Krabi.

Just 40 minutes away from the Krabi International airport you'll be transported into instant relax mode. Your holiday will be as busy or relaxing as you wish. Island tours are available from the beach across the road. Bushwalking is at the end of the road just a couple of kilometres away. The scuba diving is amazing at the nearby islands.

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy

The local letting agent will be available to assist with the check in and any queries you may have.

Klong Muang has the most amazing beach culture. Too numerous to list are the restaurants and bars just over the road right on the beach. There are tour operators within 50 metres and a list of tour options a mile long.

A really fun way of getting around is hiring a scooter. There are numerous operators with 100 metres. You might like to engage a local driver for a private tour or perhaps hire a car from the airport. The driving is easy.
Island tours are as easy as walking across the road and onto the boat from the beach.
There is a beautiful walking trail with waterfall just a couple of kilometres away at the end of the road.

name: KG Private Pool Villa KG-1
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
KG Villa 1 (940)
A modern designed villa, KG Villa 1 (940) is one of two properties managed by KG Private Pool Villas. It may be rented along with its neighbor, KG Villa 2 with connecting doors for bigger groups.

The well-designed modern house is constructed around the swimming pool, allowing access from both the living space and master bedroom. The compact Villa maximizes space perfect for small families or group of friends.

There are 3 bedrooms, all 3 with en-suite bathrooms. The master bed room and the second bedroom have king sized beds, and the third bedroom has twin beds (2 single beds), all rooms have their own bathroom with toilets, sink and water heater connected to a rain shower system. The master bedroom opens out onto the swimming pool area. The rooms are fully furnished with closets as well as a vanity/dressing table; the master bedroom also has a cable TV connected

The property offers a comfortable living and dining area with full-length windows looking over the swimming pool; the fully equipped kitchen area is easily accessed from both bedrooms as well as the living room and dining area. All rooms are air-conditioned, and there is Wi-Fi internet and cable TV connections.

The pool outdoor features an outdoor shower connected to a covered garage for one car.
The villa is very well situated, at the edge of the town center with Aonang beach being less than 5 minutes away by road. Tesco’s supermarket is a 2 minute walk away and Makro food supermarket is about 5 minutes’ walk away. The villa is also located about 30 meters to the nearest 7-11 24hr minimart.

near Aonang Tesco  Lotus, Makro

sectionedDescription/description:
Dan's Koyao Retreat is a private residence on the beautiful island of Koh Yao Noi in Phang Na Bay. It sits on a hill, overlooking the Ocean. It offers its' guests all the amenities they could wish for, a 15-meter pool, a large sun terrace and a full-time staff to make guests feel comfortable.
There are currently three rooms/bungalows available for rent. For all rooms the rental includes breakfast, use of the common living room, sala and the terrace including the pool.

The residence and its garden are regularly visited by various birds including the iconic hornbill.

sectionedDescription/description:
Villa Kanwara is a detached villa featuring a garden with an outdoor pool, located in Krabi. The villa is equipped with air conditioning and free WiFi. Free private parking is available on site. There is a sitting area and a kitchen. A TV is featured. Other facilities at Villa Kanwara include a barbecue. Phi Phi Don is 33.8 km from Villa Kanwara, and Ao Nang Beach is 2.3 km from the property. Krabi Airport is 19.3 km away.Free round trip transfer from the Airport to the Villa Kanwara.

PCR Arrange met for Test & Go on first night available. Partner with Krabi La Playa Resort.

All the area around the Villa

Stay minimum 7 nights Free transportation from the Airport to Villa

sectionedDescription/description:
4 BEDROOM POOL VILLA  

Villa Orchidea will charm you with its dazzling landscaped tropical garden.

The villa’s atmosphere will enlighten your senses once you are among flowers, trees, fishes and birds.

Located on 4000m2  land  ,villa Orchidea  offers piece and serenity ,surrounded by its beautiful tropical garden  and a fish pond you will with no doubt revive your senses . From the large covered terrasse you can access a 4m x10m salt Water swimming pool equipped with 3 jets Jaccuzi

We are available during your stay to give you our best recommendations....

we offer daily complimentary cleaning service from 8am to 2pm  and will change bed linens and towels every three days.

name: Issara Pool Villa - Cliff Haven Villa Krabi
sectionedDescription/description:
Entire villa hosted by Cliff Haven Villa Krabi
4 Guests · 2 Bedrooms · 2 King Beds ·3 bathrooms

Escape to our luxurious Issara Pool Villa, nestled amidst the scenic limestone mountains of Krabi. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and tranquility, just a 5-minute drive from the Andaman Sea.

Special Benefit for reservations now.
Complimentary of roundtrip shuttle bus to Aonang beach daily (One trip a day)

Our villa features two spacious bedrooms, each furnished with a king bed and equipped with air conditioning for your utmost comfort. Need extra sleeping arrangements? No worries, we can provide a crib or rollaway bed upon request.

Relax and unwind in the ample living and sitting areas, or step outside to enjoy the quiet outdoor terrace with stunning garden views. Each bedroom has its own shower room, and you'll find a total of three bathrooms in the villa.

Take a dip in your private pool, surrounded by lush greenery, and immerse yourself in the serenity of our beautiful garden. Enjoy the convenience of a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for preparing your own meals.

Stay connected with complimentary WiFi available throughout the villa. Enjoy international channels with connected Netflix. Each bedroom is equipped with a closet, providing ample storage space for your belongings.

You'll have exclusive access to the entire villa, including the private pool and garden area. Feel free to lounge by the pool or enjoy a BBQ with your loved ones. Additionally, you can make use of the large communal swimming pool. A welcome amenity will be provided upon check-in.

Other things to note:

Maximum occupancy: 4 adults or 4 adults and 2 children
Check-in time: 2 PM
Check-out time: 11 AM
We offer personalized hosting services, ensuring a comfortable and memorable stay for our guests.
Free parking is available on the premises.
Our dedicated reception team is available to assist you throughout your stay.

Don't miss out on this luxurious retreat in Krabi. Book now and embark on a truly unforgettable vacation at Cliff Haven Villa Krabi - Issara Pool Villa.

Book now to secure your preferred dates!

name: Amazing, High End Designer Villa Located in Nature
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for children (0-12) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Other worldly, tranquil, yet stylish, designer home, located within the beauty of the Krabi Mountains. The home is truly a master piece of elegance situated in the surrounds of natures wonders. Harmoniously integrated into stunning scenery, with breath taking views and luxury surrounds . Tropical forests blend with stunning mountain views, with sounds of nature all around adding to the ambiance of a true Thailand  paradise. Welcome to villa 'Ayram Alusing' or more simply, Hallelujah Mountains.

There is easy access to this beautiful home located just off main highways, yet nestled within the tropics of Krabi. This amazing property has been designed with subtle details, taking into consideration the stunning natural scenery and mountain ranges within this thought inspiring location. We invite you to sit in the large infinity pool while taking in the surrounding  beauty, relax in 5* luxury within the designer living spaces and retire to your grand bedroom for more R&R to prepare you for your next amazing adventure.

The whole house is available and usable once rented

We are happy to offer support and help wherever possible throughout your stay and wish to make your stay with us as pleasantly memorable as possible. Feel free to ask for advise and or assistance with matters regarding the home and the region of Krabi and beyond.

A beautiful, peaceful neighbourhood that allows you to take in the true Thailand experience. Emersed in nature but away from the hustle and bustle of generic tourism, yet close enough to visit the main tourist hub of Ao Nang if so desired.

The location of the villa is perfect to visit all attractions and more with ease of access to main highways within minutes. A plus of the house is that you feel as though you are in the grip of nature, yet only small journeys away to get or do everything that you may require and desire.


5 minutes from the Main Highway
25 minutes to Ao Nang
30 minutes from the airport
25 minutes from Krabi Town - Krabi Town Night Market
1 hour drive to Koh Lanta
2 hour drive to Phuket
45 minutes to Tiger Cave
45 Minutes to Emerald Pool
40 minutes to waterfalls
5 minutes from Khao Thong Hill - Famous View Point & Cafe

sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please kindly follow the rules and respect this house as this is a family home and a special place for the owners. Their small piece of heaven.

No shoes
No smoking
No parties
No drugs
No prostitutes or local bar girls
No pets
No feeding the fish
No toilet paper down the toilet bowl
Please use AC sparingly to protect our planet

Generally, please kindly respect our home.... thank you so very much !!! and enjoy your stay
sectionedDescription/interaction: We are happy to offer support and help wherever possible throughout your stay and wish to make your stay with us as pleasantly memorable as possible. Feel free to ask for advise and or assistance with matters regarding the home and the region of Krabi and beyond.
sectionedDescription/name: Amazing, High End Designer Villa Located in Nature
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie:
A beautiful, peaceful neighbourhood that allows you to take in the true Thailand experience. Emersed in nature but away from the hustle and bustle of generic tourism, yet close enough to visit the main tourist hub of Ao Nang if so desired.

The location of the villa is perfect to visit all attractions and more with ease of access to main highways within minutes. A plus of the house is that you feel as though you are in the grip of nature, yet only small journeys away to get or do everything that you may require and desire.


5 minutes from the Main Highway
25 minutes to Ao Nang
30 minutes from the airport
25 minutes from Krabi Town - Krabi Town Night Market

sectionedDescription/space: There is easy access to this beautiful home located just off main highways, yet nestled within the tropics of Krabi. This amazing property has been designed with subtle details, taking into consideration the stunning natural scenery and mountain ranges within this thought inspiring location. We invite you to sit in the large infinity pool while taking in the surrounding  beauty, relax in 5* luxury within the designer living spaces and retire to your grand bedroom for more R&R to prepare you for your next amazing adventure.
sectionedDescription/summary: Other worldly, tranquil, yet stylish, designer home, located within the beauty of the Krabi Mountains. The home is truly a master piece of elegance situated in the surrounds of natures wonders. Harmoniously integrated into stunning scenery, with breath taking views and luxury surrounds . Tropical forests blend with stunning mountain views, with sounds of nature all around adding to the ambiance of a true Thailand  paradise. Welcome to villa 'Ayram Alusing' or more simply, Hallelujah Mountains.

address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is 2PM - 12AM (midnight)
sectionedDescription/description:
ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel & Resort offers accommodations in Phi Phi Don. Guests can enjoy sunset views while indulging in the outdoor pool. Delectable meals and refreshing drinks are daily served at the on-site restaurant. All guests have access to free WiFi throughout the property.Mostly decorated in wooden style, each bedroom comes with a flat-screen TV and comfortable bed options. The private bathroom is equipped with shower facilities.  Seating area for guests to sit back and relax.

Once entered, you will encounter our green space and customized design accommodations and swimming pool to reflect the beauty of nature and sea life!

Beachfront 
Swimming pool
 Free WiFi 
Outdoor pool 
good Fitness Center
Tour desk
Mimi Mart 
Diving shop 
Restaurant  and Bar
Ferry

Should you need anything; from simple snacks, asking for towels or assistance, our staffs can be easily reached via. in-room telephone line. Or come to our front desk, our staffs will be there 24/7

We're set on the beachfront which shares the side with the main pier from Krabi town route, and it's approximately 5 minutes from each other! Accessing other famous beaches and viewpoint is also easy when starting from the hotel.

sectionedDescription/description:
The deluxe room has a luxurious contemporary interior. The Thai sculptures and murals decorating the huts are carefully selected to compliment one another and create a calming ambience. They are a great pick for couples who are looking to relax in a private area. The room has a big balcony that over looking the Andaman sea.

- 5 minutes walk to Long Beach
- 25 minutes walk to Ton Sai pier
- Restaurant which serves complimentary breakfast every morning
- Free Wifi (wifi is not stable as it depends on island connection service)

We offer "free" pick up and drop off services by for "checking in and out" 
Additional trip to town by taxi boat is 100 baht per person per trip.

Checking in instruction
- Once you arrived at the pier please look for out stuff holding a sign Viking Nature resort. We will bring you to the resort for checking in with a long boat.

*Note* Free shuttle service for checking in and out is only available from 9am - 5pm

sectionedDescription/description:
The unique new 3BDR grand pool villa in the private mountain view scenario in Aonang, Krabi. Same quality with our other listings, just different styles. Feeling like visit your friends and family when you are with us. Don't need to plan anything, our lovely sisters will take care and recomended the best trip for you!

·	3 Bedrooms pool Villa (280 square meters) which is suitable for 6
·	kitchen and fully kitchenette & kitchenware.
·	living room with a smart TV home entertainment system with NETFLIX application and comfortable dining area.  

* Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.

** Free BBQ grill: charcoal

***Airport transfer service with private van at 700 THB/van/way for 1-8 persons. 

****Check-in time is 2-5PM. If you come to check-in after 5PM can be self-check-in: You can access the villa using a key in lockbox with code. We will meet and greet you in the next morning between 9-10 AM.

A whole property

You can talk with us by online group which we will add before arriving in Krabi.

The deluxe room has a luxurious contemporary interior. The Thai sculptures and murals decorating the huts are carefully selected to compliment one another and create a calming ambience. They are a great pick for couples who are looking to relax in a private area. The room has a big balcony that over looking the Andaman sea.

- 5 minutes walk to Long Beach
- 25 minutes walk to Ton Sai pier
- Restaurant which serves complimentary breakfast every morning
- Free Wifi (wifi is not stable as it depends on island connection service)

We offer "free" pick up and drop off services by for "checking in and out" 
Additional trip to town by taxi boat is 100 baht per person per trip.

Checking in instruction
- Once you arrived at the pier please look for out stuff holding a sign Viking Nature resort. We will bring you to the resort for checking in with a long boat.

*Note* Free shuttle service for checking in and out is only available from 9am - 5pm

name: Villa Languor
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 7PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Right on Phra Nang beach in the Railay area of Krabi, Thailand, Cowrie Villas are two exclusive tropical minimalist 3-bedroom beachfront villas adjacent to one another, each with expansive bedrooms and each of the villas has their own private pool. One-bedroom rentals are allowed at certain times of the year.
Privately owned and exquisitely staffed, the unique villas are located within the grounds of the exclusive Rayavadee Resort

For occasions when you wish to eat outdoors, the 3-bedroom Villa Languor has a very comprehensive BBQ and picnic area on the rooftop above the living room, which offers a spectacular view along Phra Nang Beach.
Each of the bedrooms has their own ensuite bathroom. The private swimming pool offers a small swim-up bar with seating.

With access to pool facilities, garden and direct access to the beach, surrounded by limestone cliffs and wildlife including monkeys!

Guests will be greeted and checked in/out on arrival and departure. 
Butler service. 
Concierge service.

Phranang Beach is a must for all holidaymakers in the Krabi region. The spectacular cliffs and the lush greenery at the beach form a fantastic setting. The sand is fine and soft and the colour and the clearness of the water are incredible. Railay, also known as Rai Leh, is a small peninsula between the city of Krabi and Ao Nang in Thailand. It is accessible only by boat due to high limestone cliffs cutting off mainland access.

Transfer from the airport can be arranged at an additional charge.
Private boat transfer is available at an additional charge.
Speedboat. 
Long-tail boat. 
Walking.

No smoking indoors. 
No pets.

- Quiet hours: 22:00 - 07:30
- No shoes in the house

For occasions when you wish to eat outdoors, the 3-bedroom Villa Languor has a very comprehensive BBQ and picnic area on the rooftop above the living room, which offers a spectacular view along Phra Nang Beach.
Each of the bedrooms has their own ensuite bathroom. The private swimming pool offers a small swim-up bar with seating.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Right on Phra Nang beach in the Railay area of Krabi, Thailand, Cowrie Villas are two exclusive tropical minimalist 3-bedroom beachfront villas adjacent to one another, each with expansive bedrooms and each of the villas has their own private pool. One-bedroom rentals are allowed at certain times of the year.
Privately owned and exquisitely staffed, the unique villas are located within the grounds of the exclusive Rayavadee Resort

name: Cozy 2 bedroom with private pool in Krabi
address: Tambon Nong Thale, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Home away from home! Come relax in this cozy apartment while exploring Krabi and the surroundings area like Hong Island. Fully equipped kitchen, you can enjoy with your family just like living at your own home.

-Spacious living room
-Fully equipped kitchen
-1 master bedroom
-1 master bathroom (with bath tub and shower)
-1 small bedroom
-1 small bathroom (with shower)
-Large balcony with outdoor table and chairs

FAQ

Q: Is this unit an apartment or a villa?
A: This unit is an apartment.

Q: Is this unit in a gated community?
A:  This unit is in a condo development with security guards at the entrance. 

Q: There is a private pool within the unit but is there also a shared pool in the common area?
A: Yes, there is a also a big pool which is shared among all the condo residents. 

Q: What is the neighborhood like?
A: The apartment is located in the Klong Muang Beach area on the map. The area is pretty quiet with a few local shops and restaurants. There is two local restaurants that is worth a visit, one is beachside and one is up on top of a hill with mountain view, where you can see the sunset at both restaurants. You can also take the longtail boat to Hong Island.

Our services outstanding!
The villa is clean, they make the beds and clean the pool everyday. It's a two story villa, note kids just have to be a little careful. One bedroom on the ground floor, two on the second. 4 functional toilets/bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchen.

Ao Nang is located around 20km from Krabi Town and 25km from the airport. A taxi to / from Krabi airport will take approximately 30 minutes and cost (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)ht for a car (max 4 persons) or (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)ht for a minibus. From Krabi Town, there is a local bus service, or taxi service is available to Ao Nang. Count 15 – 20 minutes by car.

To access our pool villa, i strong recommend you to book our private van it is more comfortable.

We provide free shuttle to Aonang 1 time per day (Reservation is required).

It is important if you stay here, you can rent the Motobike. Our staff can help you.

name: Orchid Pool Villa - Cliff Haven Villa Krabi
sectionedDescription/description:
Entire villa hosted by Cliff Haven Villa Krabi

4 Guests · 2 Bedrooms · 2 King beds · 3 bathrooms

Welcome to our Orchid Pool Villa, nestled in the breathtaking landscape of Krabi. Discover the epitome of comfort and tranquility, just a short distance from the Andaman Sea.

Special Benefit for reservations now.
Complimentary roundtrip shuttle bus to Aonang beach daily (One trip a day)

Our villa boasts two spacious bedrooms, each furnished with a king bed and equipped with air conditioning for your comfort. If required, we can provide a crib or rollaway bed for additional guests.

Relax in spacious living areas, or step outside to enjoy the peaceful outdoor terrace with views of the picturesque garden. With three bathrooms, privacy and convenience are guaranteed.

Take a refreshing swim in your private pool, surrounded by lush greenery, and immerse yourself in the serenity of our well-maintained garden. The villa includes a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you to prepare meals at your leisure.

Stay connected with complimentary WiFi available throughout the villa. Enjoy international channels with connected Netflix. Each bedroom is equipped with a closet, providing ample storage space for your belongings.

You'll have exclusive access to the entire villa, including the private pool and garden area. Feel free to lounge by the pool or enjoy a BBQ with your loved ones. A welcome amenity will be provided upon check-in.

Maximum occupancy: 4 adults or 4 adults and 2 kids
Check-in time: 2 PM
Check-out time: 11.30 AM
All of our staff are welcoming and ready to serve you in a friendly manner.
Free parking is available on the premises.
We provide a personalized host service to ensure a comfortable and memorable experience.

Take a refreshing swim in your private pool, surrounded by lush greenery, and immerse yourself in the serenity of our well-maintained garden. The villa includes a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you to prepare meals at your leisure.

Stay connected with complimentary WiFi available throughout the villa. Enjoy international channels with connected Netflix. Each bedroom is equipped with a closet, providing ample storage space for your belongings.

name: Mambo house
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Небольшой резорт ( на территории 5 домиков) в хорошей локации (центра район Ао Нанг), 2,5 километра до пляжа. А пешей доступности (3-5 минут) продуктовый магазин Makro, круглосуточный Family Mart и прачечная. Так же в 500 м от дома есть местный рынок, который работает 3 раза в неделю (пн, ср, пт с 14 до 19 часов примерно), смотровая площадка и местный Храм с 200 ступеньками, откуда открываются потрясающие виды.

В двухспальном домике:  
- 2 спальни с комфортными кроватями, кондиционерами 
- небольшая гостиная 
- оборудованная кухня с большим холодильником и обеденная зона 
- ванная комната с душем и горячей водой 
- вай-фай в доме и на территории резорта

Недалеко от дома, примерно в 500 метров,  есть также небольшой магазин Tesco, круглосуточный магазин 7/11 и отличная кофейня Lekker и множество магазинчиков, ресторанчиков и массажных салонов.

Возле магазина 7/11 останавливается местная маршрутка тук-тук, на ней очень быстро можно доехать до пляжа Ао нанг, Ноппарат Тара и даже в Краби Таун (расстояние 20 км). Маршрутка ходит примерно каждые 15 минут, до 22 вечера, стоимость от 20 бат за билет.

name:
HEAVEN ON EARTH LUXERY PRIVATE VILLA. 
Brand New!
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Heaven on Earth Villa @ Aonang Beach is a spacious luxury private Villa with a large living area surrounded by a huge garden for large families & groups. The object comes fully furnished with brand new furniture & built-in interior. Comfy, Clean & Quite environment away from the noise where you can enjoy & relax peacefully day&night. The perimeter is higly secured, easily accessible & close to restaurants & transportation. Just 5 min drive to beachfront, 2 min to Makro, 3 min to Tesco & 7/11.

For your convenience we will assist you with all kind of services e.g. laundry, airport pick-up, taxi & tour booking, food delivery by restaurants and general assistance with everything you need.
You will be welcomed personally by the owner, informed about everything you need to know while staying on site and receive a private contact number for assistance. Please note that the payment covers everything (water, waste disposal, cleaning, etc.)
***EXCLUDING ELECTRICITY (5.00Baht/unit).

Whenever you need assistance or any information we we'll be more than happy to help you any time.

This villa, even though it is located in a quite and peaceful area, is in close vicinity to absolutely everything you need. Breakfast and dining is covered by countless restaurants nearby, transportation (taxi, bike/car rental etc.) can be arranged for you, tours and adventures can be booked for you in advance or discovered along the way and popular destinations such as Aonang Beach, several beautiful islands, Krabi Town or Spa Venues can be visited within minutes.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No smoking indoors (dispose of cigarette butts in the bins provided)
Damages exceeding the deposit amount will be billed to the guest
Do not use the premises for any illegal activity
The fee for a lost key is 2,000 Baht
BBQ, gatherings and similar activities are allowed but must be hold maintaining an acceptable sound level after 00:00
No unregistered guests for overnight stay allowed (extra guests will be charged))

name: 2-bedroom Pano View Hillside Room A & B
address: Chang Wat, กระบี่, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 9PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Pano View Hillside property is situated on a stunning hillside in Klong Muang overlooking the magnificent Andaman Sea and mountains.

This private property is for you and your family/friends and offers 2 one bedrooms, which can comfortably host 4 guests.

Each bedroom is equipped with private internet routers providing a fast speed of up to 200 Mbps and a 50"Smart TV. You can log in to your YouTube, Netflix, and Amazon Prime accounts.

Each bedroom has convenient amenities including a King bed, a 50" Smart TV, a small fridge, a toaster, a microwave, a kettle, cups, dishes, and bowls. 
You can find an induction stove, a rice cooker, a pot, and a pan under the stair of room A which is next to the pool.
While no full kitchen is available in the house, we provide a washing machine at no additional cost. 

You can enjoy a refreshing swim in our pool.
Pool size: 4 x 6.6 meters
Pool depth: 125 centimeters

We also have a tuk-tuk service where you can choose one option a day during your stay. You can use our tuk-tuk service from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. 
Option 1: Round-trip to Klong Muang Beach and back to the property
Option 2: One way to Ao Nang Beach

Within this price, you will get 2 one-bedrooms with a swimming pool, parking, and an elevator during your stay.
You will be staying in rooms A and B (please view the photo) during your stay.

We provide a free weekly cleaning service. You can request additional cleaning services from us; however, we kindly request that you let us know at least two days in advance. The additional cleaning service is charged at 800 baht per time and includes changing the bedding.

Electricity and water are all included in this price for a stay of less than 28 nights.

Please note that if you would like a special offer for custom dates (a week & more), we will send you the offer that does not include electricity and water fees.

We will greet you in person. We live 15 minutes away by car.
Please message us anytime during your stay if you have any questions, we can assist you in person if needed.

The property is located in a peaceful neighborhood of Klong Muang, Nong Thale sub-district.
Just 2 km from the beautiful Klong Muang Beach, which is accessible within a 5-minute drive, Pano View Hillside also provides easy access to other beaches such as Nopparatthara Beach and Ao Nang Beach, located just 8 km and 9 km away, respectively.

The nearest supermarkets and local markets on Monday, Tuesday, Friday, and Sunday are about 1.3 km away.

For your dining needs, the nearest restaurant to the accommodation is down the road from the property. It is located about 200 meters away, open from 6 a.m. to late morning/noon, serving Halal food and breakfast, e.g. congee, tea & coffee, and chicken rice. Another restaurant is conveniently located 300 meters close to the property open from 10 a.m. to 9 p.m., serving Thai food, steak, and drinks.

Food delivery services by Grab and Foodpanda are available in the area.
﻿
Krabi Town and Krabi Airport are 20 km and 30 km away.

We have free parking available for you.

During your visit, we recommend renting a scooter or a car (free parking available) because there is no public transportation in the Klong Muang area.

You can also book a taxi (Hyundai VIP minivan for 6 passengers / Toyota Commuter for up to 10 passengers) or tuk-tuk service with us.

We can prepare a baby cot (weight limit: 15 kg) and a high chair at no additional charge, please let us know before the check-in date.

The additional guests can use our extra beds and will be charged 300 baht per person, per night. A total of 5 guests can stay in this 2-bedroom. Please let us know in advance so we can prepare extra beds for you.

The pool man cleans the pool every Wednesday and Saturday from 11.30 a.m. to 12.30 p.m.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Welcome to our place! To comply with Thai law, we kindly ask all non-Thai adults and children to show their passports at check-in. Don't worry, we will take a photo of your passport and report it to Krabi immigration. This helps us ensure that everyone has a safe and comfortable stay.

- We want you to enjoy your stay, but we also ask that you be considerate of other neighbors. If you plan on having a small gathering with your friends and families, please keep the noise down after 10 pm and make sure to use plastic pool cups to avoid any accidents.
- Please be mindful of our keys. If you misplace one, the fee for a replacement is only 100 baht per key.

- Let's save energy together! Please turn off the air conditioning and unplug any appliances when you are not using them and close all doors when you have the AC on. This will help reduce the environmental impact.
- Speaking of the air conditioning, we want you to feel comfortable during your stay. Please set the temperature to 22-25°C (71-77°F) or higher. Also, to prevent water leaks from the AC, please do not turn the AC on all day or at a lower temperature.

- We love our cookware and kitchenware, and we hope you do too! To keep them in good condition, please follow the instructions and be careful not to scratch or damage them. If any damage does occur, we will have to charge a fee of 1000 baht per pot or pan to replace them.

- Let's keep our pipes clear and avoid any clogs! Please do not dump any food scraps, grease, oil, or trash down the sink drain.
- Please use the trash can provided in the bathroom instead of flushing toilet paper. If a toilet does get clogged, we may need your help plunging it, or we will have to charge a fee of 1000 baht to get it fixed.

- We want to keep our place smelling fresh and clean for all our guests, so please only smoke or vape on the balcony. If you smoke inside the unit, we will have to charge a deep cleaning fee of 5000 baht.

Pool Rules
- Please do not bring any glass containers into the pool area and use the bathroom before entering the pool.
- Always shower before and after using the pool and watch your children to make sure they are safe.
- Please be aware that there is no lifeguard on duty, so use the facilities at your own risk.

Last but not least, we hope you have an amazing stay with us!
Please double-check your belongings before checking out, as we are not responsible for any lost or damaged items. Thank you :D
sectionedDescription/interaction:
We will greet you in person. We live 15 minutes away by car.
Please message us anytime during your stay if you have any questions, we can assist you in person if needed.

Relax in spacious living areas, or step outside to enjoy the serene outdoor space, offering shady and relaxing garden view. With three bathrooms, privacy and convenience are guaranteed for you and your guests.

 

Take a refreshing swim in your private pool, surrounded by lush greenery, and revel in the tranquility of our well-maintained garden. The villa includes a fully equipped kitchen, allowing you to prepare meals at your leisure.

name: Villa Macaque
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 7PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Right on Phra Nang beach in the Railay area of Krabi, Thailand, Cowrie Villas are two exclusive tropical minimalist 3-bedroom beachfront villas adjacent to one another, each with expansive bedrooms and each of the villas has their own private pool. One-bedroom rentals are allowed at certain times of the year.
Privately owned and exquisitely staffed, the unique villas are located within the grounds of the exclusive Rayavadee Resort

3 bedrooms are inside the pavilions that make up Villa Macaque. There is a large wooden picnic table for up to a dozen people outside in the centre of the villa’s structure, located on the large deck between the living pavilion and master bedroom, and overlooking the beach.
Monkeys are a regular visitor to both villas.
On one side of the villa is a small terrace and garden, a fence and a gate leading to the beach, on the other side there is a private path that has a boundary of karst stone where you can walk around the back of the villas to the beach.

Guests have direct access to the beach, swimming pool facilities and gardens, surrounded by limestone cliffs and wildlife - including monkeys!

Guests will be greeted and checked in/out on arrival and departure. 
Butler service. 
Concierge service.

Phranang Beach is a must for all holidaymakers in the Krabi region. The spectacular cliffs and the lush greenery at the beach form a fantastic setting. The sand is fine and soft and the colour and the clearness of the water are incredible. Railay, also known as Rai Leh, is a small peninsula between the city of Krabi and Ao Nang in Thailand. It is accessible only by boat due to high limestone cliffs cutting off mainland access.

Transfer charges as follows: 

Krabi International Airport to Ao Nam Mao Beach Pier is THB 800 one way.

Long-tail boat from Ao Nam Mao Beach Pier to our villa on Phra Nang Beach is THB 1200 one way.

*Please note there is an additional charge of THB 300 for the long tail boat after 20:00pm.

**Private speedboat option is available - please contact us if you would like to book this at an additional charge.

Our rooms are non smoking rooms.
Please only smoke in dedicated areas.
No pets allowed.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Quiet hours: 22:00 - 07:00
- No shoes in the house

Guests will be greeted and checked in/out on arrival and departure. 
Butler service. 
Concierge service.

sectionedDescription/notes:
Our rooms are non smoking rooms.
Please only smoke in dedicated areas.
No pets allowed.
sectionedDescription/space:
3 bedrooms are inside the pavilions that make up Villa Macaque. There is a large wooden picnic table for up to a dozen people outside in the centre of the villa’s structure, located on the large deck between the living pavilion and master bedroom, and overlooking the beach.
Monkeys are a regular visitor to both villas.
On one side of the villa is a small terrace and garden, a fence and a gate leading to the beach, on the other side there is a private path that has a boundary of karst stone where you can walk around the back of the villas to the beach.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Right on Phra Nang beach in the Railay area of Krabi, Thailand, Cowrie Villas are two exclusive tropical minimalist 3-bedroom beachfront villas adjacent to one another, each with expansive bedrooms and each of the villas has their own private pool. One-bedroom rentals are allowed at certain times of the year.
Privately owned and exquisitely staffed, the unique villas are located within the grounds of the exclusive Rayavadee Resort
sectionedDescription/transit:
Transfer charges as follows: 

Krabi International Airport to Ao Nam Mao Beach Pier is THB 800 one way.

Long-tail boat from Ao Nam Mao Beach Pier to our villa on Phra Nang Beach is THB 1200 one way.

*Please note there is an additional charge of THB 300 for the long tail boat after 20:00pm.

**Private speedboat option is available - please contact us if you would like to book this at an additional charge.

name: Beachfront Pool Villa
address: A. Koh Yao, Phang Nga, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Free Breakfast, welcome drink, Free selected minibar, Free WIFI

Additional Value for complimentary
Access to Entertainment Library: Books variety of languages, DVD and CD
Free Glass bottled water in room
Evening Entertainment
Bird/Nature watching at resort
Beach games: Volleyball/Badmitton/Soccer/paddleball/petangue/table tennis

The luxurious Beachfront Pool Villa, features a private 7-meter pool leading directly onto the beach. With the ocean views of the Krabi coastline, it comes complete with a private dining facility, personal bar with complimentary carafes of guest’s favourite drinks, a double swing, day beds, and all decorated in a European ‘shabby chic’ style using up-cycled and recycled materials and a colour palette inspired from the jungle and sea. An exceptional space for two.
In the airconditioned bedroom, the grand king-sized bed faces the private pool and beach. A large custom hammock-shaped bath, ‘jungle shower’ and changing room provide a delight to guests. A second bar is set up with their favourite personal selection and another day bed for further comfort and relaxation following the same shabby chic style.

Facilities accessible: Spa, Massage, Yoga, Kayak Rental, Bike Rental, Tour Excursion, Restaurant, 24hr reception

We are 24hr service reception. Guest can book tour/ yoga/ activities with reception desk/ Activities center or ask further assistance.

surrounding with nature, and perfect seaview near restaurant and beach.

Public Transport
TreeHouse Villas is accessible by a series of taxis and public ferries. Scheduled ferries run frequently from Phuket and Krabi to two terminals on Koh Yao Noi. From these terminals, a negotiated price with a local SUV Taxi can then take you the last leg of the trip to TreeHouse Villas in the north of the island. Alternatively, local longtail boats can be hired to transport you directly to the pier at the resort.

Local Taxi and longtail boats provide an interesting way to get around the island, Koh Yao Noi, and help support the local community but these local routes are not for everyone. Ferries can tend to be overcrowded and may not be up to some travellers' expected comfort levels. The roads on Koh Yao Noi can vary from paved to unmaintained jungle trails.
FROM PHUKET
If travelling from Phuket:

Take a taxi from the airport/hotel to Bang Rong Pier (East Coast Pier)
Scheduled longtail boats and speed boats can bring you from Bang Rong Pier to Manoh Pier on Koh Yao Noi’s south coast (Longtails are approx. 120 Baht per person/Speedboats are approx. 300 Baht per person)

From Manoh Pier take a local SUV Taxi through the jungle road to TreeHouse Villas (Estimated starting price 800 Baht per car)

Alternatively, the local longtail boats can be negotiated to bring you direct to the pier at TreeHouse Villas from either Ferry terminal on Phuket or Koh Yao Noi.
FROM KRABI
If travelling from Krabi: 
Take a taxi from the airport/hotel to Tha Lane (Thalen) Pier Krabi
Scheduled longtail boats and speed boats can bring you from Tha Lane (Thalen) to Tha Khao Pier on Koh Yao Noi’s east coast (Longtails are approx.120 Baht per person/Speedboats are approx. 300 Baht per person)
From Tha Khao take a local SUV Taxi through the jungle road to TreeHouse Villas (Estimated starting price 800 Baht per car)
Alternatively, the local longtail boats can be negotiated to bring you direct to the pier at TreeHouse Villas from either Ferry terminal on Krabi or Koh Yao Noi.

Guest can reach villa only in daytime. please make sure that you book the fights match with boat transfer time table.

name: Grand 2 bedrooms Pool Villa, 200sqm - Krabi
address: Tambon Sai Thai, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, it offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi. Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available.

The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities.

Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk.

Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from the resort.

sectionedDescription/description:
Villa rooms are designed in a unique hexagonal shape, inspired by the honeycomb of bees. Very spacious bathrooms and private terraces or balconies open onto lush tropical gardens.

Breakfast Included 
Arrange Twin and Double Bed (Subject on Availability)

- Room Size 48 sqm.
- Balcony
- Detached
- Entire unit located on ground floor
- Air conditioning
- Upper floors accessible by stairs only
- Bathrobe
- Entire unit wheelchair accessible
- Wardrobe/Closet
- Free toiletries

Tham Bok Khorani National Park - 7 km
Gastropo Fossils The World Museum - 15 km
Ao Phang-nga National Park - 16 km
Krabi pier - Klong Jirad - 17 km
Tha Pom Klong Song Nam - 18 km
The Mud Crabs Sculpture - 18 km
Thara Park - 18 km
Alphabet Park - 18 km
Chaofa Park - 19 km
Tsunami Memorial Monument - 19 km

The driving distance between Krabi International Airport KBV to Beyond Krabi is 33 kilometers. It takes approximately 31 minutes to drive from Krabi Airport to Beyond Krabi.
1. From the airport, take Highway 416 south.
2. Turn left onto Highway 4, also known as the coastal road.
3. Follow the coastal road for about 25 kilometers until you reach Klong Muang Beach.
4. Turn right onto Klong Muang Beach Road.
5. Follow Klong Muang Beach Road for about 1 kilometer until you reach Beyond Krabi.

- Children age 2 – 12 years old sharing bed at the same room with adult will be charged at 300 Baht net per child included Breakfast. 
- Extra bed for children age 2 – 12 years old is 1,000 Baht net per child.
- Triple occupancy is a Twin/Double room plus one extra bed at 1,500 THB per night.

- Standard Check In 03:00 PM
- Standard Check Out 12:00 PM
- 13 years old and older will be considered as adult. 
- Pet not allowed

name: 2Bedrooms Presidential Pool Villa, 328sqm - Krabi
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This luxurious resort on East Railay Beach in Krabi is surrounded by the exotic mountain landscape and emerald waves of the Andaman Sea. A 15-minute boat ride from Nam Mao Pier, it has an outdoor pool and rooms with views.

The rooms feature dark wood furnishings. Each room includes a flat-screen TV. Internet access and a balcony with outdoor daybed are included.

Enjoys a location with limestone beaches and mangrove forests nearby. It is a 25-minute boat ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 45-minute long tail boat ride from Krabi Town.

Activities such as snorkelling and island hopping are available and can be arranged via the resort’s tour desk. There is also a well-equipped gym.

sectionedDescription/description:
This luxurious resort on East Railay Beach in Krabi is surrounded by the exotic mountain landscape and emerald waves of the Andaman Sea. A 15-minute boat ride from Nam Mao Pier, it has an outdoor pool and rooms with views.

The rooms feature dark wood furnishings. Each room includes a flat-screen TV. Internet access and a balcony with outdoor daybed are included.

Enjoys a location with limestone beaches and mangrove forests nearby. It is a 25-minute boat ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 45-minute long tail boat ride from Krabi Town.

Activities such as snorkelling and island hopping are available and can be arranged via the resort’s tour desk. There is also a well-equipped gym.

sectionedDescription/description:
****A BRAND NEW EXCLUSIVE POOL ACCESS VILLA ****
The Haven Krabi Exclusive Pool Villa with 2 floor
Self Service Villa, 3-Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, King Bed, 6 Persons
This pool villa is a perfect choice for family, friends or couples traveling together. 
Features:
- 2nd-Story Terrace with limestone mountain view
- Private pool villa, Salt water, small waterfall
-2 Private Parking

*** Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.
*** Free BBQ grill: charcoal

Exclusive villa is a perfect choice for family and friends  traveling together. It is a new exclusive house with better facilities.

Features : 
·	3 Bedrooms access Pool Villa (380 square meters) features with the premium facilities for an affordable luxury getaway in Krabi. 
·	3 bedrooms (which is suitable for 6 but can also accommodate up to 7 people with additional charge at 1,000 Baht/person/night
·	Stylish Europe kitchen and fully kitchenette & kitchenware.
·	Guests can relax in spacious 2 living room with a smart TV home entertainment system with NETFLIX application and comfortable dining area.  
·	The private space features sun loungers and balcony on 2nd floor with panoramic limestone mountain view, as well as a comfortable

*The Villa provide the airport transfer service with private van at 700 THB/van/way for 1-6 persons. (Arrival flight during 10PM-5AM will be charged additional 200 THB)  

**Check-in time is 2-5PM. If you come to check-in after 5PM can be self-check-in: You can access the villa using a key in lockbox with code. We will meet and greet you in the next morning between 9-10 AM.

Entire Home with private access pool and BBQ area and also 2 private parkings

Exclusive pool villa is set in a very quiet and private area. Enjoy the best views in Ao Nang, while having convenient access to the main road. Located on Na Thai Road (Soi Na Thai 3): from the 4 lanes road. 
This prime location is only 5 minutes from Aonang and is easy to reach other beaches; Nopparat Thara Beach, Klong Muang Beach or Railay Beach; City center and attraction areas.

<Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.
<Nearest 7-11 is 1.5 km, 3 min by car (19 min by walk)
<5 minutes to Aonang Center & 10 minutes access to Aonang Beach by car
<20 minutes (15 km) to Krabi Town by car 
<30 minutes (25 km) from Krabi International Airport by car (1 hr by public shuttle bus/van)

<Damage deposit payment is 3,000 Baht by cash at check-in time and will be full refund  when check-out.
<Taxi Service can be requested (charged)
<Nearby store: Makro, 7-11, Tesco, Pharmacy and restaurant can go around by tuk-tuk or motorcycle in 5-10 mins.
<Krabi Town Weekend Night Market taxi service is 1,200 Baht/car/roundtrip. (around 3 hours for shopping)
<Tuk Tuk service in Aonang; to the beach, restaurant, supermarket etc. is start from 300 Baht/way/car
<Car/motorcycle hiring is recommended when stay at villa.
