name: 2Bedroom Villa with 2 Private Pools in Koh Yao Noi
address: ตำบล เกาะยาวน้อย, Phang-nga, Thailand
city: ตำบล เกาะยาวน้อย
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Tranquil 2 Bedroom Villa with Dual Private Pools at Cape Kudu Hotel Koh Yao Noi

Escape to the lap of luxury at Baan Yuyen 2 Bedroom Villa, a hidden gem nestled within the prestigious Cape Kudu Hotel on the captivating Koh Yao Noi island. Experience the perfect blend of modern comfort and tropical charm in this exclusive retreat.

Baan Yuyen (Private Two Bedroom Pool Villa)
Feeling at home, Baan Yu Yen at Cape Kudu Hotel is not your typical luxury two-bedroom pool villa on Koh Yao Noi, or anywhere else. In fact, it's not so much a "villa" as it is a fully furnished abode that feels luxuriously livable. In other words, it’s your own actual holiday home and offers 1,315 sqm. of familiar comforts. This home-away-from-home consists of two annexes, each with their own spacious bedrooms, linked by an open terrace. Each bedroom annex has its own restroom, bathroom and yes, a private pool (that's not one, but 2pools).

Room facilities and services:
- Spacious bedrooms with spacious living room.
- 2 Private Pools
- Extensive private garden
- Expansive terrace with sun loungers
- Dining area with fully-equipped kitchenette.
- Individual Air conditioning system
- Widescreen LCD TVs with cable
- DVD player
- Smart Box
- Tea and coffee-making facilities
- Hair dryer
- Spacious rain shower and bath tub
- Luxury bathroom amenity set
- Full range of linen and towels
- In-room safety deposit box
- Free in-room Wi-Fi
- Key card system to ensure your safety
- No Pets allowed.

Baan Yu Yen Special Privileges:
- Daily exotic buffet breakfast at Hornbill Restaurant
- Complimentary bottle of sparkling wine & seasonal fruit upon arrival
- Complimentary morning basket of selected fresh pastries, a fruit platter and juice
- Complimentary selected mini bar (except wines and spirits), replenished daily
- Complimentary daily afternoon snack
- Complimentary laundry service (except dry cleaning)

Follow these steps:
1. Contact our staff :  Reach out our fron office team when arrive at Cape Kudu Hotel
2. Check-In Procedure: Upon arrival at Cape Kudu Hotel, you will likely go through a check-in procedure where you'll receive keys and relevant information about your stay, including access to Baan Yuyen 2 Bedroom Pool Villa.
3. Enjoy Your Stay: We provide everything you need to enjoy your days in a tropical paradise.

Welcome to Baan Yuyen 2 Bedroom Pool Villa at Cape Kudu Hotel on Koh Yao Noi !

We want your stay with us to be as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. If you have any questions, concerns, or require assistance during your visit, please don't hesitate to reach out. Simply use the message box provided in your villa, and we'll be more than happy to help in any way we can.

Cape Kudu Hotel

Welcome to Baan Yuyen Pool Villa, your tranquil oasis on the serene island of Koh Yao Noi. Nestled amidst lush tropical greenery, our villa is located in a peaceful neighborhood that offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. Here, you'll discover the true essence of island living.

Local Dining:
Just a short stroll from Baan Yuyen, you'll find charming local eateries where you can savor authentic Thai cuisine. Experience the tantalizing flavors of freshly caught seafood, aromatic curries, and delectable street food. Engage with friendly locals and immerse yourself in the island's culinary delights.

Beach Bliss:
Koh Yao Noi boasts some of the region's most picturesque beaches. From our villa, it's an easy walk to the beachfront, where you can enjoy the soft sands and breathtaking sunsets. Whether you're lounging with a book or taking a leisurely swim, the beach is your haven of relaxation.

Adventure Awaits:
For the adventurous spirit, Koh Yao Noi offers an array of activities. Embark on a kayaking expedition through the iconic limestone karsts of Phang Nga Bay, or explore the island's hidden caves and lush mangroves. The villa's convenient location ensures you're never far from thrilling adventures.

Island Exploration:
Discover the island's unique charm by renting a scooter or bicycle. Cruise through scenic landscapes, visit traditional fishing villages, and encounter the island's warm-hearted residents. Koh Yao Noi's slow-paced lifestyle will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Local Markets:
Immerse yourself in the island's vibrant culture by visiting the local markets. Here, you can shop for handmade crafts, fresh produce, and unique souvenirs. Engage with local artisans and gain insight into the island's rich heritage.

Tranquil Retreat:
After a day of exploration, return to Baan Yuyen Pool Villa, your private sanctuary. Unwind by the pool, surrounded by lush gardens, and soak up the serenity. Our villa is designed to provide the ultimate relaxation experience, allowing you to disconnect from the world and reconnect with yourself.

Baan Yuyen Pool Villa invites you to experience the beauty and tranquility of Koh Yao Noi. Whether you seek adventure or seek solace, our neighborhood offers it all. Your island getaway begins here.

Book your stay at Baan Yuyen Pool Villa and create memories that will last a lifetime.

Getting to Baan Yuyen Pool Villa at Cape Kudu Hotel on the enchanting island of Koh Yao Noi is a seamless and picturesque journey. Whether you're arriving by air, sea, or land, we've got you covered to ensure your arrival is as smooth as your stay.

Please contact us via AirBnb message for airport pickup transfer.

Airport pickup transfer from Phuket International Airport to Cape Kudu Hotel
(Private car + Join boat + Shuttle Tuktuk)
Price at THB2,600 for 2 persons per way,  (you can settle at property when arrive.)

Exploring the Island:
Once you're on Koh Yao Noi, getting around is a breeze. For those seeking an independent adventure, renting a scooter or bicycle is a popular choice. 
The island's well-maintained roads and minimal traffic make it a safe and enjoyable experience.

The tropical island of Koh Yao Noi where our Cape Kudu Hotel is located, is just off the coast of Phuket, making the Phuket International Airport the closest airport to Koh Yao Noi. Getting to Koh Yao Noi from the Phuket Airport is a 20-minute taxi or limousine and a 30-minute speedboat ride.

Public Boat Transfer Phuket - Koh Yao Noi

Time From Bang Rong Pier (Phuket)
08.40 Speedboat
11.00 Speedboat
12.30 Long-tail boat
13.30 Speedboat
14.30 Speedboat
16.00 Speedboat
17.00 Speedboat

Time From Manoh Pier (Koh Yao Noi)
06.35 Speedboat
08.00 Long-tail boat
10.00 Speedboat
11.30 Speedboat
13.00 Speedboat
14.30 Speedboat
16.00 Speedboat

Airport pickup transfer services;
1. Semi-Private Transfer (Private car + Join boat + Shuttle Tuktuk)
Airport pickup transfer from Phuket International Airport to Cape Kudu Hotel
Price at THB2,600 for 2 persons per way, (you can settle at property when arrive)

2. Private Transfer (Private car + Private boat + Shuttle Tuktuk)
Airport pickup transfer from Phuket International Airport to Cape Kudu Hotel
Price at THB 12,000 for maximum 6 persons per way.

Please contact us via AirBnb message for reservations

sectionedDescription/description:
Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, it offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi. Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available.

The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities.

Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk.

Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from the resort.

sectionedDescription/description:
Offering hillside accommodation with beautiful ocean views, it is located on Phi Phi Island’s Long Beach. It features snorkelling and kayaking facilities, and an outdoor pool.

The property is a 2-hour 30-minute journey from Phuket and Krabi Airports. The trip includes land and sea transfers.

Featuring teak wood furnishings and private balconies, rooms  come with satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms provide hot and cold water.

Guests can sign up for an excursion at the tour desk, then enjoy a traditional Thai massage after a day of sightseeing. Laundry service is available.

An American buffet breakfast is served daily at the coffee shop. Thai, Western and seafood dishes can be sampled at the resort’s restaurant. The beach bar offers cocktails.

name: Family sea view bungalow in Koh Phi Phi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 12PM (noon) - 9PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Located at Pak Nam Beach on the beautiful island of Koh Phi Phi, this hillside bungalow offers stunning ocean views and easy access to the beach. Surrounded by tropical gardens, this stylish bungalow includes AC, free WiFi, an en suite bathroom and a private balcony with breathtaking views of the tropical landscape.
This resort is located a 20 minute boat trip from Tonsai Pier, with boat transfers available to and from the resort daily.

The property is  conveniently located Ran Ti Bay and Lo Bao Kao Bay, a 20 minute boat ride from the main pier on Phi Phi Island, with boat transfers available 4 times a day at an extra charge.

The bungalow comes with simple Thai-style furnishings, featuring a thatched roof and bamboo walls and includes an extra large double bed, en suite bathroom, private balcony, AC and all the amenities you will need for your stay.

Located moments away from the tranquil Pak Nam Beach, guests can enjoy snorkelling at the colourful reef, rent out a kayak or relax in a deck chair or hammock and appreciate the stunning views of the neighbouring islands. Pampering massages and fishing trips are also available, just contact with our friendly staff and they will help with any of your needs.
For more adventure guests can follow the trail through the jungle and into the main town area.

The resort also provides a restaurant on the beach which serves a free breakfast every morning as well as lunch and dinner options, offering Thai and Western dishes. Refreshing cocktails and fruit juices are also available at the beach bar.

address: A. Koh Yao, Phang Nga, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Free Breakfast, welcome drink, Free WIFI 
Additional Value for complimentary
Access to Entertainment Library: Books variety of languages, DVD and CD
Free Glass bottled water in room
Evening Entertainment
Bird/Nature watching at resort
Beach games: Volleyball/Badmitton/Soccer/paddleball/petangue/table tennis

This luxurious 390sq.m. two-storey villa features two identical master bedrooms, two living areas, a private 12 metre infinity edge pool with additional deck area, a separate plunge pool and private sala. Decoated in a European ‘shabby chic’ style using up-cycled and recycled materials and a colour palette inspired from the jungle. Equipped with a kitchen and bar this villa is ideal for small groups seeking a secluded getaway. Enjoy all the In-Villa luxuries including spa treatments, in-villa dining, and in-villa private yoga sessions. A truly exceptional space for up to four adults.

Each air-conditioned bedroom is equipped with a grand king-sized bed that looks over the stunning bay to the colossal limestone cliff face. In addition, each bedroom has their own bathroom with a private jacuzzi/bath. With its breathtaking heavenly views, which is amongst the most spectacular in Thailand, staying in the Hilltop Pool Villa will truly make you believe in the existence of Paradise on Earth.

Restaurant, Pool, Spa, Boat trip, Steam room, Private Beach. BBQ in villa with additional cost.

We are 24hr service reception. Guest can book tour/ yoga/ activities with reception desk/ Activities center or ask further assistance.

surrounding with nature, and perfect seaview near restaurant and beach.

Public Transport
TreeHouse Villas is accessible by a series of taxis and public ferries. Scheduled ferries run frequently from Phuket and Krabi to two terminals on Koh Yao Noi. From these terminals, a negotiated price with a local SUV Taxi can then take you the last leg of the trip to TreeHouse Villas in the north of the island. Alternatively, local longtail boats can be hired to transport you directly to the pier at the resort.

Local Taxi and longtail boats provide an interesting way to get around the island, Koh Yao Noi, and help support the local community but these local routes are not for everyone. Ferries can tend to be overcrowded and may not be up to some travellers' expected comfort levels. The roads on Koh Yao Noi can vary from paved to unmaintained jungle trails.
FROM PHUKET
If travelling from Phuket:

Take a taxi from the airport/hotel to Bang Rong Pier (East Coast Pier)
Scheduled longtail boats and speed boats can bring you from Bang Rong Pier to Manoh Pier on Koh Yao Noi’s south coast (Longtails are  approx. 120 Baht per person/Speedboats are approx. 300 Baht per person)

From Manoh Pier take a local SUV Taxi through the jungle road to TreeHouse Villas (Estimated starting price 800 Baht per car)

Alternatively, the local longtail boats can be negotiated to bring you direct to the pier at TreeHouse Villas from either Ferry terminal on Phuket or Koh Yao Noi.
FROM KRABI
If travelling from Krabi: 
Take a taxi from the airport/hotel to Tha Lane (Thalen) Pier Krabi
Scheduled longtail boats and speed boats can bring you from Tha Lane (Thalen) to Tha Khao Pier on Koh Yao Noi’s east coast (Longtails are approx. 120 Baht per person/Speedboats are approx. 300 Baht per person)
From Tha Khao take a local SUV Taxi through the jungle road to TreeHouse Villas (Estimated starting price 800 Baht per car)
Alternatively, the local longtail boats can be negotiated to bring you direct to the pier at TreeHouse Villas from either Ferry terminal on Krabi or Koh Yao Noi.

Guest can reach villa only in daytime. please make sure that you book the fights match with boat transfer time table.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: This is Adults only property, we allow guests at age of 16 years old and above.  no extra bed provided. no pet allowed.
sectionedDescription/interaction: We are 24hr service reception. Guest can book tour/ yoga/ activities with reception desk/ Activities center or ask further assistance.
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: surrounding with nature, and perfect seaview near restaurant and beach.
sectionedDescription/notes: Guest can reach villa only in daytime. please make sure that you book the fights match with boat transfer time table.

name: Amazing property by the sea; private pool & beach
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
The entire place can be privatized (with a maximum of 22 people- 18 + 4 extra beds) for friends & friends gatherings, parties, team buildings, seminars or workshops…

8 air-conditioned bungalows: 1 single bedroom, 2 family bedrooms (2 adults + 2 kids each), 1 family room for 3, 2 double rooms, 2 twin rooms (that can be arranged in double rooms too). 3 extra beds can be added. There is a swimming pool, a beach, a safe in each room, and hot water.

You can use all the premises: swimming pool, beach, garden, lobby with wifi ...

We will be here to assist you if needed. Our team can speak Thai, French and English and can help you organize excursions, book a massage, rent a motorbike…

Our place is far from the crowds, and very close to the main points of interest: kayaking in the mangrove, boat tours in the nearby islands, waterfalls... We are hidden in a small authentic Thai fishermen village, quietly nestled in Thalane Bay. It's also an ideal stopover if your schedule does not allow you to take the last ferry to/from Koh Yao Noi & Koh Yao Yai islands.

We can arrange your transfers on request. 
If you come with your own vehicle, please contact us in advance so we can give you all the necessary information. (approx. 30-40 minutes from Krabi airport or bus station...).

There are stairs going to the beach. So the place may not be suitable for people having walking problems.
Swimming in the sea is only possible during high tide.
No nudity please.
sectionedDescription/interaction: We will be here to assist you if needed. Our team can speak Thai, French and English and can help you organize excursions, book a massage, rent a motorbike…
sectionedDescription/name: Amazing property by the sea; private pool & beach
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Our place is far from the crowds, and very close to the main points of interest: kayaking in the mangrove, boat tours in the nearby islands, waterfalls... We are hidden in a small authentic Thai fishermen village, quietly nestled in Thalane Bay. It's also an ideal stopover if your schedule does not allow you to take the last ferry to/from Koh Yao Noi & Koh Yao Yai islands.
sectionedDescription/notes:
There are stairs going to the beach. So the place may not be suitable for people having walking problems.
Swimming in the sea is only possible during high tide.
No nudity please.
sectionedDescription/space: 8 air-conditioned bungalows: 1 single bedroom, 2 family bedrooms (2 adults + 2 kids each), 1 family room for 3, 2 double rooms, 2 twin rooms (that can be arranged in double rooms too). 3 extra beds can be added. There is a swimming pool, a beach, a safe in each room, and hot water.
sectionedDescription/summary: The entire place can be privatized (with a maximum of 22 people- 18 + 4 extra beds) for friends & friends gatherings, parties, team buildings, seminars or workshops…
sectionedDescription/transit:
We can arrange your transfers on request. 
If you come with your own vehicle, please contact us in advance so we can give you all the necessary information. (approx. 30-40 minutes from Krabi airport or bus station...).

sectionedDescription/description: Découvrez le paradis des îles de Krabi lors d'une croisière de rêve à bord de notre catamaran habitable Lagoon 470 ! Une escapade parfaite pour des vacances en famille, une aventure entre amis ou une escapade romantique.

name: 5 bedroom 5 bathroom Pool Villa in Krabi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to our stunning villa nestled in the heart of Krabi, Thailand. Built with high-quality materials and attention to detail, our villa offers a luxurious retreat for families and groups seeking comfort and relaxation.
Exploring Krabi from here is a real pleasure. Upon returning home you can relax in our 2,500 sqm garden, bordered by a stream and tropical lush nature. You can enjoy the infinity pool, BBQ, play badminton and even practice your putt on our putting green golf.

The main pool villa has 350 sqm with 4 bedrooms, each featuring ensuite bathrooms for added convenience.
A guest house with it's bathroom provides extra capacity and privacy to additional guests.

Upon arrival, guests will have full access to the following areas:

Main Living Spaces: Enjoy the comfort of the entire house, including the spacious living room, cozy dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. Feel free to relax on the sofa, gather around the dining table, or prepare your favorite meals with ease.

Bedrooms: Rest peacefully in any of our 5 bedrooms, each furnished with comfortable beds, fresh linens, and ample storage space for your belongings. Whether you're traveling solo, with family, or friends, there's a cozy spot for everyone to unwind.

Bathrooms: Freshen up in one of our 5 clean and well-appointed bathrooms. Towels, toiletries, and a hairdryer are provided for your convenience.

Outdoor Area: Step outside to our garden and pool deck and soak in the sunshine or enjoy a breath of fresh air. The deck is furnished with an outdoor table, perfect for relaxing with a morning coffee or evening dinner.

Additional Amenities: Guests are welcome to utilize our laundry facilities and parking spaces.

We strive to provide a seamless and comfortable experience for our guests, so if there's anything specific you need during your stay, please don't hesitate to let us know. Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities.
sectionedDescription/name: 5 bedroom 5 bathroom Pool Villa in Krabi
sectionedDescription/space:

A guest house with it's bathroom provides extra capacity and privacy to additional guests.

name: Beautiful 3BDR Pool Villa (A2)
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to Villa Palavee, where comfort and convenience await!   

Our space is a family-friendly holiday home and in easy walking distance to the Noppharat Beach and perfectly located for dining, shopping or taking in the best islands by long tail boats for the National parks of the Andaman sea. You’ll love our place because of the location, the ambiance and service provided.

Our Villa Palavee is a beautifully designed, spacious, and private villa. The house boasts its own private pool, nestled amidst stunning Thai flora and fauna, creating a serene and relaxing environment for all to enjoy.

Situated between Nopparat Thara Beach and the quaint village of Klong Haeng, this 3-bedroom garden-view villa offers a perfect blend of comfort and tranquility. The harmonious marriage of contemporary Thai architecture and modern comforts creates a luxurious home in a serene environment.

Whether you seek quality time with family, a romantic escape, or pure indulgence in luxury, Villa Palavee is the place to make your wishes come true. Inside, you'll find stylish air-conditioned bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, hidden under high roofs to ensure a blissful night's sleep as soon as your head hits the pillow.

It's absolutely ideal for a bigger group of families or friends.

At Villa Palavee, our valued guests enjoy exclusive access to the entire villa without any shared spaces. You'll have the privacy and freedom to make the most of your stay, with no need to worry about sharing facilities or common areas with others.

I love meeting my guests whenever possible, but even if I can't be there, rest assured that our English-speaking Villa Manager, Mrs. Prakong or my co-Host Soony, will warmly welcome you upon arrival. They'll personally guide you through the property and be available throughout your stay to assist with anything you need. 

Our Villa Manager, Mrs. Prakong,  is also ready to help with a variety of services, from arranging exciting excursions to recommending fantastic restaurants in Krabi. Your comfort and enjoyment are our top priorities, and we're here to make your stay exceptional.

We're close to Noppharat Thara Beach, a 5km-long beach next to Ao Nang, separated by a river. Locally known as Klong Haeng or 'dry river,' it's famous for its low tide, allowing you to walk to small islands. The nearest village, also named Klong Haeng, is about 300m away. 

Guests often take a tuk-tuk to Ao Nang for dining, but there are also great restaurants and bars along the beach.

AO NANG LANDMARK BEACH PLAZA: Our private villa compound is just a stone's throw away from this modern beachfront community. Stretching almost 400 meters along the shoreline, it offers a wide range of lifestyle activities. Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere, night food market with local delicacies, restaurants, shops, a Seven Eleven convenience store, entertainment venues, a gym, charming coffee shops, and various other amenities for your pleasure.

VILLA SHUTTLE SERVICE
Enjoy 2 free single trips daily, available from 8 am to 10 pm, to/from the center of Ao Nang Beach. For longer trips, tours, and transportation after hours, our Villa Manager can arrange them anytime at a reasonable charge.

CAR / MOTORBIKE RENTALS
Your Villa Manager can assist you with daily rentals of car or motorbikes.

DISTANCE FROM VILLA TO :
Noppharat Thara Beach (10-15 walking minutes) (2 driving minutes)
Ao Nang Beach (5 driving minutes)
ATM & Banks, Exchange (5 driving minutes)
Various restaurants (5 driving minutes)
Groceries (5 driving minutes) 7-11, Family Mart (open 24hrs)
Fresh Markets (5-10 driving minutes)
Tesco-Lotus Express (10 driving minutes)
Makro Cash&Carry (10 driving minutes)
Pharmacies (5 driving minutes)
Medical Clinic (5 driving minutes)
Krabi Town (15km, 20 driving minutes)
Krabi International Airport (25km, 30 driving minutes)

SWIMMING POOL
8m x 4m swimming pool (depth 140m - 1.80m) 

BEDROOMS
All bedrooms are fully air-conditioned for your comfort

BATHROOMS
Enjoy complimentary soap, shampoo, hairdryer, and towels (including pool and beach towels) in all bathrooms like in a hotel

LIVING AREA
Relax in the air-conditioned living and dining area with high ceiling fans

COMMUNICATION
Stay connected with unlimited free Wi-Fi, and our Villa Manager is available throughout your stay

ENTERTAINMENT
Enjoy your favorite shows and movies with the Smart TV and Netflix app

SAFETY BOX
For your peace of mind, each bedroom contains a safety box

NEAREST BEACH
Villa Raeya is just a 10 minutes walk from Noppharat Thara Beach, situated next to the famous tourist destination "Ao Nang Beach"

FOOD AND BEVERAGE / GROCERIES
In our area, you'll find various local markets along with convenient options like Tesco-Lotus Express and smaller grocery stores, offering a diverse selection of local and international products. For more extensive shopping, you can visit Cash & Carry stores like MAKRO, as well as BigC Mall and Tesco Lotus Mall, situated just outside Krabi Town. You can easily purchase everyday essentials such as drinking water, bread, pasta, cereal, muesli, milk, eggs, bacon, sausage, Nutella, jam, butter, rice, fruits, vegetables, noodle soups, soft drinks, water, wine, and beer in the vicinity.

COMPLIMENTARY SERVICES & FACILITIES
* Enjoy 2 free single trips daily, available from 8 am to 10 pm, to/from the center of Ao Nang Beach. 
* Maid cleaning is provided
* Change of linen is provided
* Soap and shampoo provided in all bathrooms
* Villa Manager 
* Gardener & Pool cleaner
* 1 box of complimentary coffee (capsule but not Nespresso) on arriving day 
* Free wireless internet access
* Fully equipped kitchen for cooking
* Baby cot available (on request)
* Baby chair available (on request)
* Towel and pool/beach towel available
* Sundeck with sun loungers and private pool
* BBQ station in the garden (on request)
* Private car parking
* Laundry service available (price per kg)
* Ironing board and iron available
* Electricity and water included in the rental
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
NOISE
Keep noise to a minimum after 10 PM

SMOKING
Being a family home, we also have a no smoking policy (although you are welcome to smoke out front).

ELECTRICITY
To keep our costs down we kindly ask that you switch off lights and the A/C when leaving the house. 

OCCUPANCY
We understand that for a whole verity of reasons, you may want additional guests to stay in the place. In the event that you want additional guests to stay, please contact us to let us know. We’re reasonable folk and will accommodate wherever possible.

ILLICIT DRUGS
What you do in your personal time is entirely up to you, but when staying at our place we have a strict no drug use policy. This is just the law… not so much one of our rules.

LATE CHECKOUT POLICY
Please note that late checkout is subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed. If you require a late checkout, we kindly ask that you request it in advance. In the event that a late checkout is possible, an additional fee of 1,000 THB per hour will apply to cover the costs associated with space, electricity, and water usage. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

sectionedDescription/description:
Twin Bay Resort is absolute bare feet beach front living. Located on the northern end of Klong Dao Beach in the secluded Kaw Kwang Bay, Twin Bay nestles in a peaceful spot away from the crowds but also not far from them if you want more than peace and relaxation

At Twin Bay the emphasis is on rest, relaxation and the comfort of each guest in a casual non intrusive manner. All of the rooms are set in tropical gardens giving both privacy and a back to nature feeling. In addition you will find that all our staff has a 'can do' attitude to ensure a fun and relaxed experience. The Twin Bay team is always on hand to give you a great holiday

We are opening year round, just we have mainly two season Green Season and High Season.

Our Resort is near the peir of daily tour and we are fully beach sand on Kow kaow Beach with stuning of sunset.

Are are able to work along the beach to the neighbor hotel near by or you can working along main road as well as we have motorcycle for rent, you can drive to everywhere you want.

We are located in Aonang area; surrounding with lot of restaurants.

You can take 5 minutes walk to the shopping area and 7 minutes walk to the beach.

address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description: Escape today’s digital world with your family and reconnect amongst nature where eco-activities offer brand new experiences that you can all share together. Featuring two separate bedrooms, each with their own en-suite bathroom, in-villa bathtub and balcony.

sectionedDescription/description:
Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, it offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi. Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available.

The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities.

Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk.

Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from the resort.

name: Honeymoon Ocean View Villa with Bathtub @ Koh Jum
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Composed of 42 sq.m. living area, Deluxe rooms offer a spacious and intimate haven for relaxation. Take in the breath-taking seaview and garden view from the private balcony, soak up the sun, and pamper yourself under the indulgent in-room rain shower. A calming and comfortable escape.

This bungalow has a balcony, electric kettle and sea view.

This Villa is perfect for your special time.

Bathtub, Terrace,

- Restuarant & Bar
- Spa Massage
- Ting Rai Beach, Koh Pu Beach,

- working hour from 06.00am - 22.00pm 
- Passport requested upon check in time
-

- Near Magic beach just walking  along the beach for 5 minutes.

ทางเลือกที่ 1 เรือโดยสารหางยาวสาธารณะ
จากทางเจ้าหน้าที่อำเภอเหนือคลองขับตรงไปยังท่าเรือแหลมหินประมาน 17 ไม่เป็นไรคะ ถึงท่าเรือแล้วฝากรถที่ร้านค้าที่ติดกับท่าเรือได้เลย ประมานวันละ 60 บาทคะ จะได้ลงเรือรอบไหนให้ แจ้งมานะคะแอดมินจะได้จัดคนรถไปรอรับที่ท่าเรือมูตูฝั่งเกาะจำเราคะ.

ทางเลือกที่ 2 เรือโดยสารหางยาวแบบส่วนตัว
จากท่าเรือแหลมหินขึ้นมาตอบโต้รีสอทได้ราคาจะอยู่ที่ 2,200 บาท/สี่ท่าน ถ้าเกินจำนวนจะถูกคิดเพิ่มท่านละ 250 บาทคะ

ทางเลือกที่ 3 กรณีลงเครื่องสำหรับกระบี่
รถตู้ของทางรีสอทรอรับลูกค้าและขับมาส่งที่ท่าเรือแหลมหิน ต่อไปนี้คงต้องตามด้วยเรือหางยาวแบบส่วนตัวขับตรงมาส่งปะทะชายหาดของรีสอทกันแล้ว ไม่ต้องเดินขึ้น - ลงที่ถนนหลักเลยค่ะ ราคาจะอยู่ที่ 3,200 บาทเองคะ

หมายเหตุเล็กน้อยคะว่า : กรณีที่มากับเรือหางยาวแบบส่วนตัวแน่นอนว่าทางเลือที่ 1 หรือ 2 นั้นอ้างอิงจากปริมาณน้ำขึ้นน้ำลงด้วยในกรณีที่น้ำลงมากๆ เรือที่เข้าเทียบท่าได้ แต่ จะพาคุณลูกค้าไปขึ้นที่ท่าเรือมูตูแทน และเราจัดคนรถไปรอรับที่ท่าเรือมูตูเพื่อมาเช็คอินคะ

- Extra Bed can be add into this room @ 800THB /night
- Sea Excursion ( Phi Phi, Koh Lanta, 4 Island Talay Waek) extra pay
- Local Monkey are around this area, they are no harmfull but poease be careful about your food and please do not feed them.
- Beach bar & Restuarant are open from 06.00 - 22.00pm located on the beach

address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Junior Suite Corner offer a contemporary style suites take on our popular Grand Deluxe design featuring an open and airy upper floor living plan with tropical scenery garden greenery on our spacious accommodation and comfortable suites feature.

Railay Princess Resort and Spa is located directly on the Railay Floating Pier with a stunning view of the limestone cliffs in Railay Beach in the right on East side of beach. Railay Beach is the most popular beach as well as of the rock climbing in Krabi, with white sand beaches and the transparent Andaman Sea. Krabi International Airport is only 40 minutes away from Railay Princess Resort and Spa.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Railay Princess Resort and Spa is located directly on the Railay Floating Pier with a stunning view of the limestone cliffs in Railay Beach in the right on East side of beach. name: Front Side Deluxe, 50sqm at Phi Phi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Offering hillside accommodation with beautiful ocean views, it is located on Phi Phi Island’s Long Beach. It features snorkelling and kayaking facilities, and an outdoor pool.

The property is a 2-hour 30-minute journey from Phuket and Krabi Airports. The trip includes land and sea transfers.

Featuring teak wood furnishings and private balconies, rooms  come with satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms provide hot and cold water.

Guests can sign up for an excursion at the tour desk, then enjoy a traditional Thai massage after a day of sightseeing. Laundry service is available.

An American buffet breakfast is served daily at the coffee shop. Thai, Western and seafood dishes can be sampled at the resort’s restaurant. The beach bar offers cocktails.

sectionedDescription/description:
The unique new 3BDR grand pool villa in the private mountain view scenario in Aonang, Krabi. Same quality with our other listings, just different styles.  Feeling like visit your friends and family when you are with us. Don't need to plan anything, our lovely sisters will take care and recomended the best trip for you!

·	3 Bedrooms pool Villa (280 square meters) which is suitable for 6
·	kitchen and fully kitchenette & kitchenware.
·	living room with a smart TV home entertainment system with NETFLIX application and comfortable dining area.  

* Free Shuttle Service 4 Times / Day. Service Area: Makro, Tesco, Aonang Beach.

** Free BBQ grill: charcoal

***Airport transfer service with private van at 700 THB/van/way for 1-8 persons. 

****Check-in time is 2-5PM. If you come to check-in after 5PM can be self-check-in: You can access the villa using a key in lockbox with code. We will meet and greet you in the next morning between 9-10 AM.

A whole property

You can talk with us by online group which we will add before arriving in Krabi.

sectionedDescription/description:
This luxurious resort on East Railay Beach in Krabi is surrounded by the exotic mountain landscape and emerald waves of the Andaman Sea. A 15-minute boat ride from Nam Mao Pier, it has an outdoor pool and rooms with views.

The rooms feature dark wood furnishings. Each room includes a flat-screen TV. Internet access and a balcony with outdoor daybed are included.

Enjoys a location with limestone beaches and mangrove forests nearby. It is a 25-minute boat ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 45-minute long tail boat ride from Krabi Town.

Activities such as snorkelling and island hopping are available and can be arranged via the resort’s tour desk. There is also a well-equipped gym.

sectionedDescription/description:
Nestled amidst lush tropical gardens, features cosy cottages and an outdoor pool, a 5-minute ride from Ao Nang Beach. It has a tour desk and free Wi-Fi, which is available in all areas.

Boasting a private balcony with garden views, each cottage comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV  and a seating area. An electric kettle and a fridge are included. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities and a hairdryer.

It is a 15-minute drive from Nopparat Tara Beach. Krabi Airport is a 30-minute ride away. On-site parking in available for drivers.

sectionedDescription/description:
Junior Suite Corner
Total 4 Units
Room size 44 sqm.
Double bed or Twin beds available

Junior Suite Corner offer a contemporary style suites take on our popular Grand Deluxe design featuring an open and airy upper floor living plan with tropical scenery garden greenery on our spacious accommodation and comfortable suites feature.

Railay Princess Resort and Spa is located directly on the Railay Floating Pier with a stunning view of the limestone cliffs in Railay Beach in the right on East side of beach. Railay Beach is the most popular beach as well as of the rock climbing in Krabi, with white sand beaches and the transparent Andaman Sea. Krabi International Airport is only 40 minutes away from Railay Princess Resort and Spa.

Mood & Tone Suite

Color's influence our mood and affect us depending on age, gender, ethnic background and climate. At Colors we let you select your favourite color mood from your phone to make your stay individually colorful.

Savour split-level living with personality and style. This intelligent design allows space for ‘me’ time as well as ‘we’ time. Relax, reconnect, and rekindle romance.

Get an elevated perspective on your Krabi escape.

24 Hours Reception Available To Ensure Guest Comfort And Attend To Any Requests

Located 5 minutes walk from Ao Nang Beach

name: The Unique Krabi Private Pool Villa
address: Tambon Ao Nang, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
วิลล่าสุดหรูในอ่าวนางในสไตล์ไทยประยุกต์ เหมาะมากสำหรับการพักผ่อนที่แท้จริงในบรรยากาศที่โอบล้อมไปด้วยธรรมชาติที่จัดสรรอย่างลงตัว วิลล่ามี 3 ห้องนอน 4 ห้องน้ำ ห้องนั่งเล่น ห้องรับประทานอาหาร ห้องครัว ฟรีไวไฟและสระว่ายน้ำส่วนตัวแบบจากุซซี่

ห้องพักตกแต่งหรูหราพร้อมห้องน้ำส่วนตัว ห้องนั่งเล่น ห้องรับประทานอาหาร ห้องครัวที่อุปกรณ์พร้อมสำหรับปรุงแต่งอาหารรสเลิศ สระว่ายน้ำแบบจากุซซี่ ฟรีไวไฟ มีที่พักผ่อนหย่อยใจหลากหลาย โต๊ะและเก้าอี้บริเวณสระว่ายน้ำ ระเบียงด้านบนทั้งหน้าและหลังห้องนอนกว้างขวาง เรียกว่าใช้พื้นที่ได้อย่างคุ้มค่าทุกส่วนในวิลล่า มีสวนในวิลล่าทำให้รู้สึกผ่อนคลาย ไม่ไกลจากหาดอ่าวนางซึ่งเป็นหาดที่เพียบพร้อมสำหรับนักท่องเที่ยว

ทางเรามีมือถือส่วนตัวที่จะให้ลูกค้าแต่ละวิลล่าเพื่อติดต่อกับ ผู้ช่วยส่วนตัว ( Personal Assistant ) ได้ตลอดเวลา

จากหาดอ่าวนางประมาณ 4 กิโลเมตร สามารถเดินทางไปได้อย่างสะดวก ทางวิลล่ามีรถบริการ 2 ครั้งต่อวันสามารถเลือกเวลาได้เอง ตั้งแต่เวลา 07.00 - 22.00 น.

address: Tambon Sai Thai, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, it offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi. Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available.

The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities.

Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk.

Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from the resort.

name: Baan Ping Tara Combo Pool Villas
address: ตำบล อ่าวนาง, กระบี่, Thailand
city: ตำบล อ่าวนาง
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to our Combo villas (2 villas; each has 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom, private pool). 

We offer the following FREE services/amenities:
1.  Free scooter
2. Wi-Fi in all areas
3. Air conditioning throughout villa
4. Filtered drinking water
5. Washing machine & soap
6. Completely stocked western kitchen
7. BBQ grill -request
8. TV (Smart 48” LCD)
9. Stereo/CD/DVD/Bluetooth
10. Safe box
11. Housekeeping every 2 days
12. Towels & toiletries
13. Secure Parking
14. Villa caretaker
15. Coffee/tea

Both villas are a 120-square meter detached 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom with separate entrance and pool, sleeping 8-10 guests in total; (use existing beds). They are fully equipped and walled for your convenience and privacy.

Super comfortable beds and linen; teak furniture, black-out curtains, air conditioning, ceiling fan, desk, side tables and lamps complete each bedroom. In one villa, one bedroom has an ensuite bathroom and two twin beds and the other has a king bed and private entrance to the guest bathroom (which can be locked off to make it ensuite as well). 
In the second villa, one bedroom has an ensuite bathroom and a king bed and the other has a king bed and private entrance to the guest bathroom (which can be locked off to make it ensuite as well). 

Entertain, cook and enjoy in the heart of the open concept villa; the well supplied western kitchen, fitted out with a gas range, granite counters, filtered drinking water, full-sized fridge, microwave oven, toaster etc.; prep island and two bar stools. There is a washing machine and clothes rack beside the house in both villas.

Watch some TV or Netflix on the 48” LCD screen from the plush full-sized sofa or take in the pool view from the dining room. An outdoor dining set, charcoal BBQ (on request) and one sun lounge per villa are also provided.

You will have complete and private access to the entire villa, pool and terrace. Nothing is shared with other guests.

We live nearby so will show you around the villa and make sure you settle in without any issues. We are more or less available 16/7 to give advice about the beaches, restaurants and nightlife in the area. We can arrange good discounted tickets to trips such as snorkeling, kayaking, sightseeing tours.

We are only 10 minutes' drive away from Ao Nang beach and 4 other stunning beaches. The surrounding area is quiet and peaceful but with scooter or car, you can find most amenities (7-11, supermarket, local markets, restaurants) within a 5-minute drive. Our villa is 100m off the main road to Klong Muang (local halal restaurant is at the corner). There are nice restaurants; Baan Ton Mai Cafe' 700 m. away and Ruan Thip Klong Son near Klong Son temple 2 km away. You can walk down the road to Elephant Park camp too!

We provide 2 free scooters services to Ao Nang beach for each day.  Additional scooter rental, car rental and airport transfer by taxi / van can be arranged at local price.

The two villas are located next door to each other, but both are totally self contained.
Breakfast and dinner at the villa (extra charge).
Every 2 days cleaning (sweep, make beds, take garbage). 
Full cleaning (change linen and towels) is done twice a week. 
Pool cleaning twice a week and use of washing machine are provided complimentary.

Please note that we are not a hotel, just private homeowners offering above average service for an affordable price! Please respect local Thai customs and do not wear outdoor shoes or sandals inside. No smoking or use of mosquito coil in the house or within 2m near the open windows and doors, or a fine 3,000 baht may be applied to launder the curtains. Sorry, we don't accept pets. Small private parties (less than 8 people) are fine but if neighbors complain; the party stops. It is greatly appreciated if you could leave the house relatively tidy when you check out. The villa offers a fixed amount of free electricity per day and there is nominal charge if using over this limit so please turn off A/C when you are out. This is simply done to avoid frivolous use of the air con; most guests stay well within the free allowance.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
It is greatly appreciated if you could leave the house relatively tidy when you check out. No smoking or use of mosquito coil in the house or within 2 m near the doors, a fine 3000 baht will be applied.

Sorry, we don't accept pets and please restrict smoking to outside. Small private parties (less than 8 people) are ok but if neighbors complain; the party stops.

name: Peace Laguna Resort Aonang
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Peace Laguna Resort is where you can experience the lavish living amidst an unspoilt tropical paradise. Nestled down on the spectacular Ao Nang Beach, the resort covers the large area peacefully surrounded by lush mountains and the stunning Andaman Sea. You will be well-treated like a VIP, getting pampered with excellent personalized service. All the exquisite cottages boast the distinctive architecture featuring an embryonic spiral design. I provide Private Cottage with sofa bed for 3 persons

Easily the most stunningly located resort in Ao Nang, the bungalows of the newly renovated Peace Laguna Resort are laid out around a curved lake with the majestic backdrop of the Ao Nang cliffs.
It is also, true to its name, very peaceful, being set back far from the road. Officially, if you follow the public highways, the resort is some 350m from the beach (and 200m from the main Ao Nang Beach Rd).

I offer Private Cottage for 3 persons stay.

Aonang beach

It is 200 metres walk to the beach.

sectionedDescription/description:
Set at the beachfront with panoramic views of the sea, ChaoKoh Phi Phi Hotel & Resort offers accommodation in Phi Phi Don. Guests can enjoy sunset views while indulging in the outdoor pool. Delectable meals and refreshing drinks are daily served at the on-site restaurant. All guests have access to free WiFi throughout the property.

Once entered, you will encounter our green space and customized design accommodations and swimming pool to reflect the beauty of nature and sea life!

Should you need anything; from simple snacks, asking for towels or assistance, our staffs can be easily reached via. in-room telephone line. Or come to our front desk, our staffs will be there 24/7!

We're set on the beachfront which shares the side with the main pier from Krabi town route, and it's approximately 5 minutes from each other! Accessing other famous beaches and viewpoint is also easy when starting from the hotel.

sectionedDescription/description:
Offering hillside accommodation with beautiful ocean views, it is located on Phi Phi Island’s Long Beach. It features snorkelling and kayaking facilities, and an outdoor pool.

The property is a 2-hour 30-minute journey from Phuket and Krabi Airports. The trip includes land and sea transfers.

Featuring teak wood furnishings and private balconies, rooms  come with satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms provide hot and cold water.

Guests can sign up for an excursion at the tour desk, then enjoy a traditional Thai massage after a day of sightseeing. Laundry service is available.

An American buffet breakfast is served daily at the coffee shop. Thai, Western and seafood dishes can be sampled at the resort’s restaurant. The beach bar offers cocktails.

name: Stunning Haven in Phi Phi Island
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience something truly special in our spacious suite. Nestled in the heart of Phi Phi Island, our residence is a paradise sanctuary, providing the ideal haven for travelers seeking a peaceful atmosphere while enjoying easy access to the island's renowned local beaches, water sports, climbing activities, and jetties. Just 1.3 km away from the lively Ton Sai Bay, our residence offers an ideal base for exploring the island's wonders.

The villa is designed to offer a haven of relaxation and comfort. Inside, you'll find an exceptionally comfortable king-size or twin bed, TV, a decent sofa, and a well-appointed bathroom with a rain shower. 
Plus, you'll have convenient access to beach facilities, so you can fully immerse yourself in the sun, sand, and sea just a few minutes’ walk away.
Outside, our residence offers a sparkling crystal-clear swimming pool, a pool bar, a welcoming lobby lounge, and a fitness center, ensuring an enjoyable stay for all our guests. Make your dream vacation a reality and indulge in comfort and sophistication.

The unit is 100% yours. You have access to all the facilities of the complex, including the shared swimming pool, the restaurant, support services at the reception, and 24-hour security.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France, and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

Phi Phi Island presents itself as a tranquil sanctuary offering breathtaking location and lovely beach. Situated just 1 km away from the renowned Tonsai Bay, our residence is the ultimate destination for those in search of relaxation or thrilling adventures like snorkeling, canoeing, and boat trips. Immerse yourself in the captivating beauty of Phi Phi Island, as the residence promises an authentic and immersive experience. Whether you crave a serene beach vacation to bask in the sun, wish to explore the vibrant nightlife of the island, or simply seek solace in the residence peaceful ambiance.

The residence is conveniently close to key attractions, with Ton Sai Pier only 1.3 km away and Loh Dalum Bay just 1 km from the property. For those arriving by air, Krabi Airport is the nearest at a distance of 46.7 km from the residence.

Our price is all-inclusive: in particular, there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
A damage deposit is requested upon check-in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
Children and infants are welcome. Children aged 0-12 sharing an existing bed with an adult stay for free. 
Breakfast is complimentary for 2 people. For an additional fee, you can also enjoy delicious meals in our restaurant.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favorite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9 am to 6 pm for any questions you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling, and helpful.
Our dedicated drivers are ready to provide you with convenient airport pickup services at a reasonable rate from Phuket or Krabi Airport. They will ensure a seamless transition from the airport to the port, where you can arrange your transportation to the island. sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Phi Phi Island presents itself as a tranquil sanctuary offering breathtaking location and lovely beach. Situated just 1 km away from the renowned Tonsai Bay, our residence is the ultimate destination for those in search of relaxation or thrilling adventures like snorkeling, canoeing, and boat trips. Immerse yourself in the captivating beauty of Phi Phi Island, as the residence promises an authentic and immersive experience. Whether you crave a serene beach vacation to bask in the sun, wish to explore the vibrant nightlife of the island, or simply seek solace in the residence peaceful ambiance.
sectionedDescription/notes:
Our price is all-inclusive: in particular, there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
A damage deposit is requested upon check-in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
Children and infants are welcome. Children aged 0-12 sharing an existing bed with an adult stay for free. 
Breakfast is complimentary for 2 people. For an additional fee, you can also enjoy delicious meals in our restaurant.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favorite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9 am to 6 pm for any questions you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling, and helpful.
Our dedicated drivers are ready to provide you with convenient airport pickup services at a reasonable rate from Phuket or Krabi Airport. They will ensure a seamless transition from the airport to the port, where you can arrange your transportation to the island. It's important to keep in mind that public ferry schedules may have specific timings and limited availability.
sectionedDescription/space:
The villa is designed to offer a haven of relaxation and comfort. Inside, you'll find an exceptionally comfortable king-size or twin bed, TV, a decent sofa, and a well-appointed bathroom with a rain shower. 
Plus, you'll have convenient access to beach facilities, so you can fully immerse yourself in the sun, sand, and sea just a few minutes’ walk away.
Outside, our residence offers a sparkling crystal-clear swimming pool, a pool bar, a welcoming lobby lounge, and a fitness center, ensuring an enjoyable stay for all our guests. Make your dream vacation a reality and indulge in comfort and sophistication.
sectionedDescription/summary: Experience something truly special in our spacious suite. Nestled in the heart of Phi Phi Island, our residence is a paradise sanctuary, providing the ideal haven for travelers seeking a peaceful atmosphere while enjoying easy access to the island's renowned local beaches, water sports, climbing activities, and jetties. Just 1.3 km away from the lively Ton Sai Bay, our residence offers an ideal base for exploring the island's wonders.
sectionedDescription/transit: The residence is conveniently close to key attractions, with Ton Sai Pier only 1.3 km away and Loh Dalum Bay just 1 km from the property. For those arriving by air, Krabi Airport is the nearest at a distance of 46.7 km from the residence.

name: Seaview Serenity with Breakfast in Koh Yao Noi
address: Tambon Ko Yao Noi, Chang Wat Phang-nga, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience unparalleled luxury and breathtaking views at our Deluxe Seaview room at Cape Kudu Hotel. Perched on the stunning Koh Yao Noi island, our room offers a serene retreat amidst the beauty of nature.

Deluxe Seaview (Size: 45 sq.m)
Our Deluxe rooms exude splendour and serenity, and offer spacious accommodation and home-like amenities decked in an alluring rustic-yet-chic décor. The plush, comfortable bed is perfect for all-day lounging and the private balcony is ideal for taking in some sun with a good book.

Room facilities and services:
- Spacious private balconies with sun loungers
- Widescreen LCD TVs with cable
- DVD player
- Air conditioning system
- Tea and coffee making facilities
- Minibar
- Hair dryer
- Walk-in shower and bath tub
- In-room safety deposit box
- Free in-room Wi-Fi
- Key card system to ensure your safety

Special Privileges:
- Daily breakfast
- Welcome drink upon arrival
- Welcome seasonal fruits in room
- Use of non-motorized water sports
- 10% discount at Cape Spa
- Complimentary cake in room for special occasions, birthday/anniversary/honeymoon (please provide proof of your celebration)

Follow these steps:
1. Contact our staff :  Reach out our fron office team when arrive at Cape Kudu Hotel
2. Check-In Procedure: Upon arrival at Cape Kudu Hotel, you will likely go through a check-in procedure where you'll receive keys and relevant information about your stay, including access to Deluxe Seaview Room
3. Enjoy Your Stay: We provide everything you need to enjoy your days in a tropical paradise.

Welcome to Cape Kudu Hotel, Koh Yao Noi

We want your stay with us to be as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. If you have any questions, concerns, or require assistance during your visit, please don't hesitate to reach out. Simply use the message box provided in your room, and we'll be more than happy to help in any way we can.

Cape Kudu Hotel

Welcome to Cape Kudu Hotel, your tranquil oasis on the serene island of Koh Yao Noi. Nestled amidst lush tropical greenery, our villa is located in a peaceful neighborhood that offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. Here, you'll discover the true essence of island living.

Local Dining:
Just a short stroll from Baan Yuyen, you'll find charming local eateries where you can savor authentic Thai cuisine. Experience the tantalizing flavors of freshly caught seafood, aromatic curries, and delectable street food. Engage with friendly locals and immerse yourself in the island's culinary delights.

Beach Bliss:
Koh Yao Noi boasts some of the region's most picturesque beaches. From our villa, it's an easy walk to the beachfront, where you can enjoy the soft sands and breathtaking sunsets. Whether you're lounging with a book or taking a leisurely swim, the beach is your haven of relaxation.

Adventure Awaits:
For the adventurous spirit, Koh Yao Noi offers an array of activities. Embark on a kayaking expedition through the iconic limestone karsts of Phang Nga Bay, or explore the island's hidden caves and lush mangroves. The villa's convenient location ensures you're never far from thrilling adventures.

Island Exploration:
Discover the island's unique charm by renting a scooter or bicycle. Cruise through scenic landscapes, visit traditional fishing villages, and encounter the island's warm-hearted residents. Koh Yao Noi's slow-paced lifestyle will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Local Markets:
Immerse yourself in the island's vibrant culture by visiting the local markets. Here, you can shop for handmade crafts, fresh produce, and unique souvenirs. Engage with local artisans and gain insight into the island's rich heritage.

Please contact us via AirBnb message for airport pickup transfer.

Airport pickup transfer from Phuket International Airport to Cape Kudu Hotel
(Private car + Join boat + Shuttle Tuktuk)
Price at THB2,600 for 2 persons per way, (you can settle at property when arrive.)

Exploring the Island:
Once you're on Koh Yao Noi, getting around is a breeze. For those seeking an independent adventure, renting a scooter or bicycle is a popular choice.
The island's well-maintained roads and minimal traffic make it a safe and enjoyable experience.

The tropical island of Koh Yao Noi where our Cape Kudu Hotel is located, is just off the coast of Phuket, making the Phuket International Airport the closest airport to Koh Yao Noi. Getting to Koh Yao Noi from the Phuket Airport is a 20-minute taxi or limousine and a 30-minute speedboat ride.

name: Bungalow-style Suite in Phi Phi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to our serene haven on Phi Phi Island—a blissful retreat featuring a pristine white beach, soft sands, and a spacious pool. Enjoy bubbly relaxation in our Jacuzzi, unwind by the private beach with a mini bar cocktail, and take a 15-minute stroll to vibrant Tonsai Beach Road. Kickstart your day with a complimentary breakfast for two, setting the stage for a perfect blend of comfort and tropical indulgence.

Welcome to our cozy bungalow retreat, where simplicity meets relaxation. Inside you'll find a comfy double bed, refresh in your private bathroom with a refreshing shower, and stay connected with free WiFi and a big TV for your entertainment.

Wake up to a breathtaking view—right from your room, you can soak in the beauty of a stunning pool with a pool bar or at the beach.

Your dream vacation unfolds with a calming pool and sea view, providing the perfect blend of comfort and a touch of something special.

The unit is 100% yours. You have access to all the facilities of the complex, including the shared swimming pool, the restaurant, support services at the reception, and 24-hour security.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Our young concierges are passionate about Phuket. They will look after all your needs during your stay and share tips to enjoy our area. They can also recommend carefully selected activities such as boat trips, a visit to the elephant retirement park, jungle ATV or Zipline.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France, and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

Phi Phi Island reveals itself as a peaceful haven providing a stunning setting and beautiful shoreline. Nestled a mere 15-minute walk from the well-known Tonsai Bay, our establishment stands as the perfect destination for individuals seeking tranquility or exciting activities such as snorkeling, canoeing, and boat excursions. Immerse yourself in the enchanting allure of Phi Phi Island, as our residence assures a genuine and immersive encounter. Whether you desire a calm beach retreat to soak up the sun, want to delve into the lively nightlife of the island, or simply yearn for serenity in the tranquil atmosphere of the residence.

To explore Phi Phi Island, embark on long-tail boat excursions to hidden coves, snorkel in the crystalline waters, hike to breathtaking viewpoints, and savor vibrant nightlife in Tonsai Village.

Our price is all-inclusive: in particular, there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
A damage deposit is requested upon check-in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
Children and infants are welcome. Children aged 0-12 sharing an existing bed with an adult stay for free. 
Breakfast is complimentary for 2 people. For an additional fee, you can also enjoy delicious meals in our restaurant.
During the nighttime, there might be echo noise from parties outside our property, disturbing guests' relaxing time. However, we have earplugs available at the property.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favorite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9 am to 6 pm for any questions you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling, and helpful.
Our dedicated drivers are ready to provide you with convenient airport pickup services at a reasonable rate from Phuket or Krabi Airport. They will ensure a seamless transition from the airport to the port, where you can arrange your transportation to the island. It's important to keep in mind that public ferry schedules may have specific timings and limited availability.

sectionedDescription/description:
Experience a tropical paradise at the resort, located on Ao Nang Beach. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it has an outdoor pool, spa and open-air bar offering views of the Andaman Sea.

Featuring hardwood flooring and furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms are decorated with seashells. A satellite TV, safe and minibar are included.

Traditional Thai herbal massage and other body treatments are offered at the Spa. A tour desk and transport services are available for guests.

A wide selection of Thai and European dishes are featured at the Kitchen, steps away from the beach. Fresh seafood and steaks are offered as well. Guests enjoy cocktails served at Beach Bar.

The resort is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. It is just a short stroll from the shopping and dining strip of Ao Nang Beach.

name: Sea View Deluxe, 50sqm at Phi Phi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Offering hillside accommodation with beautiful ocean views, it is located on Phi Phi Island’s Long Beach. It features snorkelling and kayaking facilities, and an outdoor pool.

The property is a 2-hour 30-minute journey from Phuket and Krabi Airports. The trip includes land and sea transfers.

Featuring teak wood furnishings and private balconies, rooms  come with satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms provide hot and cold water.

Guests can sign up for an excursion at the tour desk, then enjoy a traditional Thai massage after a day of sightseeing. Laundry service is available.

An American buffet breakfast is served daily at the coffee shop. Thai, Western and seafood dishes can be sampled at the resort’s restaurant. The beach bar offers cocktails.

name: 2 Bedroom Private Pool Villa on the beach
sectionedDescription/description: Welcome to tropical paradise Phi Phi Holiday Resort, located on a heavenly beachfront of powdery soft white sand that gently merges with the Andaman Sea creating sublime hues of aqua-blue. The hideaway resort is surrounded by breathtaking natural beauty, a place where romantic couples and families can retreat to spend quality time together in a tranquil and serene environment.

name: Deluxe Ocean Room, 45sqm - Krabi
address: Tambon Sai Thai, Chang Wat Krabi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, it offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi. Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available.

The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities.

Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk.

Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from the resort.

name: Family Studio, 48sqm - Krabi
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience a tropical paradise at the resort, located on Ao Nang Beach. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it has an outdoor pool, spa and open-air bar offering views of the Andaman Sea.

Featuring hardwood flooring and furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms are decorated with seashells. A satellite TV, safe and minibar are included.

Traditional Thai herbal massage and other body treatments are offered at the Spa. A tour desk and transport services are available for guests.

A wide selection of Thai and European dishes are featured at the Kitchen, steps away from the beach. Fresh seafood and steaks are offered as well. Guests enjoy cocktails served at Beach Bar.

The resort is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. It is just a short stroll from the shopping and dining strip of Ao Nang Beach.

name: BeachHouse Pool Villas Krabi 1
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description: Please note that we have a deposit of 5,000 baht or if you do not have enough Thai money. It can be in euros or dollars. Or it can be a passport. This must be paid upon check-in. And we will refund or passport when you check out. After we check that the villa is OK. Thank you.🙏🏻😊
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Please be informed that monthly bookings are subject to additional fees. 

Please note that utilities such as electricity and water are priced at 2500 baht.

If you require fresh bed linens and towels during your stay, we will be happy to provide those for an additional fee of 300 baht. We also offer cleaning services for 700 baht if you would like us to take care of that for you.

Please note that a deposit is required depending on the length of your stay. For for bookings of one month, the deposit is 10,000 baht. For bookings exceeding one month, the deposit is 15,000 baht.

We hope this information helps, and please let us know if you have any questions. Thanks so much for considering staying with us!
sectionedDescription/notes: Please note that we have a deposit of 5,000 baht or if you do not have enough Thai money. It can be in euros or dollars. Or it can be a passport. This must be paid upon check-in. And we will refund or passport when you check out. After we check that the villa is OK. Thank you.🙏🏻😊
